column3: Soo Te Pabeꞌe unu te soobedyana, ooonneꞌyoona tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo oo-waꞌnesoo nanasoobedya.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa numme pumme nakatzimodu yaa teepu-koobatu unu soobedyadu. Ka gi namayadu tukaba nanesootuhi naꞌewa tukakwuna oe manegena, soo Te Pabeꞌe unu ne soobedyana, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo sopedakwatoona, pudusoo nabatsase ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu.
Tamme oꞌnosoo uga ka sutakoo podo meadape. Tamme gi ka Te Naa po sopedakwadoona.
Soo Te Naa oo tzapoonne noꞌoko numu ooosapa maꞌemukwana pana oosoo ka saaꞌa noꞌobatusoo numu sootuhikwu.
Ka teepu-kooba petuse, ka teepu-koobatu nadukadu natuukekwuna wahadu, oꞌno mu numu tsagoekwu, a yoohoo noko atsa baa gi natuukekwuna.
Tamme ka gi numu ooonakwasoo besa nasooyugwena, tamme oo soopedakwadoo tamme gi maaꞌwaꞌneꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te sootuhise besasoo te matabuekwu.

Pudusoo ka teepu atasoo nu yugwekoo, nu bebesow mu-nagatu sootuhikwu, mu sutakoo numu soo sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.’ Soo Te Pabeꞌe namayodapu ka oo yaꞌekwikoo, ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi sootuhikwu ka pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute,” meeꞌe soo Paul ka mu tunehanedu netamma.
Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tzeabe tzowupagaꞌa-doose, oowehoo oo tzowupakakuhoo. Umu ka numu-kooba katudu kwasu-waꞌne tabuadu-wi oo kwaseyakuhoo.
Nu meeoo mu netamma mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo sususuꞌa sakwa koomadoose ka dooamu-gana mu mabetsea, ka mu tu nobe-witu tuwazoo. Oꞌno umu gi nanesootzeꞌma.
Mu sakwa ka mumme e tuukwena nakaꞌoedyuku, numme ka Te Naa-no toge nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa e nakaꞌoedyuku, nu ka mu tuoegoedu mabesakuyakwe.

Tooe haga tooe naneana gi ka tubope-wi nabodu numu ooosapa gwetzoikwuna nasootuhipu ka gi tookedu nikatudu-kwaꞌne. Oꞌno soo numu yaꞌekwuna ka gi tookedu goso-kwitoo natzawunihoo. Oosoo nikatudu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo Penakwa Numu Yaekwuna mee naneꞌa. Umuoo gi Te Naa hee soobedyadu. Oꞌnosoo Etzaꞌa unnepu gadoo namayugwe, oꞌno manakwana numu gi yaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
mu mabetsea ewa (40) tomoka ka teepu gi numu tumasuana naa-kwi.
Mu ka nanano sumuse, mu sakwa nanakwutooese ka pooha tukapu ewa tuka.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tuwazoo ka naapahe-kwitu namatzabekudu tzatoꞌasoo ka ookow oo mabusukesoo, esoo teepu-koobatu wudyusengakooha gi besa namanakwe soo teepu atasoo mani.

Ewaꞌyoosoo mu momokoꞌne tooe tu tooaꞌa yaꞌekuꞌyipana mu tooaꞌa tu tui-kwikoo namayodayakwe, umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Susumudu numu meeoo nanetamma, “Mu ka Mu Naa Besa Po mee mu netammana gi maꞌwukana, numme mu goekwu.” Umu yise meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Numme ooosapa Ne Naa nakabetseadu tooe numme tu goekwuse sapa, numme ka Ne Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa nabaatoo ne bikwu oo-baa yise numme nobe-gakwu, oosoo yise besa ne sootuhikwu.”

Soo Paul mu tukwutumadu meeoo netamma, “Numme umuoosoo numme tzamaꞌwuna soogwaꞌe ka umuoosoo suda mane-kwi. Umu ewow numu-koobenaꞌyoona ne wupageta gisoo ne nehanepana. Umu yise ne wutumeta, tooe numme togesapa Roman numupana. Mu Roman tumaduguna puu gi ꞌyoo ne matugu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Menoꞌo yise mikoo ne watze taꞌya.”
Soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma, “Mu sakwa gi tuduhapana, mu sakwa gi numu goepana, gi kummaꞌakoosoo namahegana nasoodyagepana, gi ka kukummaꞌasoo emukwapana.”

Tamme ka Te Naa atasoo numu nemayugwena oo nakaꞌoedyukudu soo Te Pabeꞌe te pudu manumudookwu mee naꞌunnedu, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo ka suda te tumatuguna soomuꞌwase gi totsaba-ga tamme manekwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi totsaba-gaꞌyoo.
Besa nu tooꞌe tusooyugwepana oosoo sutaꞌyoo e manoyugwe.
Mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo besa sokwama mee nu mu netamma. Besa sokwama mesoo tuwazoo nu mu netamma.
“Hagaga e yadooedyakwe?” mee nu soonammena oo tamme nakwumunase, natakwatsukwuhoo (7) tutukootabuakunoo natzekoonookute nu poonne mu gagatzokwa-matu nidyakwe.
Mu ka numu tummatzina, mu sakwa mu nakabetsea ka hayoo mumme mu netamma, mu ka Te Naa nakabetseana. Ka mumme mu nesagwikute sapa, tooetoo ka besa mumme mu nematugu sapa tuwazoo mu nakabetsea.
Mu oetu esayidu meeoo mu netamma, “Esoo nana ka te nanesootuhina tooꞌe netakonedu, ka Te Naa nobe-kwi yise ka te nanamooatupu tumayohope ka Moses tamme tunedyooepu o gi te tumayoho tuungu.
Soo Te Naa atasoo te yugwekese tu pupuaꞌamu te mayugweke, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
E pupuaꞌamu, mu te nanamooatupu Te Naa nanayadooakudu te tzapoonnekute umu puu gi nasootooke tooe suda manepunnepana.
Pana noꞌoko nuka nanetzakwiyidu nu magwetzoidooa.’

Mee unnegonno, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. U nokosoo hemma sopedakwatoona gi hee u-makoo nawatzetugu-waꞌneꞌyoo, unu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, numu magwetzoidu. Numme ooosapa u nesookwugaꞌe. U, Ne Naa tubetse nanasookwugi pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
Mu sakwa gi muusoo unu besa namabetseapana, mu tzopuhu mabetsabena, tooetoo unu nanenagadu-wi namasooana. Mu sakwa besa tabua ka gi nidyapuna, besaꞌyoona.

U sakwa mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwena gi nanenasookwipana. Gi nu-ma nasookwipana, nu Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nakwutuma. Gi saaꞌa suipana ka mu numu te tuukweꞌe ka besa naꞌunnedu, tooe tamme mu tumooꞌoo sapa. U ka Te Naa mayukese besa nasootuhikwu oꞌno yise u gi nasookwikwu.
Oꞌno umu, u nakabetseakwu nu-kwaꞌnesoo, nu pudusoo umu-koobatoo nabatsakwu, oꞌno yise umu u tubetse nakabetseakwu.

Mu ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo ka e unnena nakase, unu besa tumayohogonno. Mu sakwa ka suda mu manena maꞌwuke besasoo nanesootuhi manegasoo ka oꞌnosoo mu mane-kwaꞌnesoo. Oꞌno soo suda mu tumatuguna gi mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Soo pahe nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo ka pumme tseda-witu ka teepu-koobatoo wukwatuhoo noꞌyoona yise mu patzona ka baa hooodu-no, puupe mani.
Menoꞌo oosoo te sootuhaꞌe tooꞌe gi te besaꞌhoo sapa, besa tamme sokwama ka tamme oo sopedakwadoo, ka tamme yaꞌe-wikoo tamme o mayodakwuse, yise ooosapa besa sokwamakwu ka Te Naa-baa petugase.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo mu Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu atasoo yugwekwuse. Soo Te Naa mu moogoobu numu noꞌoko nanaꞌahegoedu gi ooka mu maꞌwu, umuoo gi sootuhikwu, umu gi oo-noꞌyookwu.

Soo nana Abraham mee naneadu uga umu tu nananumu-naga nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa mana ume e tayakwitoo mea, nu saaꞌa ookow umu u-maꞌyoona suaketu teepu-makadooa.” Soo Abraham yise oetoo mea ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Tamme sakwa gi baagoepana, soo nahebedu kadooꞌoo te mayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha sakwa te tunemadabueku.
Ewaꞌyoo numu mu nakana, yise ka sutakoo po nake. Ooonneꞌyoona susumudu numu ka umu-ma tzabena suda unakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase, oꞌno yise noꞌobatusoo numu ka tu Besa Pooha-ma sootuhi yise tamme noꞌyoona Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu.

Gi hownneꞌyoo mu wakwawaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, ka mu Jew numu tumayohona gi mayohona. Mooasoo numme umu wakwawaꞌa-matoo tubopu mee naꞌunnedu, ‘Gi hownneꞌyoo mu ka Jew tumayohona gi mayohona. Yoo sakwa mu sukwe mane. Gi ka numu tumadabuena pumatoo mu nanesootuhina nabeamakapu tukapana, puu-gakoo a tookoo tuwazoo. Gi nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu aahe pootammapana.’ “

Soo Peter yise meeoo oo netamma, “How u yise manena u ka sutakoo nakabetsea? U yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nemooagana oo-matu manumaku ka tubewa-koobatoo, ne esayaekute, ‘Noꞌoko numme mu hemekoo,’ mee ne tuukwena.

Tamme yise gi waha-tamme tusooyugwekwu, tuhaꞌa-waꞌne. Ka mu numu nemooagadu numme-baa petuse, tamme gi mu nakabetseapana tooe tamme mu tooꞌe nemooaga sapa. Tamme gi ooosapa te soonammena atasoo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi nanaꞌemota wumatzakadyipana.

Soo numu suda tumatugudu ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa gi oo sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi nanemooagapana. Gi haga saaꞌa Te Naa-matoo meadooa ka yoo suda tumatuguna: atasoo nanesootuhidu, nanakummaꞌakoosoo pootamana, nana-ma tusoonagana,
Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanano nanesootuhidyi, ka menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoona soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwu. Mu sakwa gi mu susumudu numu-waꞌne manepana, umu puu gi numu-no nanesootuhi.

Ka Te Naa doodooamuna tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo nakabetseapana ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona: gi suda tusooyugwepana, ka nanodukwana gi kukummaꞌa-noosoo nanapootamapana, tamme sakwa gi moogoobupana. Tamme ka moogoobuna, ka hemma namadabuena nakabetseadu-kwaꞌne, gi ka Tamme Manumudoopu madumotsea.
Soo Te Naa tu besa pooha-ma te sootuhipu ooonneꞌyoona tamme unu nanasoopedyadu. Oꞌno yise tamme gi nasoogwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwemeana.
Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu, tooꞌe oosoo mee unnedu pana, “Nu ka Te Naa dooamu-nagatu,” oosoo tookwa esayaꞌe.
Mu sakwa nanasoobedyana, besa nanano unnena ka yow manekwuse, oetu nehanena. Mu ka oo manena nuka besa masoonammekute.
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe sookwutuma pana gi oo-toogoo manakwe, ka gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsakwi oo manakwe.

Umu ewow hee-gaꞌyoo sakwa besa tumatuguna ka numu besa tummatzi. Umu sakwa mu tutuha manedu mesoo hee-maka. Soo Te Naa ka oo mu tumatuguse ka hemma besa mu hee-ga-ma umu-matoo makodyukwuse, oꞌno saaꞌa umu nasootuhikwu ka Te Naa-baa petugase.
Umu oo nanekwegea, “Esoo ka suda tumaduguse, numme u-matoo a bike.”
Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhi, gi tutuha nasooyugwepana, ka mu numu tamme wohoꞌne. Tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu.
Ka tukwutumadu moohedu Paul-kooba tueyaꞌe tuungu. Tu soomane-kwaꞌnesoo ka oeꞌyoona masoo mesoo manakwe. Umu a pupuaꞌamu punnoꞌo a mesoo mabetseꞌa

pana ka mu numu besa soobedyana, tamme gi suda mu tumatuguna waha-waꞌneꞌyoo, ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka besow numu-witu, ooosapa numu netubetzeyaꞌekwu tooe hemma tooe how manese sapa, ooosapa nanasoobedyakwu, tooe suda tamme mu yugwe sapa.
Meeoo nabotugu, “Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu meeoo unakwe, nu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.” Numme punnoꞌo ooonneꞌyoosoo.
Ooosapa oetoo nananenoyugwena. Mu toetzegoedu-mitoo nenoyugwe. Mu nenoyukwe mu nasootookedu. Mu gi nanatzooedu tummatzina. Gi haka sakwaꞌekupana.
Soo manege nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo pumme tseda-witu noꞌoko mu nunuꞌu tunetammana umu-koobatoosoo wukwatehoo. Mu nunuꞌu pabeꞌe nagedu togabu-wi mani, puusoo nanatoo nisagoehoose.
Umu egea nakaꞌoedyukudu, nu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikute, “Mu sootuhi,” mee unnena. Umu tunakabetseadu tubetse Jew numu Te Naa tunetutzeana.
Oosoo Apollos mooasoo oo nakapana gisoo ka Te Naa po-witu natunedyooepu, ka Te Pabeꞌe po-witu mu tuukwekwuse sapa, ka John baa-wi numu matzakayina suuꞌmu oetu sopedakwadoona, ka Ephesus-wi petu.
Tooe how tooe manena tukana, tooetoo hebena, besa sapa oo hane tabua, mu numu te poonnena ka Te Naa besa sooyugwekwu.

Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ooosapa ka togesapa naꞌunnedu mu tunedyooenokwu, ka tooe hekwi mu gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu tunedyooedu soogwikwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu tunedyooena mu yise ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.
Yoo manepunne soo te tookoo yaanopana, tamme gi hee ka te moogooa gadooꞌookoo. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukute mee unepana gi tunakabetseana, te tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi hee.
Soo Paul ka tunemamakwuse, ka tukaba gwuuhoose yise ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka tukaba-matu tsakaꞌowse oo tukakooha.

Tamme sakwa umu-matoo tubo mee naꞌunnedu, ‘Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu gi tumayohona ka mu Jew numu tumayohope. Yoo oo sukwe ꞌmane: ka mu numu tooe hemma-too tooe nanesootuhidyidu tuka, gi umu-baatu tukapana. Ka nodukwa-gana gi kummaꞌakoosoo pootamapana. Gi too puupe tukapana. Gi ka hemma tookoo puu-gakoo tukapana tuwazoo.

Soo Paul meeoo ka Ananias netamma, “Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo ume ooosoo yugwekwu. U gi besaꞌyoo pana u nasookwatsetuguna, besa nasooyugwe. U gi besa numu matugudu. U gi besaꞌyoo te tumayohope-toohakwi ka e nemadunagana tooe uusoo punnoꞌo gi oo-toogoo tumayohopana meeoohoo. U sakwa uga umu gi e matake tuungupana.”
“Noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku, nu ka suta mu tumatuguna gi mu-matoosoo makodyukukwu,” mee soo Te Naa te netamma.

Te Naa tusoohanena soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme mabetseakwuna. Soo sutaꞌyoo gi tamme-matoo kodyukwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo mooasoo nabatsapu. Tamme ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe podo oo-no meadabekwu. Tamme ooosapa oo-noꞌyookwu ka oo kodyu petuse tooe tamme tuipupana tooetoo how gwetzoipana.
Umu Gog noko Magog Te Naa-matoo nananesootuhidu tumooꞌoodu. Umu tunakaꞌemukwadu ewaꞌyoo, gi nadatsungapu.
Mu uga ooonneꞌyoo ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Pana menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa Besa Pooha gi totsabu mu matabue, besa tuwazoo mu matabue ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatu nabatsase.

Menoꞌo nu nakwutumapana mu numu nu tuukweꞌe ka nuga pukwi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse sopedakwatoo. Oosoo e tummatzikwu, nu yise mu numu tuukwekwu ka besa naꞌunnedu yow teepu-koobasoo oo petunoꞌo-kwitoo tooe. Ooonneꞌyoona nu gi nanenasookwaꞌe.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhina nanetzakwiyino tuwazoo, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Tamme sakwa ooosapa namabetzapepunne noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nanesootuhikuna.

Mu Paul, Silas noko Timothy tubona. Mu Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Thessalonica mee naneadu-witu. “Mu sakwa ooosapa besa nasootuhi.” Numme ooosapa besow mu-toogoo natuunguyakwe.
Mu sakwa noꞌoko numu-tamme besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo tamme-baasoo kodyu petukwu.

Ka tooe hannanoꞌo tooe tamme ka ekow tukaba tukase, ekow atsa baa hebese, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu. Tamme ooosapa ꞌyoo tumayohonokwu, Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petu-witoo tooe.
Tamme ka nanesootuhina tunakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tuoeyaedu numu besa mayugweyakwe. Soo tuoeyaꞌedu numu tuwazoo ka tumaꞌemakwase, soo Te Naa oo soomuꞌwakwu.

Nu besa soonamme u ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna. U mooꞌa Lois mee naneadu mooe tunakaꞌoedyukupu-gaꞌyoo, oꞌno yise u pea Eunice mee naneadu punnoꞌo. Nu punnoꞌo ooosapa Te Naa nakabetsea umu te nanamooatupu-waꞌne. Nu u nanesootuhikute. Nu oo soomaꞌyu u suda soonamme ka ume e maꞌwukase. Nu besa u poonnese yise nu besa soonammekwu.
Umu ka tubetse suda tu namanakwe tooꞌe watsepana gi hownnekoo namatzatsebooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nu noꞌoko mu nananesootuhidu meeoo netammanoꞌo, mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna, nu besakoo mu sootuhina atasoo mu mayugwekwu, oꞌno yise ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.’ “

Umu numu nemooagadu tu natumanakakuookwuna soogwidu sapa, tooe hayoo tooe mu tuukwena, mu yise mu tumanagakute. Umuoo unu moogoobu. Oꞌnosoo meeoo natunetamma soo mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ooonnekoo umu puusoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.

Mu suda numu tunedyooedu, ka momokoꞌne nemooagana ka Te Naa tuwazoo wohoꞌne. Ka oꞌnosoo mu Jannes-no Jambres mee nananeadu ka Moses wohonepu. Umu ooosapa suda tusooyugwena gi ka togekoo nakaꞌoedyukudu.
Nu ka mu soobedyana mu nenanawina meeoo mu netamma. Ka gi toge mu mamanena sakwa mu maꞌwuse, nuga mumme tutunetammakuna tumayohoku.
Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Naa-no besa napuaꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka besa te mayugwese, tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Besakoo tunakabetseana, besakoo ka Te Naa unnepu suuꞌmu numu tunedyooena, u ka ume nakabetseadu-no namagwetzoikwu.

Ewasoo nu mana umu nananesootuhi mamanepunnetoo meayina, ka umuoo wohonena. Umu sakwa suda Te Naa-witu waha mee nu soonammena. Nu tuwazaoo nanakwingaꞌakwi nummeyakwe mu wakwawaꞌa noꞌaata-too mu nanesootuhidu nekwohonena.

Soo numu tooe how tooe nanasuda manakwe: nanamaꞌemukwana, numu poohana, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina, nidyupuna, yabesoo sutana, hee-koobatoo nanakwohonena, numu nasutaꞌana, noꞌoko numu sutakuna, nanahana,
Numme yise ka Apollos-no nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo, numme ka Te Naa tummatzidu. Tamme Te Naa nakabetseadu suuꞌmu nanakummaꞌamasoo nasootuhikwu, ka besa te mane-kwi.
Mu yise besa pooha nasootuhipu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meadabena oo-baa mu petuga-matoo tooe.
Umu tunekwuna, nanakatsebooepunne.
Oꞌnosoo noꞌyoona mu Te Naa nanamooatupu tuukwewabe ekow botugu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Umu meeoo, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe poohamaka. Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu tumaꞌemukwana somuꞌwa.’ “

Mu numu ooosapa besa manekwu umu ka besow podokoo soomeana, ka Te Naa besa pumme sootuhaꞌe ooosapa nummenummena ka Te Naa-baa nobe-gakwu. Umu numu ka gi toge-witu nakabetseana puu suuꞌmu mee nasooyugwena nanasutatoo meadabekwu, yise kadoo namayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma nana-kwaꞌnesoo matugukwu: mu Jew numu, mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo.

Nu John mu-matoo tuboꞌo mu Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nananesootuhidu tooe hano tooe ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-koobatu. Nu meeoo mu nanesootuhikute umu Te Naa, Te Pabeꞌe-no yise soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu sootuhise mu magwetzoikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe toge kaaheno ka Te Naa besa unnepu te tuukweꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe unu te soobedyana ka suda tamme tumatugu-koobatoo nabatsapu, ooonneꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe ka suda tamme tumatugupu tubetse nematzakwunipu. Yise Te Pabeꞌe ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase ooosapa gwetzoinumme. Ka mu numu nanesootuhiku meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko tamme nananesootuhidu netamma. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe besa nakabetsea oosoo yise noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu te nehane katukwu. Gi hee ka Te Pabeꞌe ooonakwatu pooha-gaꞌyoo, oosoo besaꞌyoona gi mobegwa-gaꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa tamme magwetzoikwu tuwazoo, tamme ka besa manena. Umu suda tumatugudu wutumetakwu oosoo ka saaꞌa nanasuꞌmu mu nemadabuedooa, ka how mu besow tooetoo sutahoo.
Ka umu naꞌesayaedu numu tunedyooedu u sakwa gi nakabetseapana. U sakwa ka Te Naa besa po tubetse nageno. Oo-makoo natunedyooena.
Umu noꞌoko ka teepu-koobakwi manakwana kemmase ka umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu pukwiꞌyoona takonekwu yise paꞌanakwana ka goso-ma mu nakootsasooakwu.
Baa-wi sakwa mu namatzaka ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukuna.” Umu ka Peter nenuummaku numme-baasoo, huudooe tooipunne mee oo netammana.
Numme mu gi ooka sopedakwatoodu mesoo tunedyooe doodooake tuwazoo, soo ne tumayohopu ka Te Naa besa podokoo ne tzapoonnekute.
Oosoo mooasoo te tunetammakupu, soo te gwetzoimokwuna gi moobegwa-gakwu.

Tamme ka Te Naa kaaheno unnepu nakabetseana, tamme yooonneꞌyoo: gi totsaꞌa, gi nanano nanahaꞌa, besa numu matugu, besa numu nakasoopedakwadoo, numu tumatzina, ka toge-kwitu soopedakwadoona, kaahenoꞌyoona.
Soo Te Naa ka tu Tooa, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus, unu soobedyana tooꞌe noꞌoko tu pooha oo-tamme nemawuni.

Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo manekwuse sapa, oosoo mu ewowsoo numu wutooꞌe, mu tunakaꞌoedyukukwuna, oosoo sumuna ka noꞌoko numu tu maꞌemukwana maꞌwuse, ka pukwi suuꞌmu mu tunakaꞌoedyukukwuna soogwina. Oosoo gi tooe haka tooe suda tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwuna soogwi, ka gi kadoo mu namayugwena petsabena, ka noꞌoko numu tu matabuepu soobedyana.
Nu meeoo soonamme, nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoona tuwazoo oosoo besaꞌyoo. Nu puu gi nodukwa-gaꞌyoo. Pana soo Te Naa ka numu nanaꞌatasoo sootuhaꞌe.

Mu sakwa tubetse unu ka mu nanasoobedyana sookwi, ooosapa sakwa mu maneno. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha muume sootuhikwuna sookwi. Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka mummesoo yadooakwikoo, ka Te Naa unnena mu numu tunesootabuena.

Menoꞌo numme oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo manepu, yise how unu pooha-gana tubetse besaꞌyoo. Tamme uga togabu-wi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tamme-baa petuse, tamme tabua-kwitoo kua. Soo Te Naa ka teepu pudu matabuese, meeoo unakwe, “Soo taba sakwa ka togabu kootabuakupunne.”
Sumuꞌyoo Jew nana Alexandria-witoo nadooaꞌadoopu, Apollos mee naneadu, unu soonammena oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa unnena nabotuguna.
Ooosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe puu tamme-koobatoo nabatsa tabuapu, ka mu Jew numu nonoꞌatana-wanatoo nabatsapu.

Yooonnekoo hekwitu sakwa u numu tunedyooe. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nenoyukwena, mu ume gi nakabetseadu kaaheno nemayugwe, u ka mu moohena. Mu numu sakwa saaꞌa gi u-maꞌyoona nanekoepana ka meeoo pumme u tuukweꞌe.

Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa puu tamme unu soobedyana, ka tu Besaa Tooa ka yaa teepu-kooba nabatsakupu, ka noꞌoko te tumaꞌemukwana kadoo mayugwena. Ka mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Naa ka unu te soobedyana, ooonneꞌyoona tamme punnoꞌo unu nanasoobedya.

U, E Naa, ooosapa besa e soobedyadu, gisoo ka teepu namadabue sapa. U ka mu numu taka nakaꞌoedyuku mayugwepu, oꞌno umu ta-baa ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Oꞌno umu ta-nawaꞌneꞌyoo mee ta unnena nakasopedakwadookwu, yise taka nesookwugikwu.

Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhi-baa moohedu tamme yise oo sootumma. Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanaꞌunusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukuno. Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo sopedakwatoona gi oo tumayohokute ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ooonneꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo ooosapa suda te mane tuungu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus, Te Naa Besaa Tooa, mooasoo ka Te Naa-baa petugapuna, onona oosoo ooosapa te nanesootuhikute.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha sumuꞌyoosoo, pana nanaꞌatasoo numu sootuhaꞌe, puusoo numu-nagwitu tutzeana Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma numu sootuhaꞌe.
Soo watsu nadatsunga toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo tumooyagaku. Soo taba, ka muha-no ka mu paatoozooba togawiyaꞌnehoo yise mu tooꞌe naamookwitu suuꞌmu kootabuapunne.
Umu Jew numu yise ka pumme nanesootuhi moohedu Sosthenes mee naneadu ka tunehane nobe-kobenaꞌyoona unu mooedyugwe. Soo Gallio gi haꞌyoo mu netamma.
Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe wutumahookwu, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu namatzatsebooge.
Ooonneꞌyoona numme yise gi nasootooke. Ne tookoo kadooꞌoo namayugwese sapa, ne soonammena pudutupusoo namadabuemenasoo nonotsa tabeno.

Togesoo mu tuka aata soo Martha punneꞌe, Mary, unu nanenagadu, besa kwanadu nakwanaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe kuku-koobatu hanehoose, tu tzopuhu-ma oo-maꞌwonge. Soo nakwanaꞌa noꞌoko ka nobe-tootu besa kwanakupunne.

Soo Abraham yise ooosapa mana ka Te Naa pumme geakwunakwahana ka teepu-koobakwisoo nummenumme. Soo Abraham tutsekadukupe-kwi nobega numme, oo tooa Isaac mee naneadu, oo kunooꞌoo punnoꞌo Jacob mee naneadu oo-no, umu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu tu unne-waꞌnesoo.
Mu sakwa ooosapa nu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Naa besa podo meano, yise umu susumudu numu nu-kwaꞌnesoo mane Te Pabeꞌe oedyukudu-kwaꞌnesoo.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme oo tunetammakupu besa nagenona, oꞌno tamme besa nananemabetseanokwu.
Soo Te Naa meeoo besaꞌyoo tamme ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna oo nakabetseana. Gi sakwa sukwe tunakaꞌoedyukuna mee naneyugwepana.
Sumuna umu-matu meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa gi toge tumatugupu.” Pana gi!
Tamme sakwa mu numu gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu pupuaꞌamu-ga, gi umu-no nanahapana.
Te Naa manepunne-kwitu nananepetugudu. Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka mu moohedu Michael mee naneadu-no panetogogwa nananepetukute Te Naa manepunne-kwitu.
Ka sutana, tamme sakwa yabesoo suta makwu. Tamme sakwa gi wunaꞌme sutapana tu yongo-matoo.

Mu sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, tooe mumme mu nesootzema sapa. Tamme sakwa mu numu tamme wohonedu nanesootuhiku, soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma. Tamme ka mu numu nanesootuhikuna, soo Te Naa tamme sootuhikwu.
Soo E Naa yaatoo e tayase, ooosapa nu-no, gi e maꞌwukaꞌa, nu ka ooosapa besa Te Naa nakabetseana.”
Tamme sakwa ka kaahenodu sopedakwatoo, kaaheno tusooyugwena, ooosapa kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu tamme ka besa naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Pabeꞌe te magwetzoikwu.

U sakwa ekahoo nakasopedakwadoo, mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) tugoo tabuagunoo nananesootuhidu manepunnedu, nu umu-naga. Mu natakwatsukwuoo (7) paatoozooba tumadina e hemmapunnena, mu nananesootuhidu manepunnena, nu noꞌoko mu manana-wipunne.

Ekow naꞌunnedu togesapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Gi haaꞌnoto soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu Te Naa tummatzidu menakwutu-ma nasootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsa soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena Te Naa te magwetzoise, te sootuhikwu. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe unu sootuhaꞌe, soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma tu matabuepu-kooba numu oo moohe tuunguna.
Nu tubetse besa soonammena nu eka mu tuukwe, oꞌno mu punnoꞌo tubetse besa sokwamakwu.

Nuga tubona, Paul, e puaꞌa, Timothy-matoo. Nu mooasoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu u tunedyooꞌepu mu Te Naa God Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no meeoo e netamma, “Mu numu tuukwe ka Mu Pabeꞌe-witu.” Soo Te Naa togesapa te magwetzoipu. Te Pabeꞌe tamme poonnekwu ka pumatoo te nanetzakwiyina. Oꞌno tamme oo-waꞌneꞌyookwu.

Mu momokoꞌne sakwa punnoꞌo besa tunakaꞌoedyukuna besa nanesootuhi-no. Umu sakwa gi tu nagwe a tubua-ma mu numu nasootzaꞌmekupana, gi how tuwazoo tu tzopuhu-ma namadabue-ma nasootzaꞌmepana gi ka besa tatabuadu-ma namasooapana tuwazoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tugapoo nakwebaꞌa-doose, ka puma mu tumuna mu kootsoo noko mu seepu tuwazoo, ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kumabakoo wumahukwunihoo. Ka pukooba mu tutzanabetokudyina tonabedahoose, ka oo-kooba natuoona tatapepuꞌa.
Oꞌno oosoo gi te pudu manumudoose ka Te Pabeꞌe-tooha te mayugwe. Ka Te Naa tamme tunemadabuekupu ka besow podo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meanoꞌokwu.

E pupuaꞌamu, mu sakwa oo sopedakwadoo mu numu mu tumooꞌookwu mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu te nanetumooꞌoo ka tamme namaboonnena weehepu goso-ma namaboonne-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa besa sokwama mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoona. Mu numu mu tumooꞌoona mu wohonekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe tu tumooꞌoopu-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu tubetse besa sokwamakwu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma mumme oo sootuhise, mu oo sopedakwadookwu oosoo tookwa Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma mumme tu sootuhise tooe mumme tu tumooꞌoo sapa mu besa sokwamakwu.
Tamme sakwa ka besa-matoo besa sokwama. Soo Te Pabeꞌe uga nabatsapu menoꞌo gwetzoidu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu pu-toogoo namamakwupunne nadooha mu mayugwekwu.
Tamme gi how nuugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme ka oo sopedakwatoona ka Te Naa tamme magwetzoi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka oo unnepu-ma te sootuhi. Ekow naꞌunnepu-ma tamme sakwa ka sutakoo matzooeku.
Ka o petugase, sumuꞌyoo Egypt nana ka Jew nana unutse mooedyugwe.
Ne nanumu, ooosapa besa manenona gi nasootookepana.
Mu sakwa ooosapa namabetzapepunne ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu sakwa gi suipana tooe hemma haꞌoo manese sapa. Natzooesoo nasooyugwepunne.
Paatoosooba-matoo tuwazoo. Ooonneꞌyoona nu mu wakwawaꞌa numu oona kwingaꞌa Babylon mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo numu-matoo mu tzamaꞌwukwu.” ’
Yise, ne nanumu, gi nasootookepana. Ka mu-baaꞌyoona mumme ne tuukwepu ooosapa nakaꞌoedyuku, ka mu-matoo ne tubona tuwazoo.
Soo Te Naa te mapudutupudookwu, oꞌno tamme gwetzoikwusoo, oosoo yise ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise, oꞌno tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu.
Noꞌyoona mu momokoꞌne sakwa oo nakapunne ka pummetu tunedyooꞌe. Gi pummesoo tusooyugwena wahapana.
Tamme gi numu nakaꞌoedyukupana ka mu numu moohedu mu wakwaꞌetse nesootzema. Waahoo tooetoo pihoo numu ooka suda oo tumatuguna poonnedusoo ookow waha, mu saaꞌa mu nakaꞌoedyukudooa.
Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatoo mu soomaꞌyu. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona nanapuaꞌa.
Umuoo ka suda sokwamana yagana mee unena, “Uda! Suda hiꞌyoo, tubetse suda tooe. Numme besa manekese ka Rome-witu ewa ne tumanagayakwese. Pana Rome yabesoo gadooꞌoo koomani.
Soo Te Naa tubetse unu te soobedyana, “E doodooamutseꞌe,” mee te natubaꞌnga. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa meeoo tamme natubaꞌnga umu ka gi Te Naa sopedakwatoona.

Mu tootooebetse-no, sususuꞌa sakwa ooosapa mu nanamooatupu nakabetsea. Tamme sakwa tammesoo gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana oosoo ka mee nabotuguna, “Soo Te Naa ka umu besa nasooyugwedu numu gi besa sooyugwe. Oosoo te sootuhaꞌe ka gi numu ooonakwa besa te nasooyugwe.”
Numu tooe esagoepana, soo Te Naa unnepu ooosapa togesapa. Meeoo nabotugu oo naꞌunne-kwaꞌnesoo, “Soo Te Naa ooosapa kaahenoꞌyoo ka tu yadooa-wi. Gi haga oo tuagaꞌne, ‘Oosoo esayaꞌe,’ mee unnena.”
Soo Saul yow petu ooosoo manekwuse.”

Ka oꞌnosoo mu esagoedu Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneyugwetu, menoꞌo mu numu mu-naga-kwitu unne-kwaꞌnesoo. Umu kaaheno mu tuukwe mee naneyakwe pana mu esakoekute, ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nemooaga ka meeoo unnena. Umu meeoo, “Oosoo gi Te Pabeꞌe tooe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase sapa.” Umuoo puusoo yabesoo kadooꞌoo nanemayugwe, umu ka meeoo mu numu tuukwena. “Oosoo gi Te Pabeꞌe,” mee.

Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe unu batsa soogwaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nanesootuhi tabeba-wi mu numu mabesakuna, yise meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa nuga tubetse Naa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo mee nanetammadu.
Nu besa mu-matoo soonamme ka nuka mu soomaꞌyu, ka mumme e tunnedyooepu mu mayohono.

Soo Te Naa yadooawabe David mee naneadu ookow waha ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu te tuukwepuna. ‘Nu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa ooosapa nu-notu. Nu gi hownnekoo nammayamoa-waꞌneꞌyoo ka ooosapa Te Naa nuka mabetsea.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna yise pudu numu namayugwemena ka Te Naa unnepu-ma. Soo Te Naa unnepu gi kadooꞌoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Tamme sakwa ka tumaꞌemukwana kaaheno toge-witu nanatuukwena ka tumaꞌemukwana, yise nanano nanesootuhina, tamme yise besa manekwu. Soo besa tunakabetseadu numu ka oo nanesootuhikuna oosoo ka ewow pooha-gana ewa besa tumayukwe.
Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu, noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
Tooe pudusoo mumme e maꞌwugakwuse sapa, mu gi suda sokwama-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka mu-baatoosoo e kodyu petukwuse.
Pana gi! Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka Jew numuna, soo Te Naa ka tu unnepu numme Jew numu tuukwese.
Mu hemma how yugwedu sakwa mu pumme nedyawena nakabetsea, umu puu ka hemma how yugwenaka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseꞌa. Umu sakwa gi sukweapu ka pumme nedyawedu nakabetseapana.

Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo, gi etzaga sutadu. Oosoo ka oo te matuguna, oꞌno tamme sakwa ka suda te tumatuguna maꞌwukase, yise ka oo besa podo meadabekwu. Pana tamme ka meeoo sokwamana, “Nu gi ka suda e tumatuguna maꞌwu-waꞌneꞌyoo yise ka oo besa podo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Oꞌno yise tamme tammesoo ka sutakoo mabetseadu-kwaꞌne tabuꞌa, tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu ka kaaheno nanasuuꞌmu numu manena umu-matoosoo kodyuse.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina ka oo tunetammana oedyukuna oosoo te nakana

Mu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa mumme magwetzoikwu. Nu oo-matoo nanesootuhikwu oosoo besa mu masoonammekwu, mu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna. Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nanaꞌunusoo besa tunakaꞌoedyuku manedooa.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe natzakwenepu tzageꞌe ewaꞌyoo sunngabe toonoopa oona soo tupe tuwaga, gisoo haga pukwi natuguna.
Mu nunuꞌu papabeꞌemu yadooawabe nahemahoose ka paba hano-kwi nidabedu oa saanoo-kwaꞌne kookwanapunnedu, kweedapunnedu, numu kweekahaꞌekudu-kwitoo natzabepuꞌa togesoo gwetzoina.
Meeoo tuwazoo natubotugu, “Ka te wohomu tsuagoꞌe, tamme sakwa mu maka. Ka mu puugoꞌe, tamme sakwa mu bamaka. Umu yise nasookwikwu ka suda te matuguse.”

Tamme sakwa ewa oetu soohaneyi ka Te Naa unnepu. Oꞌno tamme unu sokwamana tammesoo mesoo nananenoyugwe, ka Te Naa unnepu nanatunedyooe tuwazoo. Tamme sakwa tunekwuna mee unnemo, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.
Mu nanana sakwa pummesoo nonodukwamu besa soobedya, besa mu matuguna. Umu sakwa gi mu nekusekapana.

Mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu nanumu-gana, umuoosoo sakwa mu mabetsea. Oꞌno yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu, gi kookoomamu-gakoo, gi oekoo nanumu-gakoo, gi natummatzidu, umuoo sakwa umu tummatzi.
Soo Te Naa meeoo te tunetammakupu ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-koobatoo gi mobegwa-gakwu ooosapa te gwetzoimokwuna te sootuhikwu.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu tu namagwetzoina nasootuhikwu, soo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi.
Nu Mu Pabeꞌe, nu ooosapa mu nanumu-gakwu, mu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu mu sootuhise, oꞌno mu gi suta-kwitoo namoohegakwu.
Tooe nu mu-koobatoo nakwutumase sapa mu sakwa gi nasootookepana. Oꞌno mu mesoo natummatzikwu.
Umuoo ooonneꞌyoo nananepetugudu ka pummesoo sookwina nakabetseadu. Gi umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea. Umuoo besa ka mu gi sokwamadu numu yadooꞌe, umu ka mu nemooagana.

Umu yise tooe haꞌoo tooe manakwe nanasuda: unu moomoogoobuna, nanidyapuna, tu pupuaꞌamu nasoodyagena, nanahana, numu mesoo batsana, nanaꞌesagoena, nanatumooagana, ewa suda nanatuukwena, Te Naa gi petzabena, suda nanadyadooena, nananesagwaꞌena, nananesootzemana, besa nanasooyugwena, tu nanaanapuꞌamu gi nakabetseana, gi numu tutuha soobedyana, gi kaaheno tumatuguna, yise tooe haꞌoonnekoo tooe suda namanedu oedyukuna.
U sakwa besa oo mabetseana ka Te Naa Besa Pooha ume oo sootuhipu. Tamme noꞌyoona ka oo Besa Pooha-matu nasootuhipu.
U ooosoo manepunne. Tamme ka suda manena, ka saaꞌa soo suta te tumatuguna tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu. Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseana, saaꞌa soo Te Naa ooosapa te sootuhina, te magwetzoinokwu.
Gi suda numu matugukwu, gi nidyapuna, oo soomuꞌwukwu ka suda ume tu matuku.
Umu tuwazoo unu ohobudu nungabu-gaꞌyoo. Mu kasa ewow hemma medabedu-kwaꞌne kangagonno ka mu yotsumoꞌo.
Ka gisoo umu e tunedyooe umu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka suda tumaduguna, pana menoꞌo umu oo sopedakwadoo, saaꞌa yise soo suda mu tumaduguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka gi mu nanekwuha.

Mu sakwa punnoꞌo nu-kwaꞌnesoo, ooosapa mu gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Tamme sakwa numu soonakana, ka besa naꞌunnedu waha. Tamme sakwa mu numu mesoo nanekwegeayi. Tamme ka mu gi soo tunakaꞌoedyukudu tamme poonnepunne gi suda manepana.

Tamme uga ooosapa ka sutakoo nakabetseadu, gi hownnekoo yooi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana menoꞌo soo oꞌnosoo te tumatugupu kadoo namayugwepu ka Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo oo-koobatoo nabatsase, tamme yise gi ka suda namanedu nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo namayodakwu, tamme ka yaꞌese saaꞌa oo-baasoo ooosapa nobe-gana, ka Te Naa nakabetseakoo.

Tooe haga tooe ooosapa gi toge manedu ka Te Naa doodooamu gi petzabedu tookwa, ka Numu Sooꞌadu nagedu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka ooka gi togekoo, Numu Sooꞌadu tumayohokudu oosoo gi Te Naa doodooamu-matu.
Tamme ka te tookoo suda tusooyugwena nakabetseana, tamme tookwa ka Te Naa wohokana, gi Te Naa nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nu yise besa soonamme oo nesookwagaꞌena ka Te Naa mee oo netammana, nu oo sopedakwatoo e yaꞌekwuna e namayodakwuna e nummekwunasoo.
Esoo tukapu ka mu hemma namadabuena nageana, mu numu pumatoo mu nanesootuhina, ka umu sutakoo tubetse nageana. Nu gi oo petzape mu sakwa gi umu-no nanesootuhipana.
Ka oonow mu pepetugase, mu susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Antioch mee naneadu-kwi nonobe-gaꞌyoo. Umu-matu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, mu Barnabas-no Paul umu-no.

“Gi hownneꞌyoo ka tumaꞌemukwagonnopana,” meeꞌe mu nemooagana, mu netammakwu. Umuoo gi nakaꞌoedyukupana. Soo Te Naa ka sutakoo umu-matoosoo makodyukukwu noꞌoko mu gi tunakabetseadu umu ka tumaꞌemukwakena.

Umuoo ka mu numu nonobe-kwitu suda neyugwena, ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu kummaꞌakoosoo tunedyooeꞌe. Umuoo numu, oo numu tunedyooe tabua ka ewowsoo obetoo tusoogwipunnena. Mu suda numu tunedyooedu sakwa nanetzadyoiku.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka seepu koodua natzakwonaꞌadoo oe egeadu, oosoo kaaheno mu mabetseakwudu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka koodua-koobakwi oe tooe egeadu, tookwa gi toge manedu.
Umuoo suda manakwe, ka Te Naa besa po oowemota manegase, ka unu moogoobuna. Oꞌnosoo soo numu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu Balaam
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Jew mu wakwawaꞌa mu Jew moohedu-no ka Paul noko Barnabas tupe-ma tagoekwu mee tunetammana.

Sumu tuwazoo soo Te Pabeꞌe oo tubengasoo, “Simon, u haaꞌa e puaꞌa?” Ka Peter suda nenuuma soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo tubengasesoo, “U haaꞌa e puaꞌa?” Soo Simon meeoo, “U Ne Pabeꞌe, u noꞌokosoo hemma sopedakwatoo. U oo sopedakwatoo nu u puaꞌa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Umu nu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.
Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa Tooaꞌana yise oo-noꞌyookwu. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu gi oe naneꞌegakute mu tooe hemmatu tooe nanesootuhidu punnoꞌo gi oe naneꞌega-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Soo mogoꞌne unu nanenagadu-kwi namasooana, unu nanenagadu patze tupe oo-maꞌyoona patakwetseakawunu ewow oa tupe hee-gaꞌyoo. Oa tupe namadabuena tseda yoongana noꞌyoona soo suda oo tumatugupu oowekoo yoongakatu.
Tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedya Te Naa tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo. Tamme ka nanasoobedyana, sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo besa nanano meadabekwu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Pudusoo nu mu numu suda mane-koobatoo nabatsakwu. Oꞌno yise mu oo sopedakwadoodooa, yow nu mu Pabeꞌe, mu magwetzoi meakwudu. Ewaꞌyoo numu e nakaꞌoedyukuna ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Nu togekoo mu tuukwe. Nu ka hemma pooe-kwaꞌne puu, ka teepu-tooha namasuase tooe suda manese sapa, ka suakese ewa pooedooakekwu, yooosoo nu punnoꞌo manekwu. Ka e yaꞌese e namayodase, ewaꞌyoo numu nunakwana nanesootuhi manekekwu.

Numme mu numu meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka nananodukwana kukummaꞌamasoo emukwapana.” Numme, nummesoo, sumuna ꞌyoo suda manakwe. Numme meeoo, “Numme gi hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo,” pana numme sumuna kummaꞌakoosoo numu natusooa tuduha.

Nu yise unusoo numu nasoodyage manemena, nu ka oo sopedakwadoona nu sakwa gi numu nasoodyagepana. Tamme yise gi oo sopedakwadoo ka te yaꞌekwuna. Pana tamme ka te Jew tumayohope-witu nakase, tamme oo nakasopedakwatoo ka tumaꞌemukwana, tamme tookwa tuikwu.

Mu numu uga noꞌyoona gi besaꞌyoo. Tamme uga ka gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna punnoꞌo ooonneꞌyoosoo. Tamme uga gi oo nakasopedakwadoona gi oo nakabetsea, ka tamme tu nemooaga, tamme meeoo tusooyugwe. Tamme nanasuda manena, unu nidyupuna, ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu nasoodyagena, gi ooosapa nanapetsabedu.
Noꞌoko nanana sumu-kwaꞌnesoo nematugu. Nu ka mu Te Naa, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka umu Te Naa tutummatzidu-no ka nuka tu tunemanekuna u tuukwe, “U sakwa noꞌoko Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana gi numu tutzeapana.”
Wunaꞌme menoꞌo maneka mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa oowetoo mu sootuhikwu. Mu sakwa gi nasootookena, gi ka mu nasootuhipe nemawunipana.
Tamme sakwa kaaheno numu tunedyooe ka Te Naa besa unnepu. Gi hownneꞌyoo numu nuka nesootzemapana.
Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Joppa-witu Simon mee naneadu kootsoo puhu mahanedu. Soo Peter wunaꞌme ka Simon-baa.
Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa Besa Pooha tamme-nagaꞌyoona, tamme ka Te Naa nobe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, mu sakwa ekow nakasopedakwadoo.

E nanumu, tamme uga gi hownnekoo ka Te Naa-baa petuga-waꞌneꞌyoo ka te mooa tumayohope mayohona, ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona. Soo pabaꞌyoo wunapu oo naamootoo natzapadadu ooosapa uga ka Te Naa-makoo te takonepunne, pana menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Oꞌno yise ka Te Naa pumme pudu tunetammakupu-too te tunedyooe meakwu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu gi hemma heesoobedyadu mee netamma, “Ka pukwiꞌyoona e kemmapu-witoo e kodyuse, mu saaꞌa e tooe soogwikwu, pana mu gi e mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Suda mu tumadugu-kwisoo mu tuikwu. Mu gi nuga pukwitoo mea-kwitoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo.”

Soo Te Naa unu te soobedyana te netutzea tu doodooamu manekwudu, besaꞌhoo numu te mayugwekwu. Tamme sakwa mu numu tummatzi, besa mu matuguna, gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana, gi sutapana, gi nidyanapana.
Soo tooe haga tooe nu-matoo nanesootuhidu ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu. Soo E Naa yise ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo nanagwetzoidu mu sootuhikwu.

Umu sakwa besa numu tunedyooedu. Umu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo ka tu nodukwa noꞌoko tu dooamu tunemadabueku, oꞌno umu tu naa nakabetseakwu. Umu ka gi pummesoo dooamu meeoo tunedyooena, umu tookwa gi ka Te Naa dooamu meeoo tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Nananetummatzina, nanatummatzina, nanatukwena ka ooosapa hemma yoo manekena ooosapa mu manekeno.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nakaꞌoedyuku-kwi manakwanasoo, soo Te Naa unnepu, “Mu sakwa nanasoobedya,” meeꞌe naꞌunnedu mu ooosapa nakanoꞌo.
Ka ewa suda hemma manegena. Mu sakwa ooosapa manepunne mu manepunne-kwaꞌnesoo.
Sumuꞌyoo nana Nicodemus mee naneadu ka umu nananesootuhi papabeꞌe-matu

Oꞌnosoo tuwazoo Rahab mee naneadu mogoꞌne oo tzapoone ka Te Naa-wi tu tunakaꞌoedyukuna tu mane-kwi. Ka mu numu watze tuꞌeyaꞌedu ka Te Naa doodooamu-nagatu pu-baa petugase, soo Rahab ka mu numu watze tuꞌeyaꞌedu watzetugu, soo Rahab mu watze tumatzi. Ka ꞌyoo tu mane-kwi, oosoo oo tzapoonne soo Te Naa meeoo, “Soo Rahab besaꞌyoo.”
Ka ꞌyoo manena mu momokoꞌne namagwetzoi umu yise ka oe tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka tooaꞌadoona gi noꞌosoo nummabodona besa oo-toogoo tsebooenokwu yise ka Te Naa besa podo meadabenokwu.

Soo Te Naa God, pu-matoo tamme Jew numu nanesootuhina, ka mu te nanamooatupu netutsease, ka mu nanesootuhikuse ewa mu mayugwe ka Egypt-wiꞌyoona, ka mu wakwawaꞌa-waꞌnekoo. Soo Te Naa yise unu pooha-gaꞌyoo ka Egypt-wikoo mu bikase,
Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo pumme ka mu wakwawaꞌa noko ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhina tamme tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo.

Yooonekoo sakwa nu besasoo mu tuukwe. Soo Te Naa waha-baa naꞌunedu te tuukwe, “Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌakoosoo numu-no nanapootamapana, yise sakwa gi too numu patsapana.” Tamme ka numu patsase, tooe gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu-no nanapootamapana, tamme tooesoo ka Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetsea.
mu yise ooosapa mu gwetzoimona petukudu. Gi haga nu oemota mu mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa te tummatzina, tamme gi nanaha. Pudusoo oosoo mu tummatzina mu ka sutakoo matzooekukwu ka mumme matzamadu. Nu mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa mu sootuhi.

Esoo naꞌunnedu togesapa. U sakwa ka meeoo naꞌunnedu mu tunedyooe, oꞌno yise umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo-toogoo manekwu gi oo soomuꞌwana, oꞌno ka saaꞌa besa tumatugudooa, ka oo manena umu besa numu tummatzikwu.
Ka ꞌyoo manena oosoo oo tzapoonne, soo Te Naa unnepu togesapa, soo meeꞌe natubodu, “Abraham Te Naa puaꞌa.” Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Soo Abraham besaꞌyoo ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”
E nanesootuhi nanumu, tamme sakwa gi sumuoosoo suuꞌmu besa matugupana ka numu-nagatu. Tamme ka sumuoosoo suuꞌmu besa matuguna tamme tookwa gi togekoo podo meꞌa.
Umu esagoena, numu nesootzemana nanasuda unnena.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme besa soobedya-kwaꞌne, nanana sakwa tu nonodukwamu soobedya. Tamme sakwa te nonodukwamu soobedya tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne. Tamme ka te nodukwa-no sumuꞌyoosoo.
Meeꞌe nu mu tuukwekwu. Susumudu mu gi Jew numu gi puusoo besa tooꞌe manakwe, pana soo Te Naa yise besa mu mayugwekwu ka unu mu tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Mu numu hemma how yugwedu sakwa tubetse tunakabetseꞌa umu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzina ka besa mu soobedyana.
Numme Jew numu gi oo nakabetsea, pana soo Te Naa ooosapa oo nakabetseꞌa, ka pummesoo unnepu.
Sumuꞌyoo mu tutukwutumadu-matu, ka Te Pabeꞌe ka tu tutokwateno-ma oo sapu kumanakoo oo tzeboosahootooa. Puupe-no baa yise oe manakwana papasawekooha.
Nu besa mu soobedya, ooonneꞌyoona nu mee mu netamma, yooonnekoo sakwa mu besa nanasoobedyamo.

Gi sakwa nagutza tamme menoꞌo te tookoo soonahadyagwepana, tamme sakwa Te Naa nakabetsea. Menoꞌo manakwana yise soo Te Naa pummesoo tusooyugwetoo te nemadabuekwu. Oosoo ka pudu numu-waꞌne te matabuese, ka mu numu tu yaꞌe-wikoo tu mayodapu-waꞌne.
Pana tamme ka Te Naa besa po gi maꞌwuka-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme namagwetzoikwu, tamme ka ooosapa Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukunona.

Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu Jew numu magwetzoikwu. Te Naa unnepu nabotugu, soo Te Naa meeoo, “Nu ka mu Jew numu meeoo netammapu. Nu mu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu. Sumuꞌyoo nana yise mu-nagatu saaꞌa mu Pabeꞌe manedooa. Oosoo saaꞌa noꞌoko mu maꞌemukwana kadoo mayugwedooa.”

Mu Jew numu ooonneꞌyoo. Umu ooosapa suda manakwe ka Te Naa gi petzabedu-waꞌne. Umuoo mu numu tumooꞌoogena. Ka oꞌnosoo umu ka Te Naa yadooawabe-matu goepu-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus batsa. Numme tuwazoo oekoo tayakwuni.
Tamme ka mooasoo Te Naa tubetse unnepu sopedakwatoo pana ooosapa tumaꞌemukwatabena, gi hownnekoo saaꞌa soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.

Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌese oo mayodase oo-no soo Te Naa saaꞌa nabatoo te bikwu, oꞌno tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuise, te mayodadooa, yise Te Naa-baatoo te bikakwu tamme yise oo-no hemma nemadunagakwu.
Noꞌyoona sakwa tamme ka suda te tumaꞌemukwana maꞌwu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa kaaheno nanadyadooe, tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka noꞌyoona sumuꞌyoonasoo.
Numme gi mu numu nemooagadu nakabetsea. Numme ka Te Naa unnepu kaaheno mu tuukweꞌe.
Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-toohakwi te sootuhise, sumuna tamme pooha yadooakwu. Tamme sakwa yise nanesootuhi, oꞌno tamme ka tammesoo unnewununa mu numu mesoo tunesootabuekwu.
Soo Saul sutawununa yise ka umu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu goewunu. Soo Saul mu Jew numu moohedu meeoo netamma ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona.
Pudusoo nu u-matoosoo kodyukakwu. Nu togesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona u-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, u ka umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu. Umu ka pumme u sootuhise besa sokwamakwu, nu-kwaꞌnesoo.
Ka oo wue petuse nanakummaꞌyoosoo hee oeꞌyoona saꞌwe petuhoo: togogwa, nunuꞌu, nanakummaꞌyoosoo kweꞌnaꞌa nu oo poonne.
Pana menoꞌo tamme sakwa gi suda manepana, oꞌnosoo te mane-kwaꞌne. Tamme sakwa gi sutapana, gi nidyanapana, gi numu nesootzemapana, gi nanaꞌesagoekupana, gi suda apegeapana,
umu-no ka tutzekadukupe matabuꞌe.
Tamme sakwa gi ka suda te tusooyugwena nakabetseapana.
Umuoo ooonnekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te netamma tuungu. “Muusoo nakoobatoo mane gi nakasagwipana, oꞌno yise mu besa sokwamakwu.”

Soo Te Naa unnena togesapa manepu, mu Jacob doodooamu yise ka tu wanngaꞌa Joseph mee naneadu unu nuusoogweda. Ooonneꞌyoona umu yise Joseph gi petzape. Umu oo papabeꞌe ka Joseph-ma tumu. Mu wakwawaꞌa ka Joseph tumuse ka Egypt-witoo oo bika. Ka oonow petugase, umu oo-ma tumu. Soo Te Naa ka Joseph sootuhi.

Sumuꞌyoo umu-matu Agabus mee naneadu ꞌwunuhoose ka Te Naa Besa Pooha wumana meeoo mu tuukwe, “Pudusoo noꞌyoona ka teepu-koobatu numu tseagoekwu.” Soo Te Naa unnepu oo-toogoo mani ka Claudius mee naneadu numu-kobena oo katu.
Soo Paul yise ka tunemamakwuse, meatzedose, nanesootuhikooha.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu manise gi suda tumatugunokwu.
E nanesootuhi nanumu, tamme ka noꞌobatusoo he-kwi suda manepunnena, tamme gi sakwa suda oo sokwamakupana.
Soo tooe haga tooe mee unnedu, “Nu ka Te Naa puaꞌagana ka oo besa podo meꞌa,” pana ka ooosapa tumaꞌemukwatabena oosoo esayaꞌena ka togabadoo nummenumme.
Soo koomebaga tawaga mee nose. Pabatseꞌe hemma natzatobododu-kwaꞌne tabuadu ka Peter noko ka teepu-tamme wuegena.
Oꞌno umu oo mesoo manakwe, ka pumme u netamma-kwaꞌne. U yise besa umu-koobatoo soonammekwu. Umu yise ewa nanabesa tumatugukwu. Umu ka u besa podo meadabekwu. Umu unusoo u sopedakwadookwu.
E puaꞌa, Timothy, nu meeoo u netamma u sakwa oo tubetse nakabetsea ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus noꞌoko hekwitu ka meeoo ume oo pooha netamma-kwaꞌnesoo. U oo soomayu ka oꞌnosoo mu numu u-makoo poohabe poonne.
Nu yise ewatsekoo numu naka tamme-koobakoo Te Naa-baaꞌyoona papabatse mee unena naka, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo te magwetzoina unu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, gadooꞌoo hee oo ooonakwa pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
Ka oꞌnosoo umu gi Te Naa sopedakwadoo mu ka ooosapa tumaꞌemukwana.
Gi tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootuhina, nanano tukana, yise ka umu numu mu suta-matoo nanesootuhidu-no tukana, umu-no hebe-waꞌneꞌyoo tuwazoo. Oosoo gi toge tabuꞌa.
Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌa-no nanaꞌahegoepana, gi moogoo manepana soo Te Naa doodooamu sakwa gi ooonneꞌyoopana.
Tamme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu soo tooe hee tooe tamme-too besaꞌyoo. Pana umu numu sutaꞌyoo ewa nabeatse-gaꞌyoo.

Ewaꞌyoo umu oo nakadu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mee unakwe, “Esoo nana mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu goepu ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona. Masoo yaatuoo mu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu wutumetakwuse mu Jew numu moohedu yise Jerusalem-witoo mu bikakwu. Masoo menoꞌo meeoo te netamma oo nakaꞌoedyuku soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe.”

Soo Te Pabeꞌe pooha ka umu yaa teepu-kooba nanesootuhidu numu pooha ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo. Ooonekoosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe umuoo ooonakwa besasoo te nanesootuhikute. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tunetammapu, ka Moses te nanamooatupu oo netammana ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo.
Nu ka nummena yaa teepu-kooba gwetzoina ooosapa nummenummekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena mayohonoꞌo, nu yise ka yaꞌese, nu ooosapa oo-noꞌyookwu ookow te petukuna besaꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa ka tu besa podo mumme oo moohe, nu oo tubetse sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa yise ooosapa besatoo mu moohenokwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petuno-too tooe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baa yaa teepu-kooba petuse te sootuhaꞌe oꞌno tamme oo-toogoo Te Naa besa sopedakwadookwu. Ka Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe Jesus-toohakwi, soo Te Naa togesapa te sootuhi tamme yise gi mobegwa-ga gwetzoimokwu.
Tamme sakwa tammesoo manena maneka, oꞌno yise tamme gi numu-no nanagoꞌe.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te magwetzoi, yise tamme ooosapa ka oo unnepu nakabetsea.
Nu besa mu masoonammekwu nuga besa soonamme-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi hownnekoo besa soonamme-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi suda soonammenapana, gi tuwazoo suipana.

Tamme ka te tunakaꞌoedyukuna nakabetsea, gi ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona hemma te poonnena. Tamme ka tunakabetseana ooosapa besa sokwamakwu tamme oo sopedakwadoo tamme togesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona tamme gi Te Naa-baa.
Nu ka mu numu magwetzoikwuse yaa teepu-kooba petu, gi mu wohonekwuse.

Mu sakwa gi ka oꞌnosoo tooebetse Cain mee naneadu-kwaꞌne manepana. Soo Cain suda manakwe ka tu wanngaꞌa nuusoogwedukuna, ka tu wanngaꞌa kaaheno tumatugu oo batsase. Soo Cain tookwa ka mu sutakoo nagedu.
Noꞌyoona teepu atasoo mani.

“Umu u-maꞌyoona suakekwutu ewaꞌyookwu gi pumme tasunganoꞌyookwu.” Tooe ka numu meeoo sokwama sapa, “Abraham sumuna yaꞌekwu gisoo dooamu-gana oosoo ka mooasoo unu waꞌetsena,” Abraham punnoꞌo ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute.
Numme oo nesookwugaꞌe, “U, Ne Naa ooosapa ne moohenummekwudu, gi mobekwa-gaꞌyoo. U Ne Tubetse Naa. Gi haga u poonnedu. Tooe haga tooe, tooe hanotu tooe, sakwa ooosapa u nesootuhimo.”
Oosoo pabatse mee unne, “Ka Te Naa nakabetseana oo nakaꞌoedyuku ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina. Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabuepu ka tubetse baa yise ka te paꞌanakwatu tuwazoo.”

Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ewa manena, yise nananesootzema. Mu Greek-ma apegeadu numu meeoo, “Mu Hebrew-ma apegeadu tutuha manedu pepeawabe ewow tukapu hanekute, pana mu numme-batu Greek pepeawabe gi namaka.”
Soo Te Naa te netutzea ka yoo manekwutu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nakusega, tamme sakwa oo-waꞌneꞌyoona oo nageno.
Mooasoo numme ka mu-baaꞌyoona meeoo mu netamma, “Mu toetzegoedu sakwa gi namakapana.”
Te Naa noꞌoko numu ka teepu-koobatu besa soobedyana, tu besa dooa tamme-koobatoo nemawuni. Tooe haga tooe nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi yaꞌekwu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu.
pana soo tsoapa gi meꞌa, meeoo mu sukwe nanekwegea, “Nu ka Jesus sopedakwatoo, ka Paul tuwazoo. Mumme nu gi sopedakwadoo. Mu gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Hownneꞌyoo mu?”
Oꞌno yise nu ka sutakoo nunuꞌu papabeꞌe tu nananumu mu nesumutoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tumooꞌoona poonne.
Numme ka sake-wi
Tamme sakwa oetu soohanena ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda namatugu-witu soohanena tamme punnoꞌo ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona suda namatuguyakwe. Mu nuutumedadu numu-witu soohanena tuwazoo.
Soo Te Naa besaꞌyoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nemawunise.” Tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Naa nesootuhidyi. Tamme sakwa ka hemma how yugwena, tooetoo haꞌyoo unnena, Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidyi.
Tamme ka tamme tunedyooedu sakwa tumanagaku, ka besa tamme oo tunedyooꞌe.
Gisoo soo Te Naa oo teepu maka Abraham yise punnoꞌo gisoo dooamu-gaꞌyoo. Gisoo soo Te Naa ka teepu-matu oo nemawunikute.”
Oosoo nana mu te nanamooatupu tumooꞌookese suda mu yugwe. Mu numu tu oongaꞌa puuwana maꞌwu tuungu. Umu yise tuaꞌe.
Numme, John, yise Peter-no memeakwate oo natugu-witoo.
Ooonneꞌyoona nu ooosapa besaꞌyoona o sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Naa e sopedakwatoo, mu numu punnoꞌo.

Umuoo ka pedyoomaba napoonne-kwaꞌneꞌyoo noꞌoko hemma tumeatoo tzobadu. Soo suda mu tumatuguna ooonneꞌyoo gi nawatzekute, tuukwunipe-kwaꞌne numu oo poonne tooe how kwingaꞌyoopana. Umuoo numu nemooagadu paatoozooba tui sawe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Numu puu gi mu nageka-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Gi haga e tunedyooe ka Te Naa unnepu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pooha ookow e tunedyooepu.
Soo Te Naa nuka yise netutzeapu mu gi Jew numu tunesootabue mee unnena.
Tamme ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakabetseanona soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-no manenummekwu. Soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-no manenummekwu, ka tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhise.
Mu sakwa mu tummatzi gi muusoo namakoo tusoohanepana.
Tamme sakwa nanano besa tusooyugwe. Tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana, pana besa umu-no nanapuaꞌaga.
Tamme sakwa gi nidyapupana, gi sutapana, gi nananesootzemapana, gi tooe how tooe nanadyugwepana.

Oꞌnosoo Te Naa meeoo tusooyugwe, “Saaꞌa noꞌobatusoo numu E Besaa Tooaꞌa-no meadabekwu. Oꞌno umu oo sopedakwadookwu ka pumme e bise Te Pabeꞌe-no numu nemadabuekwu.” Soo Te Naa uga besa tu tusooyugwena gi mu numu tuukwe. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa tu pooha-matu-ma e sootuhise tu besa tusooyugwe-witu mu numu e tuukwe tuungu.
Besa toha tzopuhu-gana, soo unu oo tusopedakwadoona gi e-natu. Oo pooe goso-kwaꞌneꞌyoona numu-nagakwi tooe tuboohwaꞌe, gi hemma watzekute.
Noꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo uga numme-tamme kemmadu nanematzagakwunipu. Ewaꞌyoosoo yise numu oo nakaꞌoedyukuna namagwetzoikwu, soo Te Naa yise umu-koobatoo nanesookwugikwu.
Tooe haga tooe ka e tookoo tukadu, yise ka e puupe hebedu ooosapa nu-noꞌyoopunne.
Martha yise meeoo oo netamma, “Aha, nu u nakaꞌoedyukute, u yow Ne Pabeꞌe, oꞌnosoo nanekemmapu.”
U ooosapa noꞌoko hemma nemadabuekwu. U numu ooonakwasoo nasootuhikwu u ka ooosapa besa soomanena.”
Soo Herod ka tukwutumadu tsegesa-ma ka John pabeꞌe James batsa tuungu.
Ka tooe mu numu nananepetukute sapa gi nakaꞌoedyukupana. Soo meeoo naꞌunnewunudu nanakwingaꞌasoo ka Te Naa po kwingaꞌa numu nemayugwe.

Tooe haga tooe gi tu pupuaꞌamu petzabedu tu puaꞌa batsadu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo numu puu ka tu nanumu batsase suda oo tumatuguna oo-matoosoo kodyukwu, yise gi ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu.

Ka ne tukamakwuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon Peter meeoo netamma, “Simon, u John tooa. U haaꞌa noko hemma ooonakwasoo besa e soobedya?” Simon mee oo nanekwegea, “Aha, ne Pabeꞌe, u oo sopedakwatoo nu ume puaꞌa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Umu nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.”
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi susumudu nanesootuhipu puu numu besa tunedyooedu. Susumudu punnoꞌo ka Te Naa-witu mu numu tuukwedu pumme tu pooha sootuhipu.
Ka penakwa tu doodooamu tukapu tumu tuunguse, Joseph tu pabeꞌemu tuukweꞌe, ‘Nu tubetse Joseph,’ mee yise ka Pharaoh-matoo mu bika.
Tamme oo sopedakwadoo oosoo ka meeꞌe nabotuguna. “Tamme ka gi suda apegeana, gi tunesootzemana, tamme wunaꞌmetoo momokwu, te sokwama-kwaꞌnesoo.
Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa nana-matoo sokwama. Noꞌokosoo hemma nanatummatzaꞌe, gi hemma nananetumooꞌe.

Oꞌnosoo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu natuukweꞌe. Nu mooasoo mu tuukwepu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nuugwepu-witu. Ka oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa Pooha tunemamakwupu. Oosoo togesapa oo nawahana, soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme suda tumatugu-koobatoo nabatsapu.
Soo Rome oe naneyukwe oosoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu koese, yise ka Te Naa yadooawabe noꞌoko mu numu teepu-koobatu nakoedu tuwazoo.”
Mu wakwawaꞌa oo nakase, besa sokwamana meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa unnepu unu besaꞌyoo.” Noꞌyoona umu Te Naa tunetutzeana tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Pudusoo nu petukwu, mee oosoo unegapu.” Numme oo soogwedakuna yabesoo oo petukwuna soogwina nanesootuhiyakwe.
Mu sakwa mumme e tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo manena, ka e poonnena nuga mane-kwaꞌnesoo mane. Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu magwetzoina, ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.
Pana yise gi mu wohonepana. Umu-too besaꞌyoona besakoosoo mu tuukwe ka mu maꞌemukwa.

Mu sakwa gi nanemooagapana Mu numu nemooagadu mu soonamme-kwitu tooꞌe nemaꞌemukwakwu mee mu netammakwu, “Nu ewow hemma sopedakwatoona, unu soonamme, mu numu ewow hemma e tunedyooepu. Nu punnoꞌo ka besa naꞌunnedu mu mesoo tunedyooꞌe, mu sakwa nuga pooha nakabetseꞌa,” mee umu mu tooꞌe nemooagadu mu netammakwu. Gi umuoo nakabetseapana. Umu pummesoo tusooyugwena mu tuukweꞌe. Mu unne-witu o kadooꞌoo. Umuoo pooha sutaꞌyoo, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe Pooha-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, oosoo te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase, besa gi totsabu te mayugwe, tu doodooamu te mayugwe. Oꞌno yise tamme ooosapa besa tumatugumokwu.

Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu tooe haga tooe e unnena nakaꞌoedyukudu, ka E Naa nakaꞌoedyukudooa tuwazoo, umuoo ooosapa gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu. Umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda tumaduguna, soo Te Naa mooasoo soomuꞌwa, umuoo gi numu-no paba nanehanekwu, ka mooasoo Te Naa besa podo meana.
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oodutsekoo hoope hemma pu-ma namanagana kwuuna, ka mu nananesootuhidu-pukwiꞌyoona nobe-gakwuna managakwuse.

Umuoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu umu ka suda tu manena manoyugwena, ooosapa tu tookoo sutakoo nekwina nakabetseana, tooe ka suda tu manena besa sooyugwepana umu sakwa tooe namaꞌnasookwiku ka suda manena. Umuoo suda manedu tusooyugwena yaa teepu-koobatoosoo mobegwa-gaꞌyoo.
Umu sakwa gi pudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Umu ka ooonneꞌyoona sumuna paba nasooyugwekwu. Soo suda tu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu ka Sutakoo tu yugwe-kwaꞌnesoo.

E besa nanumu, nu ooosapa mu-matoo e tubokwuna soogwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu noꞌoko tamme oo magwetzoikwu-kwitu, tooe ka mu numu mumme tumooꞌoo sapa. Ooonneꞌyoona nu menoꞌo mu-matoo tuboꞌo ooka mu tuukwena, numu mu tubetse nenoyukwe tuunguna, oꞌno umu ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu mooasoo ka togesapa naꞌunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu natuukwepu, tamme punnoꞌo ka mu numu natuukwe tuungu. Tamme sakwa ka kaaheno te tusooyugwena gi atasoo neyugwepana.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Cana-witoosoo
Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetsea ka oo Besa Pooha-toohakwi, gi toetzegoepana.
Tooe mu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnedupana, mu oo soobedyana, oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, besa sokwamana, besa pumme waha-waꞌne.
Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhipu. Ooonneꞌyoona ooosapa te tummatzina tamme oo-no besa kemmadape.
Atsa baa suda kamadu suuꞌmu o nuuna, umu yise hooope-ma wanapu tzakunase, ka atsa baa-wi oo tzetsakase, ka Te Pabeꞌe tupa-wi oo tzematsuꞌa.
Tamme uga ka sutakoo nakabetseadu. Pana soo Te Naa ka suta-makoo te magwetzoise, te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, ka Tu Besaa Tooa nakabetsea te mayugweke.
E pupuaꞌamu, mooasoo mu ka Te Naa besa unnepu natunedyooepu. Tamme sakwa mu tsasobedya umu ka naꞌunnepu-koobatoo nananepetugudu.

Nu sumuna numu tunedyooekwu Te Naa-witu, nu sakwa yise besa numu tunedyooe. Nu sumuna tutuha manedu numu makakoo, nu sakwa yise mu tutuha manedu e mapuanoko makakoo. Nu sumuna numu moohekwu. Nu sakwa yise ka besow podo mu mooheno. Sumuna nu besa numu matugukwu, nu sakwa yise besa soonamme ka ooonneꞌyoona. Noꞌyoona sakwa tamme ka Te Naa tamme sootuhi-kwaꞌne mane.

Oꞌnosoo gi yoo manepunne, ka Te Naa-matoosoo e kodyukase mu gi hemma nuka tubenga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu ka Te Naa-matoo nanetzakwiyaꞌe, oosoo mu nakasootuhikwu ka nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukute. Menoꞌo manakwana mu ka Te Naa nanetzakwiyise soo Te Naa nu-koobatoo mu nakasootuhikwu, mu yise besa sokwamakwu.
Ewatsekoo nanaꞌatabasoo besa tatabuadu tupe-ma namadabuepu. Mu po ootoogoo po-kwakwabedu punnoꞌo noꞌyoona oa tupe namadabuena.
Tamme ka oo soopedakwatoona ka besa te manekwuna pana gi oo manena, tamme tubetse unu tumaꞌemukwa.
Ka Te Naa kumabaaꞌyoona nu tuapu naka mee une, “Noꞌyoona tamme ka Te Naa nakabetseana oo tumatzidu sakwa oo nesootuhi. Noꞌobatusoo numu oo nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa punnoꞌo Te Naa netubetseyi.”
Menoꞌo tamme yaa teepu-koobasoo te tookoo-wizoo, tooe tamme ka te paꞌanakwatoo te meakwuna soogwipana.
Tamme sakwa ka besa te tumatuguna sopedakwadoona, gi sakwa tamme numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana,

Mu meeoo e tubenga, “Soo tsuadumu naa haaꞌa, ka tu padu mesoo tzakoomadookute?” Soo tsuadumu naa ka meeoo soonammena, “Mooasoo e padu tsuadumuna, oosoo sakwa koomadoo,” oosoo yise mesoo koomadookwu. Oosoo gi suda namanedu.
Mu numu ka Jew nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo mu tayahoo, ka gi mu-no soonanesootuhina. Ka mu goena umu mee sokwamakwu, ‘Numme Te Naa tummatzidu.’
Yise ka e pooha tuusoobedya-wi natakwatsukwuꞌyoo Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu yaa teepu-koobatu suda tumatuguna umu-matoosoo makodyukukwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Ka e esayaꞌe, u sakwa kaaheno e waha. U sakwa yise gi nuka matatzeꞌepana, ka kaaheno e unakwe.”

U punnoꞌo Tubetse Tumatzidu mee naneadu nanana, u sakwa umu momokoꞌne tummatzi oꞌno umu sumusoo tusooyugwekwu. Oꞌnosoo umu momokoꞌne e tummatzaꞌe mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweꞌe. Soo Clement punnoꞌo e tummatzi yise huuꞌyoo kukummaꞌyoosoo tutunakaꞌoedyukudu menoꞌo mooasoo Te Pabeꞌe-baa manepunnedu.
Mu sutaꞌyoo ka umu u-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise umu u yadooawabe goehoo ka mu puupe ka teepu-koobatoo wutookahoo. Menoꞌo yise umu ka puupe hebekwu.”
Gi tamme ooosapa tumaꞌemukwano-waꞌneꞌyoo ka meeoo te soonammena kadoo namayugwese.
Soo nunuꞌu uga gwetzoidu pana menoꞌo gi, puu ugasoo numu-kooba katudu umu natakwatsu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo (7). Saaꞌa oosoo punnoꞌo kadooꞌoo tubetse namayugwekwusoo.
Soo Te Naa meeoo tubotugupu, “Soo tuhaꞌyoo ka puusoo manekakoo mogoꞌne-matoo kemmana, punnoꞌo besa nasootuhi. Soo numu tummatziwabe tu tooa nosoo gi nasootuhikwu umu sukwe natayakwunikwu.”
Mu numu ka ewahoosoo hemma soogwina besakoo nanemooagakwu. Umu tubetse unu hemma soogwikwu oosoosoo yise kadoo mu mayugwekwu.
Pana tamme ka Te Naa unu soobedyana soo Te Naa te tubenga, tamme yise gi papaba nasooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Numme, Jew numu, nasootuhaꞌe mu gi Jew numu-waꞌnesoo. Noꞌyoona tamme nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu mooasoo meeoo mu netammapu
Umu yise kootsoo tooaꞌa-waꞌne tumadabuese, oo-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Ewa nanuka ka oo mu tumadabue-matoo. Umu gi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe.
Ooonneꞌyoopana mu numu penidu ka sutakoo tu nanesootuhina gi maꞌwu.

Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseanona, numme mu numu tuukweꞌe Te Pabeꞌe-witu, umu yise oo nakasopedakwadookwu, oꞌno umu sumuna tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo Te Naa mooasoo ne sopedakwadoo, nu yise mumme ne nakasopedakwadookwuna petzape tuwazoo.
Tamme ka sutakoo podo mea ka sutakoo tookwa nakabetseana, tamme ka sutakoo besa sooyugwena. Noꞌyoona tamme uga nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, suta te tumatuguna yise tamme-matoosoo namakodyukukwu.
Soo Peter ewasoo meeoo mu numu tuukweyakwe, yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu numu ewa suda manakwe yow menoꞌo. Soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhikwu, gi umu-waꞌne manepana, oꞌno saaꞌa mu namagwetzoikwu.”
Tamme ka sutakoo nakabetseana, oosoo te goekwu. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona tamme ka suda namanedu tzadyooikuse, namagwetzoikwu.
Oo nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Umu tunakaꞌoedyukute, ka gi oo-ma nasookwina.”
Tooe hano tooe e nummenummetoo mu numu e tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe tu nakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka nakasootuhaꞌe, Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikute.
Numme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa unu mu soobedyana, ka puu mu netutzease.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa unu nanasoobedya, tamme puu gi ka numu maꞌemukwa oo poonne, ka unu mu soobedyana.

Soo Festus sake-wi ne tayakwu ka teepu Italy mee naneadu-kwitoo mee unakwe. Mu Roman numu moohedu ka tukwutumadu moohedu-no Julius mee naneadu ka Paul noko kukummaꞌakoosoo oo-no nakwutumadu mu eyaꞌe tuungu.

Umu ka Te Naa pumme magwetzoise besa sokwama Te Naa tunekwukute ka oꞌnosoo Moses tu nanamooatupu manepu-waꞌneꞌyoo, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsapu-witu nekwuꞌu. Umu meeoo, “U, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo besa manakwe. U ooosapa kaaheno manedu, u noꞌobatusoo numu-kooba katudu.
Tamme sakwa kaaheno ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe te sopedakwadoona petzape, ka pudu oongaꞌa tu petzekwuna oo soogwaꞌe-kwaꞌne. Tamme namagwetzoise, oꞌno yise tamme besa manekekwu.

Sumuꞌyoo yise paꞌanakwana mee unne, “Menoꞌo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsase besa nasootukikwu.” Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha yise mee unne, “Aha, gi hee sutaꞌyoo umu-matoo kodyukwu. Umu yise nasootuhikwu ka besa tumatuguse.”

Umu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu puu yooonneꞌyoo: Umu puu mu gi koomamu-gakoo pepeawabe tumatzaꞌe, ka gi naanapuaꞌamu-gakoo tooe hownnekoo tooe suta-kwi mu manepunne tuwazoo. Oꞌno saaꞌa umu gi ka sutakoo po nagekwu.
Nu mu tuukwekwu ka mumme nemooagadu toge oo-waꞌnesoo nanakadu unnepu-ma tamme mu tooꞌe nemooaga, tamme sakwa gi umuoo nakaꞌoedyukupana.

Noꞌyoona hee ka Te Naa manumudoopu punnoꞌo mee unnegonno, “Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu-koobatoo nabatsase menoꞌo gwetzoidu noꞌoko hemma ooonakwa unu nanasookwugaꞌe, mu suuꞌmu tamme-kooba namayugwe, naduya noꞌokosoo hemma mamanepunnena ekow noꞌoko nasootuhipu gi mobegwa-ga.”
Soo penakwatu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo tumooyagaku. Tubetse goso pabatsekoo ka tubetse baa-witoo paꞌanakwana wueoo. Tooꞌe naamookwitu soo tubetse baa puupe mani.

Ka Jerusalem-wikoo oo tzadoodooekase oonow petugase, mu oe oo neyugwedu tu wunagapu tzakwumetase, ka sumuoo nana, Saul mee naneadu-kobena mu tuoona petuga. Umu yise tupe-ma ka Stephen tatapageta. Umu oo batsa soogwina.
Oosoo ka noꞌokosoo hemma hee-gana. Noꞌoko hemma matabuepuna, noꞌokosoo tuwazoo nemadabue. Ooosapa sakwa tamme noꞌyoona nanasoogwugi oo nesootuhi.

Ooga mooa soo John ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe poonne, pudamme oo kemma. Soo John yise Te Naa Besa pooha-toohakwi meeoo, “Yowsoo Te Pabeꞌe. Yow esoo nana mu numu nanasuda mamanena-koobatoo nabatsakwudu. Soo Te Naa ka mu numu baa-wi e matzaka tuungudu mee tuwazoo e netamma, ‘U ka mu Pabeꞌe posopedakwadookwu, ka E Besa Pooha-ma oo pooha nasootuhise. Soo E Besa Pooha yise ooosapa ka mu Pabeꞌe-nagaꞌyookwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise saaꞌa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka E Besa Pooha-ma punnoꞌo sootuhikwu.’ Nu ooosapa meeoo mu netammanoꞌo, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwu.’ Tooe oosoo e wanngaꞌa natubanga pana yow esoo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe numu-koobenatusoo. Gisoo nu Te Pabeꞌe posopedakwadoo, nu mu numu baa-wi matzakakena, ooonneꞌyoona mu Jew numu oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwuna.” Soo John yise mee unakwe, “Nu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha poonne, paꞌanakwana, kweꞌnaꞌa tubongo wueketu-kwaꞌne tabuakese ka Te Pabeꞌe-naga manipetu.

Soo mogoꞌne, nanana maꞌemukwadu Rahab mee naneadu, tooe ka mu Jew numu tumooꞌoo-gapana, ka mu Jew tuꞌeyiwabe tu nanumu-makoo tzakwatze, oosoo ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka saaꞌa mu sutakoo numu Jericho-witu nagoese, soo Rahab namagwetzoi, oosoo ka mu Jew numu tuꞌeyiwabe tzakwatzese.
Pana tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa-baa te naneana natzepotuguna. Tamme unu oo soogwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus kodyu petukwuna, oosoo suuꞌmu te magwetzoikwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu pupuaꞌamu te mayugwepu. Tamme sakwa yise besa nanamatugu. Soo Te Naa tamme-koobatoo nanesookwugikwu.
U sakwa namahanese umu-no mease, oetoo mu natunekwina tumanaka. Oꞌno yise ka mu tumamakwuse, mu tzopuhu noꞌoko wutseba. U ka oo manena noꞌyoona numu u sopedakwadookwu ka te tumayohona u mayohose.
Ka onow ka mu numu tumayoho-kwikoo umu ka mu numu netutzea. Soo Matthias yise nanetutzea, numu-no Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwewabe-matu-no nadatsunga.
“Soo Te Naa tubetse besa te manuuma ka te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase. Tubetse besa te manuuma ka besaꞌyoo mee te netammana.”
Tamme sakwa unu suda sokwama ka suda tumaduguse.
E puaꞌa Gaius, ta sakwa gi ka Diotrephes-waꞌne suda tumatugupana. Soo tooe haga tooe besa tumatugudu tookwa Te Naa doodooamu. Soo tooe haga tooe suda tumatugudu tookwa gi Te Naa sopedakwadoo.
Tooe numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsakwuse ooosapa namabetseapunne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe pooha numme-ma natzapoonnekwu. Numme tookoo-gaꞌyoo mesoo nabatsadu, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ne magwetzoaꞌe.
Kukummaꞌyoosoo mu numu ka puusoo hemma soogwaꞌe suuꞌmu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe sootummatzina.
Soo Abraham nodukwa Sarah mee naneadu mooasoo unu peawabe. Pana soo Te Naa oo sootuhise, oosoo koꞌhease tooaꞌadoo ka Te Naa tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna, mee yise Te Naa oo netamma,
Soo Te Naa ka umu pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu tuikwuna gi petzabena. Nu saaꞌa ka yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petuse, noꞌoko umuoo nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, mu tuipu tuwazoo mayosudooa.

Menoꞌo oosoo numme-baasoo kodyu petu. Oosoo meeoo ne tuukwe mu ka Te Naa unnepu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu nanasoobedyana, mu ooosapa ne soomayuna, numme sakwa sumu tooe mu-baasoo petuga, numme tusooyugwe-waꞌnesoo.
Ka saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa tamme-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌedu petuse, oosoo mu manena besaꞌyookukwu mee te netammakwu.
Numme gi nasookwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ne wahakwuna oo sopedakwadoona, numme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha unnena wahamoꞌo. Esoo Pooha ooosapa numme-no gi moobegwaga.

Umuoo numu nemooagadu nunuꞌu-waꞌneꞌyoo gi ka besow tooetoo ka sutakoo sopedakwatoo. Umuoo sukwe momoꞌo yaa teepu-kooba, saaꞌa nagoekwudu. Umuoo sutaꞌyoo numu ka sutakoo nakabetseadu, mu maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, kadoo mu mayugwekwu, umu ka suda unnena gi oo nakasopedakwadoopana. Umu suda manakwe ka suda manena. Umu besa sokwama ka tabuapa, suda manena. Tooetoo togano umu ka mu nanesootuhi sumu-kwiꞌyoona umu-no tukana, tu baagoena suuꞌmu pedukuna. Tabewano tuwazoo umu baagooena, togesapa umuoo mu numu suda pumme sooyugwena pedukudu.
Soo Judas gi ka mu tutuha manedu numu heesoobedya. Soo Judas ka tumasumudoope mahaneyina oo-matu tuduhayakwe.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa unu te soobedya. Soo tooe haga tooe punnoꞌo unu numu soobedyadu tookwa Te Naa-doodooamu-matu.

Ka Stephen nabatsase ewaꞌyoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mea ka mu numu pumme nehowaꞌe. Susumudu kwenaha-tamme ka tubetse baa kumi meꞌa Phoenicia mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo susumudu Cyprus-witoo natsemangega, umu-matu tuwow Antioch mee naneadu-kwitoo meꞌa ka meana ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu Jew numu tuukwe meꞌa.
Mu numu ka Te Naa besa podo meana gi hemma soogwaꞌe, mooasoo besa nasootuhaꞌe.
Oosoo napooha-maka ka umu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu newohonekwuse, oosoo noꞌobatusoo numu moohedu manekwu tooe hanotu tooe ka yaa teepu-koobatu.

Soo Te Naa gi oo nakaheesoobedya ka meeoo te sukwe unakwe, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka nakusekahoose nu ka suda manena,” pana soo Te Naa besa tamme-matoo soonammekwu ka mee te unakwe, “Tooe nu nakusekapana nu ka besa mu matuguna, oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka tooge manena.”

ꞌYooonnekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te tuukweꞌe, ka Te Naa tamme pudu tunetammakuna, te tumayohomeakwuna. Yaa manakwana soo Te Naa besa gi moobegwaga te sootuhikwu, mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsapu.
Sumuna numu meeoo soonamme, “Ka tumaꞌemukwape ewow, soo Te Naa tookwa ewa tusoomuꞌwakwu. Nu sakwa ooosapa maꞌemukwano, oꞌno soo Te Naa ooosapa oo soomuꞌwanokwu.” Ooonneꞌyoo pana tamme gi!

Tamme sakwa gi suda apegeapana, tooe hayoo tooe unnepana, suda naꞌunnedu tuukwepana, tamme Te Naa doodooamu sakwa gi suda apegeapana. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa apegeamo, mee unnena, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”

Sumuꞌyoo nana aakwadyatu pookoo-gaꞌyoo e-kobena tabuapetu. Osoo yaꞌebu manepunnena, sumuꞌyoo tuwazoo tzageꞌe oo ooonakwa tabuapetu, oo-notusoo, oꞌno mu numu-naga-kwitu-matu ka teepu-koobatu tuikooha. Umu tooe how tooe a tui tatabuana, susumudu punnoꞌo a nanagoena, susumudu tuoebu-ma a tuina, susumudu a tseatuina, yise tuwow susumudu nunuꞌu tugoena.

Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka besow nasootuhibu-ma te sootuhi, tamme ka Abraham-waꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Oosoo gi how manepunne tooe tamme gi ka mu Jew tumayohopu nakabetseapana. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme noꞌyoona ka Abraham-maꞌyoona suakepu.
Mu Roman numu e nemadabuese, e netzamaꞌwu, umu ka oo nakase, ka gi suda e manakwe, nu gi pumme batsa-waꞌne.
Soo Te Naa yise ka pummesoo petzabena sootuhaꞌe, tooꞌetoo umu tu nasootuhina petzabedu.

Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌa-nosoo nanapootamapana umu-matu-waꞌne. Ewaꞌyoo umu-matu tuꞌi, togogwa tukue-ma, umu ka kukummaꞌa-no nanapootama. Umu ka Te Naa tumadina soopoonnena, gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Gi oo manepana.

Mooasoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu-witu sopedakwatoo ka etzaga numu natunedyooena. Gi yise numme ookowsoo mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo: ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ka sutakoo nanematzagakwunina. Ka numu baa-wi namatzakana, ka numu nanesootuhikuna umu-ma pooha matuguyina, ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo Te Naa noꞌoko numu mayodakwuna mu tui-kwikoo, ka mu mane-makoosoo mu nemadabuekwu.
Mu sakwa noꞌyoona besa oo matuguna, oo tummatzi, oꞌno yise oosoo yabesoo nu-baatoosoo kodyudooa besa soonammena, numme ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no oo soogwipunne.
Tamme ka mee unena, “Nu Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku,” pana gi oo nakabetseana, tamme gi meeoo une-waꞌne tabuꞌa ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme ka yoo manena gi namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Susumudu mu numu-matu mee nananetamma, “Yaa esoo nana. Mu Jew moohedu batsayagana.
Numme-koobatoo songahaꞌase, meeoo unakwe, “Nu ka E Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhikwu.”
Umu puusoo besa tooꞌe manepana, umu ka gi oo nakasopedakwadoona, soo Te Naa besaꞌyoo mee mu neakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi mu tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu oo sopedakwatoo oosoo Te Naa Penebe Besaa Tooaꞌa. Tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa neꞌesatooe.

Mu sakwa oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyuku, nu pudusoo ka Te Naa-matoo kodyukakwusoo. Nu yise mumme nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhise, oꞌno mu nu-kwaꞌnesoo punnoꞌo, besa pooha nasootuhikwu. Mu punnoꞌo nanasookwugi, nuga ooonakwasoo besa pooha manekwu.
Noꞌyoona mu numu ka hemma how yugwena sakwa ka pumme nedyawedu nakabetsea. Umu hemma how yugwedu sakwa besa mu masokwamana gi umu-no sukwe nahapana.

Ka Te Naa Besa Podo te meadape ka tooe haga tooe numu-nakwi manedu tummatzina oo nenoyugwe, oꞌno oosoo punnoꞌo ka Te Naa besa pumme sootuhi-kwi petugakwu. Soo numu tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa po maꞌwukadu sumuna suda tuukwena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu suta-tamme moohekadooa.
Umu sakwa mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-tamme kaahenoꞌyoo besa mu nematugu, oꞌno yise numu gi mu nesootzema-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka mu numu sumuna umu nesootzeꞌma soo sutaꞌyoo suda-kwi mu mesoo mayugwe.
Tamme noꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe nanaꞌatakoosoo besow poohabe-ma te sootuhi tu sookwikwaꞌnesoo.
Soo waha nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo tseda-witu ka tubetse baa-witoo wukwatehoo. Soo yise puupe-kwaꞌne manise, noꞌyoona hee ka tubetse baa-witu batatuihoo.
Umu sakwa gi ka pumme nedyawedu pumme poonnepunne suuꞌmu oo nakabetseapana, ka besa oo masoonammena umu sakwa oo nakabetsea ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo pumme netamma.
Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka toge manena. Oꞌno sumuna umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo te nekusekadu nasookwikwu. Umu sumuna nasookwina te tumooꞌookwu ka toge te manakwe.
Soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukuna, ooosapa gwetzoimokwuna soogwidu. Nu ka kodyu petuse umuoo tuipu mayosukwu.”
Soo Herod yabesoo unu tuoeyihoo. Woꞌabe tu tookoo sooawunu yaꞌehoo ka meeoo soonammena, “Nu yow Te Naa God-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, oosoo ka tutuha te soobedyana te sootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe tooe hannanoꞌo tooe ka suda hemma manise.
Susumudu numu ka Te Naa besa po ooemota maneyugwe. Umuoo sukwe apegea, gi hekwitu nehanepana.

nu gi e nanenasookwina soogwaꞌe mu numu mesoo tuukwena ka Te Naa unnepu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu, soo Te Naa pooha mu magwetzoikwu, mu Jew numu nokosoo mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo.
Gi hanotu mu atasoo naꞌunnedu naka-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu mooasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsapu-witu mu tuukwepu, ka togesoo mu-baaꞌyoona, mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku.
Noꞌyoona nanana sakwa pummesoo nodukwa besa soobedya ka tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne, noꞌyoona momokoꞌne sakwa pummesoo koomamu nakabetsea.

Oꞌnosoo umu gi Jew numu ka Te Naa gi nakabetseana soo Te Naa gi mu doodooamu-gaꞌyoo. Te Naa uga meeoo mu tooꞌe netamma, “Umu gi Te Naa nakabetseadu mu maꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu yise mu goekwu,” mee mu tooꞌe netamma. Mu uga mooasoo nakoopu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, soo Te tumayohope menoꞌo atasoo manepetu. Soo Te Naa te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase, yise te magwetzoikwu.

Mu wakwaꞌetse u pooha poonnena, u nanesootuhikute. Umuoo u-ma matuguse soo Te Naa ka nanesootuhibu noko numu u tunedyooekwuna ooka u sootuhi. U sakwa ooosapa Te Naa unnepu-witu numu tunedyooe. Gi u namatusookwunikwu.
E pooha tuusoobedya-kwi soo Te Naa ekeow teepu-koobatu namapudutupudoo, tamme-koobatu pudu matabuehoo, soo tubetse baa gadooꞌyoo.
Ooosapa besa sokwamammo.
Mu numu tooꞌe sootui, pana gi tui-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukuna meeoo tuukwe, Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna yise namayodapu, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna tamme punnoꞌo te yaꞌe-wikoo namayodakwu, ka tamme oo bise.
Tooe haga tooe oo nakaꞌoedyukudu soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa Tooa, tookwa Te Naa-no meadape.

Soo besa oo unnepu tamme ka suta te manena tzadyooikute, ka oꞌnosoo te soomane-kwaꞌne mee naꞌunnedu soo Te Naa pudu numusoo te matabuekwu. Oꞌno tamme kaaheno tusooyugwekwu. Tamme besa nanamatugukwu yise ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo.
Susumudu tupe-ma nadakoꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwitoo tooe, tsegesa-ma natseboka, susumudu tooe hownnekoo tooe nagoꞌe.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa kaaheno tumatugudu, mu yise oo sopedakwatoo soo tooe haga tooe kaaheno tumatugudu punnoꞌo Te Naa tooaꞌa.
Ka oꞌnosoo numu meeoo tuukwedu ka Te Naa unnena po tuguse te tuukweꞌe. ‘U sakwa noꞌoko enatu tooe mu wakwawaꞌa nu-kwitu tuukwe. Oꞌno mu e nakasopedakwadoo yise namagwetzoikwu,’ mee soo Te Naa.”

Numme togesapa tuukwena, ka Te Naa besa podo meadape. Numme ka nanasuda namanedu po maꞌwukese, numme gi numu nemooagana ka Te Naa unnena kaaheno wahammoꞌo. Mu ne sopedakwadoo numme kaahenoꞌyoo, Te Naa punnoꞌo ne sopedakwatoo.
soo Te Naa te pudu manumudookwu. Soo Te Naa nawaꞌnesoo te matabuekwu, tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona.

Soo Te Naa besa unnepu te tuukweꞌe, soo Te Naa meeoo, “Tamme besaꞌyoo numu, ka ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna.” A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Soo numu ka kaaheno Te Naa besa podo meana, puusoo nanemagwetzoikwu, oosoo ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sunngabe namadabuenna pumatoo tu natzakwenekwuna, puma tu nataposakwuna, tzanona meꞌa ka pumme tu wumahukase. Oona ka Numu Tzonoho mee naneadu-wi petuga.
Sumuꞌyoo natzooebu, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo tutummatziba, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo soonammeba, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo yabesoo he-toogoo natunakabetseadu mamanepunnena.

Tamme sakwa unu sokwama manekese, besa kaaheno ooosapa maneno. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa ka tamme tu sootuhipu-ma maneno. Mu numu menoꞌotu ewa suda tumaꞌemukwa, umu ka gi sosokwamana. Tamme sakwa gi umu-waꞌne manepana.
Mu tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe tu namagwetzoina natuungudu nanakabetseadooa, mu Jew numu, mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo. Te Pabeꞌe pumatoo te nanesootuhidu noꞌoko te sootuhaꞌe.

Mu Jew-wi nanesootuhidu numu tooꞌesoo namagwetzoipana ka pumme Jew nanesootuhi-wikoo, gi hownnekoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise menoꞌo atasoo te tunetammakute. Tamme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna, oꞌno Te Naa mee te netammaku, “Besaꞌyoo,” oꞌno yise tamme namagwetzoikwu.
Gi hemma suda sokwamakupana, ooosapa nanesootuhi Te Naa-matoo oo tuukwena ka hemma mu sookwina, oo-matoo nanesootuhina tooe hekwitoo tooe.
Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwadoo, soo suta mu tumatuguna umu-matoo kodyukwu. “Gi sakwa mu umu-waꞌne manepana,” mee soo Te Naa te tuyatuukweꞌe.
Ka ookow o tzakwonowse, oetu kweedakooha. Soo kweedadu ka teepu paꞌanakwi manise ka taba habakakuoo.
Gi nanatumooapana, gi tutzetumepana gi ka nanakummaꞌakoosoo nananodukwa-no nanapootama-pana, mu ka gi besa tumatuguna soo gi besa mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyudooa, mee numme mooasoo mu tuukweꞌe.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwuse, tamme pudutupu maneke, pudu namadabuepu-waꞌne. Tamme gi ka oꞌnosoo te tusooyugwe-waꞌne tusooyugwe, besasoo tusooyugwe.

Soo E Naa ka unu e soobedyana, ka hemma how tu yugwena e tzapoonnekute. Saaꞌa E Naa nanabesowsoo e tzapoonnekukwu. Nu yise punnoꞌo mumme ooka tzapoonekukwu. Oꞌno yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo, ‘Uune! Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.’
Tooe haga tooe tuduhadu sakwa gi tuduha mane. Oosoo sakwa hemma natunedyuse hemma howyugwe. Oꞌno yise oosoo tooe hemma tooe ka mu tutuha manedu gea.
Mu sakwa nu-toogoo tumabetsabepunne. Mu ka e nanesootuhikuna ka nakwutumana e natzamaꞌwukwuna, nu sumuna mu-baa nobene-gadooa.

Tamme sakwa gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu nakabetseapana, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nanaꞌatasoo tamme mu tuukweꞌe sapa, gi ka Te Naa Besa Po maꞌwupana. Soo Te Naa ka besa te sootuhina, tamme nanaꞌunusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo te nanamooatupu tumayohope ka te tukakwitu nanetammana gi hownnekoo te tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo tooe ooka te nakabetsea sapa.
Umu te moohedu besa tamme mu tunedyooedu-witu, ne nanumu, numme mu tuukwekwu. Umu Te Pabeꞌe tunetutzeana, umu te tunedyooekwu. Tamme sakwa mu netubetseapunne.
Tamme Te Naa doodooamu manese ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi ka Te Pabeꞌe-too, gi tamme tammesoo hemma manetoo namagwetzoi.
Soo Te Naa meeoo soo Jesus Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe, mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyukuna unu nanasoobedya.

Kummaꞌyoosoo nunuꞌu yadooawabe, numu nemooagakwudu ka teepu-wiꞌyoona tsebooegena nu oo poonne. Waahoo aa-gaꞌyoo ka seepu dooa-waꞌne. Ka sutakoo panetogogwa-waꞌne yadooakanga. Noꞌoko mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu ka nunuꞌu tutzaga-gaꞌyoo, besa-matoo mu nanesootuhi tuungu.
E nanumu, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nayadooape-kwitu mu sakwa besasoo nakasopedakwatoo. Tamme sakwa gi totsaba-ga, tuha-kwaꞌne, pana yise nanapu-waꞌnekoosoo ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwadoo.
Tamme sakwa ka suda manepunnena nanesootuhi. Ka besa sokwamana tamme sakwa tunekwu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina.
Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa tamme nananenoyugweno. Tamme sakwa umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nenoyugweyi. Tamme sakwa noꞌoko hemma sutakoo maꞌwuke. Oosoo ka mu numu Te Naa besa po-makoo takohoꞌne.

Tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe ka oo doodooamuna, tamme sakwa ooosapa oo nakabetsea, tamme oo sopedakwadoona oosoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo gi numu nenaboꞌa ka numu nemadabuekwuse, ka numu besa tooetoo suda manakwe. Tamme gi ooosapa yaa teepu-koobatu. Esoo teepu gi pukwi te natzepotuguna.
Mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseano, oꞌno saaꞌa oosoo mu sootuhidooa ka mee unnena,
Tooe tamme gisoo ka puma Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna poonnepana, mooasoo tamme oo sopedakwadoo ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mumme e tuukwe tuunguna, “Mu uga ka oꞌnosoo tumaꞌemukwadu ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa gi ooosoo manepana.” Umuoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi kaaheno tusooyugwedu.
