Umuoo mumme nemooagadu tu tumayohope mu tuukwekwu ka hownnekoo mu tukakwuna, mu hebena, yise hannanoꞌo mu nanesootuhi tabeba. Mu sakwa gi umuoo nakabetseapana, ka mumme mu nesootzeꞌma.
Menoꞌo manakwana umu ooosapa Te Naa-baaꞌyoona, ooosapa oo-matoo nanesootuhinokwu, soo Te Naa yise tu pooha-ma mu tzatoboyakwu, nadooha mu mayugwepunnekwu.
Soo Paul umu-matoo wuegase, ka oo-koobakwi habehoose oo hedapunnese oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo tzakodyuhoo mu numu yise meeoo netammadooa, “Gi suda sokwamapana. Mooasoo nu a nemagwetzoihoo.”

Nu ooosapa oo oedyukute ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu te manekena. Oꞌno soo Te Naa te netutzeana tamme saaꞌa tunakaꞌoedyukudooa, yise namagwetzoikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mu magwetzoise saaꞌa mu bikekwu Te Naa-matoo. Umu yise ooosapa oo-baaꞌyookwu.
Mu sakwa besa nanapuaꞌana unu nanasoobedya. Nu meeoo nanesootuhiyakwe, soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu sootuhikwu mu ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamuna.
Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo nananakabetsea tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana.
Gi umu-ma nasooꞌemukwapana, umuoo gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu. Nu mu tuya tuukweꞌe, umuoo, mu nemooagadu gi nakabetseapana. Mu ka umu-waꞌnesoo manena mu punnoꞌo gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manepetugakwu.
Mu momokoꞌne sakwa pummesoo kooma nakabetsea, umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana.
U sakwa ka mu wakwaꞌetse-matu suda tumatugudu numu-koobenatoo bi, oꞌno umu susumudu saaꞌa gi oo-waꞌnesoo manedooa.
Tamme sakwa yise gi numu nesootzemapana. Sumuna mu numu-matu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo ka te tumayohope te nagenoꞌo.

koso-ma pumme tu tooꞌe tunihoose sapa namagwetzoi. Umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna tooe puusoo gi nanatzooepana, umu unu naduya manemena, umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu ewow wakwawaꞌa pumme wohonedu matzooekukena.
E tookoo unu tutzaga-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tunetummana numu e tunedyooꞌe, oowetu umu e kusedyana. Tooe haga tooe sakwa gi e nematzamapana, mooasoo nu togekoo tutzagaꞌyoo.
Yise soo unu natzooedu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo tusoonoo-kwaꞌnekoo pabahoo tupe ka tubetse baa-witoo tawazeoo mee yise une, “Soo Rome mee naneadu yooonnekoosoo kadooꞌoo namaꞌekwu.
E nanumu mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu sakwa ka oo Besa Pooha-toohakwi nanesootuhi.
Tamme sakwa atasoo tusooyugwe, gi ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne. Te Naa tamme mapudutuputoose, oꞌno yise tamme oo sopedakwadookwu ka besa tamme oo sooyugwe-kwaꞌnesoo.

Nu gi unu besaꞌyoona gi nu Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka ooka nakaꞌoedyukudu unu kusedyana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tooe nuka sutakoo sapa e sootuhise yise oo e mayugwepu-gaꞌyoo. Menoꞌo yise nu ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse besa nakabetsease noꞌoko ka mu oo yadooawabe ooonakwasoo tumayoho ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
Gi sakwa tamme mu gi toge manedu-kwaꞌne manepana. Soo tooe haga tooe ka sutakoo podo meadu tookwa gi ka Te Naa petzape. Soo Te Naa ka suda namanedu gi petzape.
Numme Jew numu sakwa umu gi Jew numu gi nesootzemapana, numme punnoꞌo ka ooosoo manena. Numme punnoꞌo nummesoo oe naneyukwe ka tooe how tooe manena.

Umu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu James, Peter, John mee netamma mu oo nakasopedakwatoo ka ooonnekoo Te Naa numme Barnabas-noko pooha sootuhipu. Numme nanamitzadyaꞌme ka nanapuaꞌana numme noꞌyoona meeoo unakwe umu paheꞌyoo James, Peter, John-no sakwa mu Jew numu tunedyooe, numme punnoꞌo mu gi Jew numu tunedyooekwu.

Watusukweꞌyoo (4) tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka sunngabe namadabue-ma taposahoo. Umu nanasusuꞌmu oo namasooape hanehoo. Umu yise meeoo, “Ka a kwasu tamme gi tzakebuepana, esoo sumuhoosoo pabahoo wunapu-kwi namadabuꞌe. Tamme sakwa eka wunapu nanatukuku.” Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa unnepu nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, oo-toogoosoo mani petu, “Umu nanasuꞌmu ka oo namasooapu-matu hanehoose, ka oo kwasu nanatotzakwate.” A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo mu tutukwutumadu manakwe.
Aha, numme Jew ka besow po sopedakwatoo, pana numme gi oo nakabetseꞌa. Numme mu numu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa gi tuduhapana,” yise numme sumuna nummesoo tuduha.
Tamme sakwa gi tammesoo tookoo soonahadyakwepana, soo te tookoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona, tamme ka oo-gatuoona. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe
Noꞌyoona ne manena ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka besa te soobedyana tamme-koobatoo nabatsa.
E nanumu, soo Te Naa te netutzeꞌa tu doodooamu manekwutu yise te magwetzoi. Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo soomayu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tubetse besow.

Mu e manena poonne ka mu tutuha manedu e tummatzaꞌe, mu sakwa punnoꞌo ooosoo. Mu oo soomaꞌyu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme mee netamma, ‘Tamme besa nasootuhikwu ka kummaꞌakoosoo hemma numu tummatzina gi ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu-makoo hemma sookwipunnena.’ “
Tamme sakwa meeoo sokwama soo numu nananodukwa-gana besaꞌyoo. Tamme ka kummaꞌanosoo nabootamana soo sutaꞌyoo tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Pana nu gi oe ega. Nu oetu sukwe tomoema petugase, oo poonne ka wanapu pukwi oo natoputoepu.
Oꞌno yise tukwukwetsena, nunuꞌana soo teepu unu yutsungakooha.

Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo-kobena meatzedose oo-matoo nanesootuhikooha. Pana oosoo mee e netamma, “Gi nu-matoo nanesootuhipana. Nu ka Te Naa sukwe natumatziwabe numu-kwaꞌnesoo manedu. Ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka umu Te Naa numu tunepohabeku-too ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.”
Pana soo Te Naa noꞌoko ooka te nakasopedakwadookwuna te sootuhipu, ka Tu Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Oo Pooha noꞌokosoo hemma te tuukweꞌe, ka Te Naa soonammepunnena tooe.
Ka mu-baa oo petugase mu saaꞌa tubetse besa oo-matoo sokwama. Mu numu sakwa oo-waꞌnekoosoo numu besa sooyugwe,
Mu doodooake sakwa ooosapa tu naanapuaꞌamu nakabetsea, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka meeoo tunetammana.
Numme oo sopedakwatoo ka kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo besa meana. Numme besa kaaheno mu matugu noꞌoko numu tuwazoo, soo Te Naa ka ne sootuhise numme mu soobedya.
Mu numu e nakabetseadu, besa tookwa e soobedya. Ka umuoo nuka unu soobedya, soo Te Naa tookwa punnoꞌo unu umuoo soobedyakwu. Nu punnoꞌo besa umuoo soobedyana mu tzapoonnekute nu umu-nosoo.”
Tamme ka umuoo tumayohope nakabetseana, tamme besow nananesootuhidu-kwaꞌne sukwe tatabuꞌa, tammesoo besa nanemadabuena pana umu ka suda te tusooyugwena gi kaaheno te mayugwekute.
Mu u-baa nobenemodu ka kodyu petuse besa u-kwitu nemadabue, u besa mu matugu ka Te Naa tamme tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo. Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka besa mu matuguna,
Soo tooe hayoo tooe naꞌunnewunudu gi pukooba numu naha-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka oo manena tamme nanamanidyunakute.
Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma atasoo te yugwewunu unusoo nawaꞌnesoo te yugwe.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme pudu tunemadabuekuna ookow ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa besa po-witu, tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe gi tootsabu-gapana, tamme-koobatoo nabatsa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoda yise ka Te Naa-baa petuga. Oobeꞌyoona ka Te Naa-kobenaꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhina ka te tumaꞌemukwana nematzagakwunaꞌe. Menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, tamme yise oo nakaꞌoedyukunokwu. Soo Te Naa yise gi moobegwaga te sootuhikwu.
Soo Te Naa yise ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus te oedyukute. Menoꞌo punnoꞌo tamme-waꞌnesoo, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhipu. Nu gi ka Te Naa tumooꞌoo-waꞌneꞌyoo uweoo.”
Tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha suda masoonammepana. Menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te kopose, oosoo yise saaꞌa te magwetzoikwu, oosoo ka Tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhise.
E nanumu, tooe haga tooe kaaheno tumatugudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwu.

E nanumu, tamme sakwa gi ka noꞌobatusoo poohabe nakaꞌoedyukupana. Ewa yaa teepu-kooba naꞌesagoꞌe, ka sutakoo poohabe-toohakwi. Ka nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu mee unnedu tamme-baa petuse, tamme sakwa ka hownnekoo oo pooha-gana sopedakwatoo, haꞌoo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi numu tunedyooe.
E nanumu e naka, soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, soo Te Naa ka te tumaꞌemukwana sumuꞌwase te sootuhikwu.

E nanumu, yaahoo mumme mee e yadooekwuna: Mu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo besa sokwama ka Te Pabeꞌe natubanga, Te Naa oowetuoo besa sooyugwe mu-matoo tubodyikoo tooe sumu-kwaꞌnesoo unaꞌwepana oꞌno sakwa mu sumuna a nakasopedakwadoo petuga.
Mu ka unu tzuagoꞌena, mu sakwa nobe-wiꞌyoosoo tuka, oꞌno saaꞌa Te Naa gi suda mu sooyugwekwu. Nu saaꞌa ewasoo mu tuukwedooa, ka mu-baa petugase.

Soo Pilate mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa mummesoo tumayohope-too a nemadabue.” Mu Jew numu moohedu ka Pilate meeoo netamma, “Soo numme Jew tumayohope meeoo, numme oo mesoo batsa, pana mu Roman numu moohedu ne wutumakwu, ka numu ne batsase.”
Pana mu sakwa ka besow mu nasootuhikwuna soogwi. Nu menoꞌo mu tuukwekwu ka tubetse besow numu nasootuhi-kwitu.

Tubetse besaꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe putoogoo te nanemagwetzoina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo oosoo Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌana gi totsabu-gaꞌyoo gi suda tumatugudu, gi hee oo ooonakwatu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Gi tamme yaa teepu-koobatu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
nu besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha-ma noꞌokosoo hemma sutakoo tumatzooekukena, nu yise besa soonamme.
Mu sakwa gi nanakummaꞌasoo nasoodyagepana, gi kukummaꞌakoosoo maꞌemukwapana. Oꞌno mu besa-wikoo nananodukwagakwu.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhi gi manatu tooe sukwe soomayu. Tamme sakwa mee unne, “Te Naa tubetse besa te sootuhi.”
Soo Moses oo nakase, soogweda meeow wakwawaꞌa teepu Midean mee naneadu-koobatoo. Oonow petugase oonatusoo nodukwadoose, waahoo nanaꞌatse dooamudoo.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanano tuunoyugwe, soo Te Naa meeoo te netammana, “Mu sakwa sumuoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Oosoo noꞌoko te sootuhaꞌe tamme yise meeoo, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa ne matuku.”

Soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma tu sootumadabuena matabue. Soo Te Naa besa ka Te Pabeꞌe magwetzoi, oosoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsa yise ka tu yaꞌekwikoo namayoda. Ooonekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu moohekena mu nasootuhi-kwitoo.
Tamme numu nanano nanakoꞌe, tamme ka tammesoo nakoobatoo hemma soogwina.
Nu meeoo tunaka sumuꞌyoo nana mu-nagatu ka tu naa nodukwagapu nodukwadoo. Oo suda namanedu mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu puu gi mayoho.

Tooe ka sutakoo tamme suda maꞌemukwa tuungu sapa tamme sakwa gi oo nakabetseapana. Mooasoo ewaꞌyoosoo numu ookowsoo maꞌemukwapu. Tamme ka Te Naa-ma mesoo nasoonatzaꞌe. Oosoo gi umuoo sutakoo tusoohanepe tamme-matoo soonoyugwe. Soo Te Naa gi umu suta natusoohanedu te geaꞌa tamme ka te natzooe-ma oo nuutumooekwu. Tamme ka suda natusoohanedu hee-gana, oosoo te pooha-makakwu tamme sakwa yise ka suda namanedu nuutumooe.
Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka e mease, saaꞌa ewaꞌyoo etzaꞌa mu-baa petuse mu tooꞌe nemooagana tooe haꞌyoo tooe mu netammakwu. Ewow sumuna mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu kadoo mayugwekwu.
Numme mu-matoo besa sokwama mee unnena, “Tooe mu numu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda matuguna umu gi suda soonamme-waꞌneꞌyoo umu ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
Gi haga ka Te Naa tookoope poonnedu. Tamme ka nanasoobedyana soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-no manenummekwu. Tamme punnoꞌo nanasoobedya manepetukwu, ka Te Naa tamme sooyugwe-waꞌne.

Nu Paul mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-baatu-no tuboꞌo ka teepu, Galatia mee naneadu-koobatu noꞌoko tooe hanotu tooe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no sakwa mu sootuhi, ka numme mu nanesootuhikute. Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meeoo tunetamma soo Te Pabeꞌe ka suda te tumatuguduna te nemawunise te magwetzoikwu yaa eka teepu-koobatu. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo miyoda. Soo Te Naa ka ꞌyoo manese sakwa ooosapa nanesookwugi. Tamme sakwa ooosapa meeoo nanatuukwe. “Soo Te Naa ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Umu, Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe, meeoo e netamma, “Noꞌoko meeoo mu numu tuukwe.” Gi sukwe numu, meeoo mumme e tuukwe tuungu.
Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo oo soomayuna oo-waꞌnesoo soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi nasootooke tooe ka mu sutakoo numu suda pumme matugu sapa.
Meeꞌe tuwazoo nabotugu, “Noꞌyoona numu sakwa ka Te Naa nesootuhi.”
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tuukweꞌe ka saaꞌa susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo tu meana maꞌwukakwu, ka tooe hownnekoo tooe sutakoo poohabe nakaꞌoedyukuna pumme nemooagadu.
U sakwa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nemayuku umu ka teepu-koobatu pumme moohedu nakabetseana, ewa nanabesa tumatuguna, besa sokwama.
Umu gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukute ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa unnepu ka noꞌoko hemma teepu-koobakwi oo matabuekepu. Ka teepu noko noꞌoko hemma oo-koobakwitu tuwazoo.

Soo Te Naa te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu, oꞌno tamme yise oo doodooamu manekwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetseapana, oosoo tamme tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsapu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase, oo tookoo suuꞌmu yaꞌe oo moogooa gi yaꞌe.
Ne nanumu, soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tunetammakute, “Mu totoetsebu-ma gi tzabepana.” Mu totoetsebu numu gi ne nakabetseadu.
Ka mooeꞌugasoo namanumudoopu nana Adam mee naneadu tumaꞌemukwase, soo oo tumaꞌemukwanasoo oo batsa. Oo-waꞌnesoo noꞌyoona numu yaꞌeyakwe, ka noꞌyoona mu numu tumaꞌemukwa.

Umu ewa nanasookwugi manekena umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umuoo tu wohomu matzooekukena, umu ka besow podo numu moohena, umu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhipu hee-gana umu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka mu sutakoo nunuꞌu-makoo namagwetzoi,
Numme tu netumooꞌoose sapa, numme gi numme suuꞌmu soo Te Naa ooosapa numme-no, tooe numme tu kusegeaꞌa sapa, gi kadoo namayugwe.
Tamme unu suda manakwe ka ooosapa tooe hemma tooe natoogoosoo soogwina. Tamme ka Sutakoo tumatzina Sutakoo pupuaꞌa-gaꞌyoo. Gi tamme ka Te Naa puaꞌa-gana Sutakoo tuwazoo pupuaꞌa-ga-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu pihoo nanana ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-kwitoo gi nemeakute. Umu yise Phrygia noko Galatia mee nananeadu teepu-kumi meꞌa.
Pana ka te tunakaꞌoedyukudu-witu oosoo besa te mayugwekwu meeoo nabotugu, “Gi unu namanakwe, numu namagwetzoina. Gi tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoo bise, oosoo te magwetzoikwu.
Soo mooeꞌugasoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka mease ka pumme tseda-witu ka teepu-koobatu wukwate ka mu numu ka nunuꞌu nagedu yise unu nananuumadu uagoe.
Tooe haga tooe o soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe meeꞌe naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukudu tookwa Te Naa Tooaꞌa. Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa unu soobedyadu Te Naa dooamu unu soobedyakwu tuwazoo.
Tamme sakwa gi tamme soo nananasootzaꞌmeku, gi numu nasoodyagepana, gi paba nasooyugwepana, tamme sakwa tunakabetsea.
Tooe mu wakwaꞌetse tumaꞌemukwa sapa gi mu nasakwaꞌekupana, besakoo ooka mu nemadabuekuna, u naa u nemadatugu-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu naana sakwa u pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo nematugu.

Tamme sakwa ooosapa kaaheno meadabe, tooe ka mu kukummaꞌakoosoo numu tamme sutaꞌyoo mee tamme mu netamma sapa, saaꞌa umu oo sopedakwadookwu tamme tookwa besaꞌyoo. Umu ka puusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manekese, oꞌno umu oo sopedakwadookwu, ka kaaheno tamme tumatuguna. Umu yise meeoo unnekwu, “Soo Te Naa tookwa besaꞌyoo.”
Nu uga mu Jew numu tubetse tunemabetsabekute nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu wohonena unu mu kusedyidu. Nu ooosapa besa tumatuguna ka mu Jew numu tumayohona tooꞌe nagena.
Soo numu moohedu ka pumme tummatzidu nana mee tubenga, “Hannanoꞌo besa mani?” Oosoo yise oo nanekwegea, “Etzeꞌe toge tabeno kadooꞌe.”
Mu Jew numu moohedu gi ka mu numu tookoo paaꞌa nataposana petsape, ka oogow moooꞌa paba nanesootuhikwuse oo tumaduguyina.

Soo Pilate yise oo tooꞌe netzamaꞌwu, pana mu Jew numu moohedu ewa unnekooha, “U ka eka nana tzamaꞌwuse, u ka mu Roman numu-kooba katudu woho. Tooe haga tooe meeoo unnedu, ‘Nu numu-kooba katudu,’ ka Rome-witu numu-kooba katudu netumooꞌoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Gi suda sokwamapana. Mooasoo mu ka Te Naa nakabetsea, nuka nakabetsea tuwazoo.
Umu ka oo kadooꞌoo oo namayugwekwudu soo Te Naa yise mu magwetzoi.

Mu gi e netutzease nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe, pana nu mu netutzease oꞌno mu ka Te Naa nakabetsea, mu yise e wangaꞌamu. Nu ka Te Naa mu nakabetsea tuungu, oꞌno yise soo besa mu tumadugupu gi mobegwa-gakwu. Mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu yise, ka e nanetsagwayaꞌena, soo Te Naa yise noꞌoko mu nekwina mu sootuhikwu.

Oꞌnosoo sumuꞌyoo tooebetse Abel mee naneadu ka Te Naa seepu tookoo nabeamaka. Soo Te Naa ka Abel tumatuguna besaꞌyookute ka besa oo tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Abel pabeꞌe ka tu tumasua-matu ka Te Naa sukwe totsaꞌmaka tooe gi oo nakaꞌoedyukupana. Tooꞌe ka Abel oꞌnosoo nabatsapu sapa, tamme togesoo ka oo besa tumatugukepu-makoo natunedyooe.
Mu sakwa numme ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzidu besa matugu, ka Te Naa Pooha unnepu-witu newahammoꞌo.
Mu sakwa ka kummaꞌa-matoosoo mu numu nanesootuhi suuꞌmu mu nuutumooe gi umu-noꞌyoopana.
Ka mu numu suda tamme matugu, tamme sakwa gi umu-waꞌnesoo manepana, gi suda mu matugupana. tamme sakwa umu-tamme besaꞌyoo. Soo te besaꞌyoona, yise ka suda mu manena matzooekukwu.

U sakwa ooosapa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo tuukwe, “Soo Te Naa gi ka tu unnepu-koobatu mu naha tuungu.” Umu ka nahana gi hemma besa nemadabue. Gi hownnekoo kaaheno oo nemayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka mu numu ooka nakadu Te Naa po oowemota neyugwe.

Tamme sakwa Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi, oꞌno yise oosoo te sootuhikwu. Ka te nuumaduguna besow, tamme sakwa gi totsabuga mane. Tamme sakwa gi waha-baa tusooyugwepana, tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Naa-witu soomayu, oꞌno tamme ooosapa Te Naa-noꞌyookwu.
Tamme ka sumuoosoo mu numu-nagatu besa matuguna, tamme ka Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetsea.
Soo Te Naa besowsoo mu-makoo soogwaꞌe, gi ka suda nanamanedu.
Tamme oo sopedakwadoo soo suda numu tumatuguna numu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka ooosapa suda tumatuguna mu numu ka Te Naa togesapa unnena ne watzetugu.
E nanumu, tamme sakwa Te Naa unnena nakaꞌoedyukuna nanasoobedya. Noꞌyoona Te Naa doodooamu nanasoobedya soo Te Naa ka oo te mayugwena.
Tooe soo tooe haga tooe nu ka gootabedooadu-kwi mee unnedu pana ka sumuoo Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu gi petzabena oosoo tookwa togesoo ka togaba-wi.
Soo Paul noꞌoko tu nummepu-witu mu tuukwe, “Soo Te Naa mu wakwawaꞌa sootuhi ka pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute ka nuga unne-wi.”
Noꞌyoona mu e sopedakwadoo, nu ooosapa besa tumadugudu. Nu kaaheno mu tuukwepana mu gisoo e nakaꞌoedyukute.
Mee tuwazoo unakwe, “Menoꞌo manakwana yise nu mu tumaꞌemukwa soomuꞌwanokwu.”
Mu noꞌobatumasoo nasootuhipu ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-wi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu sootuhi, mu yise tuwazoo noꞌoko hemma waha, yise noꞌoko hemma mu nakasopedakwadoona.
Nu nuusoo natoogoo nanesootuhaꞌeyakwe mu sakwa e nanesootuhi tummatzi meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe te tunemadabuekupu ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise besa nanasoobedya mee te netammana.
Mu numu mee oo netamma, “Soo tsoapa haaꞌa u maꞌemukwa? Gi haga u batsa-soogwaꞌe.”

Soo Te Naa tusoohanena te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tamme-koobatoo nabatsa. Esoo oo tzapoonne oosoo tookwa kaahenoꞌyoo. Ka oꞌnosoo soo sutaꞌyoo gi numu-matoosoo kodyudu, oosoo ka besaꞌyoona oo soohanena, soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsakwu, oosoo yise noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Pabeꞌe-wi, “Besaꞌyoo,” mee mu netammakwu.
Unu utzutzuna, mu numu tummatzidu ka mu tukwutumadu-no puuwanakoo pedana, oe yooꞌe. Soo Peter umu-baa yooꞌe.
Noꞌoko ka Te Naa tamme pooha sootuhipu-ma, tamme natzooꞌe, tamme sakwa ka sutakoo matzooekuno tooe ka sutakoo tamme maꞌemukwa sapa.
Soo Simon Peter yise mee oo netamma, “Haꞌyoo u unnena meeoo, mu gi menoꞌo nu-no mea-waꞌneꞌyoo? Nu u-noꞌyookwu ka unu u soobedyana tooe mu numu taka goekwuse sapa.”
Tooe gi ooka te nakasopedakwatoo sapa, soo Te Naa te magwetzoipu, mu ooosapa besa sokwamakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseanona.

Susumana tamme oo-ma Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, yise susumana te pupuꞌamu nesootzeꞌma, oo namanedu gi besaꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, ka Te Naa mu numu pu-kwaꞌnesoo mu matabuese. Tamme sakwa gi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina numu nesootzemapana nanoꞌo-kwizoo.
nu gi ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu netamma. Umu ooonneꞌyoona: unu moogoobuna, tutuhana, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina.
Nu oꞌnosoo uga ka umu Te Pabeꞌe
Umoo numu nemoagadu ka tu nanapootamana petukute. Numu waha-tamme tusooyugwedu maꞌemukwa. Saaꞌa soo suda mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
E nanesootuhi nanumu, noꞌyoona sakwa tamme besa oo nakapunne, gi sakwa tamme ooosapa apegeagonopana. Tamme sakwa gi etzaga nidyanapana.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus meeoo ne netamma, oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo numme sakwa ka natumunagakuna, ka nanesootuhipe numu tunedyooena.
Mu numu ka nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese, gi ka suda tu tumadugu-ma sokwamakwu.

Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo oo mayuse mee oo netamma, “U menoꞌo besa manepu. Ka suda u tumaduguna maꞌwu, u ka gi suda u tumaduguna maꞌwuna, soo suda u tumaduguna u-matoosoo kodyuse u unusoo tuoeyidooa.”
Noꞌokosoo hemma how mu yugwekwi mu sakwa besa nanasoobedya.
Tooe haga tooe mu-nagatu unu e soobedyadu, e nakabetseakwu.

Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa tamme netammana nakabetsea. Soo Te Naa ka giba-maꞌyoona mu te nanamooatupu yadooese ka teepu neyuutsengahoose sapa, umu te nanamooatupu gi oo nakabetseana, yise kadooꞌoo namayugwepu. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka tu pudu unnepu te tuukwe paꞌanakwana. Tamme sakwa oo nakabetsea saaꞌa oosoo ka teepu noko hemma oo paꞌanakwatu tzadyuutsengekwu.
Mu uga gi Te Naa sopedakwadoo. Mu nanesootuhiyakwe tooe hemmatoo tooe mu yise oo nakabetseaꞌa, gi ka Te Naa-matoo.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo tamme-baa petu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoduse, tamme mooe tuukwe. Oosoo te sootuhikwu ka sutakoo po ooemota te nakwumunase.”
Numme yise besa oo tumaduguna poonne, mu Jew numu-nagatu
E nanumu, menoꞌo nu mu tuukweꞌe nanano tuunoyugwena, oꞌno mu gi nanasukwesoo nanatumooꞌookwu, tamme ka noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Mu tuwazoo uga gi ka Te Naa puaꞌa-gaꞌyoo, gi ka Te Naa sopedakwadoo, ooonneꞌyoona mu gi oo nakabetseꞌa.
U sakwa gi ka suda tusooyugwedu namahane-kwitu soohanepana. U sakwa kaaheno ka besow podo mea, unusoo Te Naa nakaꞌoedyuku. U sakwa ka mu numu soobedyana, gi mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nesootzemapana.

Tamme ka oꞌnosoo mu numu-waꞌneꞌyoo te nanamooatupu tumayohope suuꞌmu nakabetseadu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase oꞌno tamme atasoo namayugweke, ka suda te tumatuguna kadoo namayugwe-kwaꞌne. Ka Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwikoo oo namayoda-kwaꞌne, tamme punnoꞌo pudu namanumudooke. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa-baatoo nabi, noꞌoko otuoo hemma nemadabuekwuse. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa-baatu soomayu, ka Te Pabeꞌe onoko. Tamme sakwa gi noꞌokosoo hemma soogwi ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona, tamme ka Te Naa doodooamu namayugwekese. Menoꞌo mu numu gi hownnekoo ka Te Pabeꞌe soopedakwudoona gi oo nakasopedakwatoo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma te nasoonatzaꞌe. Pana ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe yaa ka teepu-kooba atasoo oo yugwe petuse, tamme saaꞌa punnoꞌo pudu namanumudookwu oo-waꞌnesoo. Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu te poonnekwu ka atasoo te namayugwese tamme tookwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatu.

Soo mooenakwasoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mooe tumooyagakuse. Hakwopa, goso, puupe-no namayuadu ka teepu-kooba mani petu. Tooꞌe naamookwitu noꞌobatusoo sunngabe nihoo, yise noꞌobatusoo pooe tumasuape punnoꞌo.
mee unnegonno, “U, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, kadoo ume kumitusoo. U noꞌoko hemma matzooekupu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka Samaritan mogoꞌne netamma, “U ka e pooha-gana gi sopedakwadoona gi ka E Naa ume sootuhikwuna tuwazoo, u sakwa uga ka oo tubengase soo Te Naa sakwa ka baa puu-ma nagwetzoidu u bamaka.”
Pana esoo mee naꞌunnedu nu botugu, oꞌno mu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe, ka Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa. Mu yise ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mu ooosapa gi moobekwa-ga gwetzoimokwu.

Tooe haga tooe Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu te nakapunnekwu, tamme ka Te Naa doodooamuna. Soo tooe haga tooe gi te soonakadu tookwa gi Te Naa heesoobedya, ooonnekoo tamme oo sopedakwadookwu, haꞌoo sutakoo poohabe oo-nagakoo tooetoo besow.

Mu numu mu nesootzeꞌma ka mu numu nemooagadu mu-nagakwi manepunne. Ka nanano mu nanesootuhi tuka mu numu nemooagadu suda oeꞌyoona sukwe maneyakwe, gi kaaheno ka nanesootuhi tumayoho, sukwe unu pepewutzena. Umuoo gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, gi powmadu koomeba-waꞌneꞌyoo, sukwe wutzagakwunaꞌe. Umuoo toꞌesabu pasa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo tooe unu yubanoo manekase sapa gi pooe-gaꞌyoo. Umu gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo.
Oona puuwana po-kumaba mu numu tu pupuaꞌamu tuoegoedu tzapokwakute, wegea-kooba tuwow. Ka Peter o-toogoo mea, sumuna o habagana wumase, sumuna besa manekwu mee sokwamana.
Ka sutakoo tamme wohone tooe niwunudu hoa-ma te kwatesangepana, ka oo petuse, oosoo gi how te yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

Gi haga tamme-matu sakwa mee soonammepana, “Soo Te Naa nuka sootuhina gi hee. Nu sakwa tooe how tooe mesoo mane, kukummaꞌanosoo mesoo nabotama.” Oꞌnosoo soo nana Esau mee naneadu meeoo tusooyugwe. Soo Esau uga nasootuhikwu oosoo ka mu suuꞌmu pabeꞌena, pana oosoo tu nasootuhipe sumuoo tukapupedo yugwepu.
Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe wohonena mee unne, “Gi, ka Barabbas tzamaꞌwu.” Unu tutuhadu ka Barabbas mee naneꞌa.
Pana soo Te Naa oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayodase noꞌoko numu moohedu oo mayugwe, yise numu ooonakwa besasoo oo matabue.

Numme mu tuukweꞌe ka toge-kwitu mu nakaꞌoedyukuna, gi tooe hayoo tooe sukwe naꞌunnedu numme mu tuukweꞌe, soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, pudusoo kodyu petukwu yaa teepu-koobasoo. Numme togesapa mu tuukweꞌe numme oꞌno mana giba-maꞌyoona ka oo pooha numme poonne, ka Te Naa Te Pabeꞌe-matoo yadooꞌa. Numme oo naka soo Te Naa meeoo, “E Besaa Dooa yow. Tubetse besa e masoonamme. Oosoo nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, nu unu oo soobedya.”
Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka mu numu suda manakwe gi besa mu nakasoopedyase puusoo tu kwasu makebuese umu yabesoo mu numu-nagatoo memeahoose, papabatse mu yadooese meeoo,
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka namanumudoose ka Te Naa unnepu togesapa mayugweke ka mu Jew numu oꞌnosoo tuukwepu oosoo ka mu Jew numu tummatzikwu.
Tamme ka meeoo unena, “Nu ka Te Naa-matoo ooosapa nanesootuhidu pana tamme ka ooosapa sutakoo unegana tamme tammesoo nanemooꞌaka soo Te Naa gi te sootuhi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Mooasoo nu mu tuukwe soo nuka nagedu nu-kwaꞌnesoo namadugukwu. Ka nuka tu wohone-kwaꞌnesoo, umu mumme wohonekwu. Ka gi nuka mu nakaꞌoedyuku-kwaꞌne, umu gi mumme nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu pudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee netamma, “Mu ka ooosapa o nakaꞌoedyukuna nu mu doodooamu-gakoo.
Ka saaꞌa ka Egypt teepu nanaꞌena-kwitu gi bowꞌmana unu pasana gi hee naꞌa. Mu tubewa-gaꞌyoo unu suda manepunne. Mu te nanamooatupu gi nadukadu mayu.
Ka mu-matu yaa numme-baa petuse mu ka Te Naa tunetammapu-too togesoo mu nanesootuhi meꞌa. Nu besa mu-matoo nakasoonamme.

Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwedu ka gi pummesoo tu nobe-witu manepunnena mabetseana ka tu nanumu-too gi mabetsea umu oo tzapoonne ka gi Te Pabeꞌe-wi tu tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu yise mu numu gi soo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooonakwa sutaꞌyoo.
Menoꞌo yise tamme gi ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona suaꞌe ka oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, tamme yise baa-wi namatzaka.
Umu nu-kwitu sukwe nakadu, “Soo Paul te netumooꞌoodu kadoo te tooꞌe mayugwese, menoꞌo yise mu numu tunakaꞌoedyuku tuungu.”
Mu sakwa Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute oo unnepu meeoo. ‘Gi haga tameme-matu namaꞌehookwu, gi tuwazoo yaꞌekwu.’ Mu sakwa menoꞌo tuka esoo puma mu gwetzoikwuna.”
Mu wakwaꞌetse tuukwena umu sakwa besaꞌyookuna, besa tutusooyugwena, gi pumme neꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Te Naa-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu, noꞌoko numu soobesaꞌyookuna ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe.
Mu gi ooosapa besa tusooyugwedu soo Te Naa ooonneꞌyoopana mu nakasootuhi. Menoꞌo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu tooe hanotu tooe meeꞌe netamma, ‘Mu sakwa suda mu tumaduguna maꞌwu.
Mu watsukweꞌyoo momokoꞌne ka Te Pabeꞌe natzakwene tzageꞌe konno, oo pea, oo pedoo-no, Mary mee naneadu Clopas nodukwa, yise Mary Magdalene. Nu, John, punnoꞌo osoo wunupunne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko soo hemma matzooekupu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa madumotseapu, oosoo suuꞌmu tu nanumu magwetzoi.
Ka gisoo umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda tumatuguhoose, ka ooonnekoo oo tuka ka mu-baaꞌyoona, mu sakwa gi ooonnekoo tuka.
Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu besa u tummatzikoo ka David e tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.’ Ka kummaꞌakoosoo David hoobea tubo-kwi tuwazoo meeoo, ‘U gi ka u tunetutzeana tookoo peheku-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
Ka e namayodase, mu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu ka E Naatu, mu punnoꞌo nugatuna, nu mummetu.
Tamme ka Te Naa doodooamuna oo nakaꞌoedyukute, yise oo nakabetseꞌa ka tamme oo tuukwena.
Mu ka gi nuka nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu ka togesoo sutaꞌyoo numuna, tuikwu.”
Soo mogoꞌne ka umu Te Naa dooamu goena mu puupe-ma bayaꞌe. (Nu ka oo poonnese gi oo nakasopedakwatoo).
Mu mooasoo ka Esau-witu naka, ka saaꞌa oosoo Te Naa pumme sootuhina tooꞌe nekwaꞌe. Yagana tooꞌe nanesootuhaꞌe pana soo Te Naa gi oo nakasootuhaꞌe.
Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ewaꞌyoo numu nanatuukwe. Susumudu umu-matu meeoo, “Soo Jesus besaꞌyoo nana,” pana susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Soo Jesus numu nemooagadu.”
Ka ooka mu waha Te Naa mu sootuhi. Ewaꞌyoo wakwawaꞌa mu nakana oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.

Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo ka toge ne manakwe. Soo Te Naa ne netutzea mee ne netamma “Mu numu tuukwe ka besa naꞌunnedu.” Ooonneꞌyoona numme ka Te Naa numme netamma-waꞌnesoo manakwe ka Te Naa unnepu-waꞌnesoo ka mu yadooena; gi ka numu petzabe-waꞌne.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooonneꞌyoona tamme mane-kwitoo nabatsapu. Oo te magwetzoi tabuapu. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka Tu Besaa Tooa tamme-koobatoo oo nemawunipu.
Mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo gi nananumu-gaꞌyoo, “Soo Te Naa ne mabetseakwu,” mee sokwama. Ooosapa Te Naa-tamme nanesootuhinoꞌo. Umu ooonneꞌyoo sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.
Soo numu tummatzidu sakwa meeoo soonamme, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka numu tummatziwabena.” Pana ka pumme tu tzamaꞌwuse, oosoo sakwa puusoo manega.

Soo Te Naa mu tuukwe ka besa tu unnena ka mu sootuhina ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsa-koobatoo, gi ka hemma how mu yugwe-koobatoo. Mu yise ka besa naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu gi besa soonamme ka menoꞌo mu ka atasoo naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukuna, besa naꞌunnedu mee mu oo nemadabuena.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa doodooamuna nananemabetseana gi sakwa tamme nanahapana. Umu Te Naa tubetse doodooamu suuꞌmu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugakwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Ka puma mu tuukwina ka sake tumadinakwatoo tzakweku, mu tuhanehookwu.” Numme yise oo manise, ka tuukwinoo tzamapana, ka ewow pakwe oekoo.
Mu oo meesoo sopedakwadoo ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe besa unnena gi mayohodu. Oo tsasoopedya oosoo ka tumaꞌemukwase nasookwikwu.

E nanumu, tamme ka mu numu manena nagena, tamme gi besa manekwu, tamme ka gi ooosapa yaa teepu-kooba momokwuse, ka kadooꞌoo namayugwekwuse. Pana tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nagemona, tamme atasoo manese tamme ka Te Naa poonnekwu.

Gi ka nasooꞌawunudu paba sooyugwepana, mu sakwa ka tukapu pumme numu nakugwetzoinnummena paba sooyugwe. Soo Te Naa nuka pooha-maka. Nu ookow tukapu puma mu nakugwetzoinnummena mu sootuhikwu.” Umu numu ewana yise oo tubenga, “Hownnekoo yise numme ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu?”
Tamme yise ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhise, oosoo gi ooka te geana, tamme ka tammesoo sutakoo natoogoo hemma sookwina.
Ooosapa tamme sakwa nanesootuhi ka Te Naa-matoo, mee unnena, “U besakoo ne sootuhipu ka Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo. U tubetse besaꞌyoo.”

Mu Jew numu numu nemooagadu meeoo, “Tamme Te Naa doodooamu togesapa tamme ka Abraham-maꞌyoona tsuagetu. Numme ookow Te Naa tunetammakuna nagedu.” Ooonneꞌyoopana umu gi. Oꞌnosoo ka Abraham-witu meeoo natubotugupu, “Soo Te Naa meeoo, ‘Abraham besaꞌyoo,’ soo Abraham ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
Noꞌyoona umu oo doodooamu ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko Te Naa pooha-toohakwi manemo. Ooonneꞌyoona gi togaba-gaꞌyoo.
Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona oo nakabetsea gi ka sutakoo nakabetseꞌa. Tamme ka gi Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu.
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Jew numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyuku manepetuse, umuoo ka a tuna-masoo punowsoo nadotsanakwu. Soo Te Naa ookow pooha-gaꞌyoo punowsoo mu nadotsanana.
Umuoo numu gi hannano esagoedu, ka suda tu tumatuguna mooasoo nematzagakwunipu.

Nu yise meeoo unnekwu nu ka Jesus podo meꞌa, kummasoo nanesootuhidu mee umu e netamma, pana nu gi ooohoo. Nu togesoo Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka te nanamooatupu nanesootuhiputoo meꞌa. Yise nu noꞌoko ne tumayohope tumayohoku meꞌa, ka oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa-witu nabotugutoo.
Tamme sakwa gi ooosapa numu hemma nakutzikupana. Ooosapa besa numu soobedyanumme. Tamme ka numu soobedyana, tamme noꞌoko ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseꞌa.

Ka e pooha tuusoobedya-toohakwi ka umu sumu mano waha matsebooekudu (12) nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo nanatzakwona-gaꞌyoo Jew numu-ma nananeadu. Mu nananesootuhidu pukwi nobeduguna oo naꞌoonakwi tupe nakooduadoo sumu mano waha matsebooekudu (12).
Soo Te Pabeꞌe nanasootuhi namadabuepunne tamme-koobatoo oosoo ka puu gi nasootuhipuna. Oo oosoo nabotugu, “Soo numu puu ka sunngabe-ma natzakwenese, ka yaꞌese gi nasootuhikwu.”

Mu mooasoo ka oꞌnosoo e sopedakwadoo. Nu ka mu Jew numu tumayohopu nagedu, mu Jew numu nu-noꞌosoo tomopu ooonakwa, nu unu tumayoho. Nu ka mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu kusedyana, kadooꞌoo mu tooꞌe mayugwena.
Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka sutakoo panetogogwa wutuma ka ooosapa umu mooe namanumudoopu numu nemooagapu oo-ma tzakatuse oo tzagunahoo ewa (1OOO) tomoba-witoo.
Oona Samaria-wi sumuꞌyoo tupoohadu nana nobe-gaꞌyoo, Simon mee naneadu. “Nu besow pooha-gaꞌyoo,” mee mu nemooagana.

Oosoo tubetse besaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu-nagatu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nasootuhina. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda. Nu besa soonammekwu ka mu numu wohoꞌne, tooe nuga mu batsase sapa, umu puu ka Te Pabeꞌe wohoneke.
U ka numu moohedu manekwuse, oetu mooe soohanenummese, oꞌno u ka u mi-ma oo-ma matuguse oo nanesootuhikukwu. Ka numu suda manakwe gi umu-ma tzabepana. Ooosapa besa tumatuguno.
U sakwa mu pepeawabe tuwazoo tuukweꞌe, umuoo sakwa punnoꞌo ooosapa nanesootuhi, ooosapa besa tumatuguna, gi tunesootzepana, gi baagoepana, ka hemma besow numu tunedyooe.
Soo nana ka tu padu tzakoomadoona besaꞌyoo pana soo nana gi ka tu padu tzakoomadookuna unusoo besaꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa gi tammesoo nanemooagapana. Tamme sakwa gi Te Naa unnepu sukwe nakapunnepana, tamme sakwa oo mayohotooe.

Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobakwi numu tunedyooennumme. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwitoo gi meꞌa, mu Jew moohedu oonatuoo pumme nehooawi, pumme mu nepatza.

Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohaꞌyoona tamme Te Naa doodooamu manepu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te magwetzoipuna, besa te matabuepu. Ka ꞌyoo manepunnena tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi sokwama tabuꞌapuna.
Ka baa pukwi mu tabatzaganoo-wi tuoonahoose, numme pumme nakatzimodu ne tabatzagakute, ne kuku mabasakute.
Nu uga umu Te Pabeꞌe podo meadu tumooꞌoo. Nu yise mu naana noko momokoꞌne umu-nagatu wutumetayakwe, susumudu nu goꞌe.
Mu numu yise nanapokihoo nanaꞌatasoo tusooyugwegonnona.
Soo suda numu tumatuguna numu-matoosoo kodyukwu numu goedu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka gi Te Naa unnepu mayohona.
Umu ooosapa ka pumme tumatzidu wumooꞌaga ka umu mu natumanagaku-kwi. Umu mu tumatziwabe ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi. Soo Te Naa unu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, mu nanekwegeakwu.
Tamme sakwa ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase, tamme sakwa gi numu nemooagapana, gi tuwazoo besa nasooyugwena, kukummaꞌakoosoo numu nasoodyagena, yise gi nananesootzemapana.
Mu e tubenga, “Soo tu kooma yaꞌekupu haaꞌa sakwa koomadoosoo?” meeꞌe. Soo mogoꞌne sakwa ooosapa tu kooma-baa nobe-ga oo yaꞌe-witoo tooe. Oꞌno yise oosoo kummaꞌakoosoo koomadookwu tunakaꞌoedyukudu.
Umu puu Te Naa tubetse po-wiꞌyoona mukwakapu ka mu numu esayaekuna, “Soo numu ka yaꞌese, gi yotse-waꞌneꞌyoo,” mee mu numu nemooaga. Susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu, ka Te Naa po oemota neyugwe.
Tamme yise ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus doodooamu manese, soo numu Jew numu manina, gi hee. Tamme yise Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna suuꞌmu nasootuhikwu, yise nanasoobedyakwu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka noꞌoko Te Naa pooha tunetammapu mamakwuse, oꞌno yise saaꞌa oosoo noꞌoko numu pumme nakabetseadu magwetzoikwu.

Ka pukwi mu tutummatzipu-matu mu tumasumudoopu-witu sakwa nu mu tuukwe. Nu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tutuha manedu Jerusalem-witu mu tummatzikwuna sookwaꞌe. Mu sakwa tumasumudoo mana mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Galatia mee naneadu-kwitu yoo mane tuungu. Mu sakwa punnoꞌo ooosoo.
Momokoꞌne sakwa pummesoo koomamu nakabetsea Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kumaba manepunnedu mee netamma, “Nu ka teepu-koobatu kootabedooakute, oꞌno mu numu ka Te Naa besa po poonnena oo nagenokwu. Mu numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi togaba-wiꞌyookwu.”
Mu sakwa gi oo soomuꞌwapana ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yadooawabe tamme tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo oo unnepu.
Gi soo Te Naa tamme-makoo hemma soogwaꞌe ka puu te matabuepu-gana te songapu makase, tamme oo-ma yutsungamoꞌo te sootuhaꞌe ka hemma te soogwaꞌe.
Esoo Te Naa besa yadooapu toge kaahenotu ka Tu Penebe Besa Tuooaꞌa-witu. Mu numu puu ka tu nanumu haꞌyoo unakwe oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa unnepu ka sukwe numu unnepu, ooonnekoo toge kaahenoꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo. gi sakwa suda tusooyugwepana, ka te tookoo soogwi-kwaꞌne. Tooꞌe tamme oo suda tusooyugwepana gi sakwa tamme oo-toogoo manepana.

Soo numu pukwi nogadu-kwi Jericho mee naneadu unu natzooedu oo naꞌooonakwi tupe koodea-gaꞌyoo. Mu Jew numu ka Te Naa oedyukute oosoo ka Jericho-witu mu numu matzooekuna. Soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu natakwatsukwu (7) tabeba-witoo ka Jericho-naꞌooonakwi sogomea tuungu, soo tupe koodea yise puuwana-tamme yoomedihoo, umu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Soo Te Naa yise ka Paul ewow Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma sootuhise oosoo yise ewahoo numu mabesaku.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Soo tooe haga tooe nanasuda tu manena mayohodu ka sutakoo nakabetsea.
E nanumu tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedyana, ka Te Naa puu tubetse unu tamme soobedya.
Nu ka umetuna. U e magwetzoikwusesoo. Nu yise u-baaꞌyoona tubetse besa soonammekwu,’ mee soo David tubo.
Ooosapa ka mu numu Te Naa unnepu-witu tunedyooeno, e petunoꞌotoo tooe.
Tooe hano tooe numme suda namatugupu, gi numme oo namatzooekute, gi too nasootooke.
Umu-matu meeoo unakwe, “Umu tookwa baakoꞌe.”
Besa tabuana gi totsa-ga-kwaꞌne tabuapunne.

mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa pukwi manepunne-kwiꞌyoona kuꞌahooke. Umu ka numu nanasuda manepu umu-matoosoo makodyukukwudu. Umu besa toha namasooana oa tupe namadabue-ma tu ama wupaka.
Ka mu numu tamme wohoꞌne, tamme sakwa mu nanesootuhiku, besow umutoo nekwi.
Oosoo oo kuku unu nadanatzooe tatabuana, weehepu nakooꞌatsawayaꞌneku-kwaꞌne. Oosoo besow ohobu tuapa-gana.
Nu u-kwitu besa mu tuukwepu, yise ooosapa u-kwitu mu tuukwennummekwu. Nu ooosapa umu-noꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise umu besa nanasoobedyakwu nuka u soobedya-kwaꞌne.”
Soo Te Naa puu gi ka tu tooa tamme-makoo netumooꞌe. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo oosoo noꞌokosoo hemma te sukwe sootuhaꞌe ka tu tooa tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.

Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe petukwuna oe manakwe mu numu mu-maꞌyoo nanekoekwu ka Te Naa besa manakwe. Umu ka Te Naa gi nakabetseana. Ka suda tu manena manoyugwena, umuoo numu nemooagadu nanaꞌemota numu yugwe. Umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna umu gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhikwu.
Mu sakwa gi naanaꞌunnepana mu ka mu Jew numu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo. Yoo manepunne, soo wuyupe tubetse tuna puu ka a maꞌna ooonnakwasoo natzooꞌe. Tuna oosoo ka a maꞌna paꞌa tsuipunne.
Gi numme mu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo mee nasooꞌyugwena, numme mu soonoyugwepunnena. Numme mu netummatzina mu besa sokwamakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Soo nana Lazarus mee naneadu ka oona Bethany mee naneadu-kwi nobe-gaꞌyoo unu tuoeyaꞌe. Lazarus ka umu tu susuakwumu Mary
Mu ka Te Naa unnena gi nakabetseana; mu Te Naa unnepu ooowemota manakwe gi esoo sukwe numu unnena. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhi.

Nu mu tuukwekwu, haꞌoo tamme oo sopedakwadookwu, hownnekoo poohabe-toohakwi oosoo numu tunedyooe. Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi unnekwu, mee soo Jesus o kaaheno Te Pabeꞌe, oosoo togesapa naꞌunnedu ka yaa teepu-kooba tamme-baa numu petuse tamme-waꞌneꞌyookwu.

Umu numu nemooagadu sutakoo pooha nosepu-gaꞌyoo ka nanapootamana tooe how tooe nanasoonahadyugwe, yise gi mu numu moohedu nakabetseꞌa. Umuoo tuwazoo ka umu Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-gakoo nanasuda mu netamma.
Tamme sakwa kaaheno meadabe, yise ka suda te maꞌnawena tzadyooiku. Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanano tuunoyugwe.

Mooasoo noꞌobatusoo numu ka teepu-koobatu ka Te Naa unnepu naka, mu punnoꞌo. Soo Te Naa besa unnepu mee, “Soo Te Naa saaꞌa te sootuhikwu.” Ekow besa naꞌunnedu Nu, Paul, mana tooe hano tooe numu-too tuukwenummekwu.
Umu yise tupe tzobakooha oo tatzagowkwu mee soogwamana. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu manikwuna sopedakwadoo ka umu-baaꞌyoona yise ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona watse meahoo.
Umu Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa manakwana gi ni-waꞌneꞌyoo ka ooosapa Te Naa nakabetseana ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe ka mu numu pumme wohoꞌne sapa.”
Soo Te Naa oo matusootabuesoo.

Nu yow ka mu mabetseakwuse, nu gi mu namanayahakwuna sookwaꞌe, nu ka mu-koobatoo nabatsakwuse, umu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu yise nu-noꞌyookwu. Soo E Naa besa e sooyugwe, nu ka oo tunetammapu mayohona mu numu magwetzoina, umu-koobatoo tuwazoo nabatsakwuse. Mu numu e batsakwu ka meeoo e soonamme, pana nu gi meeoo tusooyugwe. Nu pooha tumadaꞌe, yise nu mesoo gwetzoaꞌekwusoo, soo E Naa ka ꞌyoo e mane tuunguna. Nanakukummaꞌayoosoo numu saaꞌa e nakaꞌoedyukudooa. Nu yise sumusoo mu mayugwe petuse, mu mabetseana, mu-kooba tueyaꞌedooa. Soo seepu takonedu gi mu seepu toge soobedya, ka puu gi mu hee-gana. Oꞌno yise ka etzaꞌa mu seepu-baa petuse, soo mu takonedu sukwe meahoo, oosoo ka gi mu seepu hee-soobedyana. Soo etzaꞌa mu seepu-matu goehookwu, mu susumudu yise nanaꞌemota petukwowkwu.”
Mu mooasoo e sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa e sootuhipu, ka Te Naa pudu tunetammapu mu-toogoo besaꞌhoo mumme e tunedyooe tuunguna.
Ka mu numu nanahaꞌa, tooe huu tooe mu netammapunnese gi umu-no ooosapa nahawunupana, mu tsasobedya.
Mu Jew numu ka oo nakase ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu-witu, nanano sukwe nanepetukute.
Tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuse soo Te Naa oo tubetse togeꞌyookute.

E pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nakabetsea, oꞌno oosoo ka kodyu petuse saaꞌa te besaꞌyookudooa. Tamme gi ka te mane-ma nasookwidooa. Tamme ka tunakabetseana, tamme besa nanano nanapuaꞌakwu. Tamme yoo manekwu ka pudu teepu-kooba nobe-gakwuse, ka oo paꞌanakwatu nokosoo oo pudu namadabuekwuse.
Mu sakwa ooosapa ne nanesootuhiku numme ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu tuukwena, ewaꞌyoo oo nakase oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, yise mu-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu.
Numme oo nakaꞌoedyukute soo Te Naa te yaꞌe-kwikoo te mayodakwu, oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yugwese. Tamme yise ooosapa oo-baayookwu.
Sumuꞌyoo tamme-nagatu ka tuoeyise, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu sakwa oosoo nekwi. Ka oo-baa petuse, ka yoohoo oo-ma oo tsematzuase nanesootuhiku.
Soo Moses ka nana manese yise pummesoo nanumu-baa nobenega.
“Yaa esoo nana, Paul mee naneadu, mu Jew numu mamatzakaduse, a tooꞌe batsowkwu. Nu ka a Roman numu a sopedakwadoose numme umu tukwutumudu-no a magwetzoi.

Pudusoo numu noꞌoko ka ootuoo nakase, umu-baa manekakwu. Umu waahoo ka Paul pupuaꞌamu-ma tzakatu Gaius noko Aristarchus mee nananeadu ka Paul-no Macedonia-wiꞌyoona kekemmadu, yise pabow pukwikoo mu tunehaneyi-kwitoo mu bihooka.
Soo Te Naa tamme-waꞌnesoo mu matabuepu, mu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona nanasusuꞌmu oetu mooe soohanese, ka pooha nadukadu tuka.

Ooonneꞌyoona e nanesootuhi nanumu, tamme sakwa gi wahadame tusooyugwepana; ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuno, ooosapa oo nakabetseanona, besa oo tumayohokuna. Tamme ka pudu numu tamme oo mayugwekese. Oꞌno tamme nasootuhikwu.
Mu sakwa ooosapa nu-no Te Pabeꞌe nageno.

Soo Te Naa tooe gi mu sokwama tumapuꞌa sapa, puusoo soo Te Naa nakwitu mu tunedyooe. Oosoo Te Naa numu magwetzoi umu besa ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu pumme tu tuukweꞌe, tooe susumudu numu gi hemma heesoobedya mee mu unakwe sapa.
Mu momokoꞌne koomamu-gaꞌyoo sakwa tu koomamu nakabetsea. Tooe gi ka mu koomamu tunakaꞌoedyukute sapa, umu-matoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu, ka mumme momokoꞌne ooonnekoo, tooe gi hayoo mu unakwe sapa.
Numme yise ka Te Naa yadooawabe manepunnedu, mu numu tuukwedu ka Te Naa umu sootuhipu. Numme meeoo, “Mu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku,
Oo tunetamma-kwaꞌne, gi tubetse yaꞌe saaꞌa petudooasoo.
Umu suda ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma pu-matoo te nanesootuhina. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoo tamme-nakwana.
Pana eka nuga pumme bamakana gi puudyaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo eka baa, nuga pumme bamagana nanagatoo hebese, oosoo patzona-waꞌne gi pasa-waꞌneꞌyoo, numu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu.”

Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana soo Te Naa tookwa oo besaꞌyookute. Soo tooe haga tooe mee unnedu, “Nu Te Naa tooaꞌa,” oosoo sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo meano, ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo. Oꞌno yise oosoo puusoo nasopedakwadoo ka Te Naa Tooaꞌana.
Mu pihoo tsotsoapa pamogo-kwaꞌne tatabuedu nu poonne. Sumuꞌyoo ka sutakoo panetogogwa tupiꞌyoona, sumuꞌyoo ka nunuꞌu tupiꞌyoona, soo sumuꞌyoo yise punnoꞌo ka esayaꞌedu yadooawabe tupiꞌyoona kemma.

Soo Te Naa tubetse unnepu oo tubotuguna tamme oo nagetuguna mee naꞌunakwe, “Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona numu soobedya ka tammesoo te tookoo soobedya-waꞌnesoo.” Ookow sakwa tamme nakabetsea oꞌno tamme besa manekwu.
Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu suuꞌmu, numu tunedyooꞌe gi numme nummesoo tusooyugwena. Ka Te Pabeꞌe numme nakabetseꞌa, ka mu tummatzina.
Gi umuoo mumme nemooagadu-ma nakaꞌemukwapana. Umu ka Te Naa besa po-makoo mu takohonedu. Esoo togesapa naꞌunnedu, “Tamme ka sutakoo numu napuaꞌana, tamme punnoꞌo oo-waꞌnesoo manepetugakwu.”

Nu mu nemayuwunu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi mee unnena, “U, Ne Naa ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo. U ne magwetzoaꞌe u ka nanasookwugina. U ka besa u unnepu ne tuukwe oosoo ooosapa togesapa naꞌunnedu soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. U ka Ne Pabeꞌe yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayodase, yise tamme-kooba oo tueyaꞌe tuungu. U mu sokwamana atasoo mu mayugwekuse, besakoosoo, oꞌno umu u nakabetseakwu. Oꞌno mu ka umu mumme netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi.”

Ka tooe how tooe hemma manegena, ka Te Naa besa podo ooosapa meadabe oꞌno mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe besakoosoo nesootuhikwu. Nu ka how mu-baa petugase, tooetoo mu-witu sukwe nakana, oꞌno nu oo sopedakwatoo mu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo mea, nananeꞌoedyukuna, nanatummatzina, oꞌno mu kukummaꞌyoosoo Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhi mea-kwitoo nesawekukwu.
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda, tamme tuwazoo ooosoo sootunagakwu.
U sakwa u pooha nakabetsea. Soo Te Naa ookow u poohamaka, ka u-ma e matuguse.
Noꞌyoona numu natuukwe Te Pabeꞌe-witu, umu tuipu moogooa punnoꞌo. Oꞌno yise umu tooe mooasoo tuise sapa, umu sumuna saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa mesoo nobe-gakwu ka tu moogooa menoꞌo ooka nakabetsease.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku mane, ka noꞌoko tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsase. Mu sakwa gi sukwe numusoo nakabetseapana.
Mu sakwa gi Te Naa nesootzemapana umu-matu-waꞌne. Umu puu tuoegoese, tuꞌi.

Tooe numme gi maawaꞌneꞌyoopana Te Pabeꞌe-witu wahammoꞌo. Soo Te Naa meeoo ne netamma, “Mu numu tuukwe ka Mu Pabeꞌe-witu.” Numme toge-kwitu ka Te Naa-witu wahakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha tooha-kwi. Pana numme mu numu tuukweꞌe Te Pabeꞌe-witu gi oe natumunagakupana.
Tamme sakwa ka unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzi, oꞌno umu punnoꞌo unu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Gi sakwa tamme tammesoo tusooyugwe-kwaꞌne manepana.
Nu tuwazoo meeoo tusooyukwe nu pudusoo mu-baa petukakwu.

Yise e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi mu watsukweꞌyoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tutummatzidu, ka teepu-kooba ka watsubatu pedyoomaba punowsoo tsipunne. Oꞌno soo pedyoomaba gi ka teepu-koobatu noko ka baa-witu suda yugwekwu.

Mooasoo tamme ka oꞌnosoo suda manakwe, umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-waꞌne. Tamme uga ka suda te tumatuguna nakabetseana tooe how tooe suda manena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu-no nabootamana, baagoena, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina, tooe oo sopedakwadoopana oosoo gi besa namanedu.

Soo tooe haga tooe ka gi mu nakabetsabedu ka mu sootumooꞌoodu gi hownnekoo mu manayaha-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Umu wahaꞌyoo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha punagakoo mu pooha yadooana umu wohonepu puusoo ka suda mu tumatuguna mu-matoosoo makodyukute.
Soo Paul mu nekwegea, “Oosoo haaꞌa numu-kooba manepunnedu? Meeoo ooetuooo nabotuku, ‘Gi ka mumme moohedu suda netammapana.’ “
Mu gi toge manedu nu tzasobedyakwu gi nu mu sootuhikwu. Nu ka nanaꞌesagoena, nanasuda tumaduguna, kummaꞌakoosoo-matoo nanesootuhina, numu goena, nanapoohana, umuoo yise gi nasootuhikwu.”

Susumudu mu-nagatu ka gi togekoo numu-ma nakatzape. Umuoo numu nemooagadu Balaam-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ka oꞌnosoo puu soo numu nemooagadu Balaam mee naneadu ka Balak numu nemooaga tuungu. Soo Balak yise meeoo pumme nanumu netamma, “Mu Te Naa besa dooamu nemooagana gi totogekoo-matoo mu nanesootuhi tuungu.”
U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Besa numme ka mu nanesootuhikuna, mu unusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukuna yise besa nasootuhikwu tuwazoo unusoo nanasoobedyakwu.
Mu ka oꞌnosoo gisoo hemma nakasopedakwadoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, mu sutakoo gi toogoope-gakoo mu nanesootuhidu mumme meeoo mu neyukwe mu oo-toogoo manena ka sutakoo nanesootuhaꞌe.

Mu nanana sakwa ka tu nonodukawamu besa soobedya ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu unu soobedya-kwaꞌne. Oosoo unu te soobedyana tamme-koobatoo nabatsa, Oꞌno soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu. Besa tu nayadooa-ma ka baa-wi te matzakase, tamme gi totsabu ka manekwu.
Tooe tamme suda mu matugu sapa, tamme sakwa besa mu matugu.
Ooonneꞌyoona tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu te nemadabuekwu. Ka gi numu ooonakwa besa te nasooyugwe, oosoo Te Naa ka saaꞌa meeoo mesoo unakwe, “Mu besaꞌyoo,” mee.
Soo Te Naa powmaba taya ewatseꞌyoo yise soo tukapu naa, tamme yise nasootuhi,” meeꞌe.
Mu pepeawabe ka mu nanesootuhidu tummatziwabe sakwa punnoꞌo besaꞌyoo. Umu sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, gi etzaga haꞌyoo tooe naneyugwepana, ooosapa kaaheno besa tumatuguna oꞌno besaꞌyoo.
Huutooe nu ka mogoꞌne tooꞌe neta, pana soo mogoꞌne gi oo maꞌwu.

Ka saaꞌa mu numu sutakute ka Tyre noko Sidon-witu. Umu ka Herod pumme sakwaꞌekuna gi petzabebena ka Herod tubewabe-witu tu tukapu hanena. Umu-matoo mease, ka Herod tummatzidu Blastus mee naneadu oo puaꞌadoo. Soo Blastus yise ka Herod noko mu tunehanekwuna nemadabue. Soo Herod yise tu besa kwasu-wi namahanena mu tunehane-wi petuooga. Ka mu numu-kobena katuse, mu numu yadooꞌe. Mu numu besa oo sooyugwena meeoo oo netamma, “U, Ne Naa God-waꞌne.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Nu gi tumaꞌemukwadu. Nu ka E Naa togeꞌyooku pana mu gi e togeꞌyookute, ooonneꞌyoona mu suda nu-kwitu waha.
Unu hukwa petuse, soo baa unu bayutsungakooha.
Soo suda namanedu yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona gi hee, soo Te Naa ka saaꞌa besa masoo te sootuhikwu, mee nu.

Mu Te Naa doodooamu nu mu-matoo tuboꞌo soo mu tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwapu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu-koobatoo nabatsapuna. Ooonneꞌyoona yise mu menoꞌo Te Naa besa doodooamu. Mumme nanamooatupu nu tuwazoo mu tuukwekwu mu ka Te Naa tamme Manumudoopu sopedakwatoona. Mumme yise pudu numu nu tuukwekwu mu ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana, mu ka sutakoo matzooekute.
Tooe gi te besow sapa soo Te Naa te magwetzoipu. Oosoo te tutzeapu gisoo ka teepu matabuena. Oosoo meeoo te netamma, “Nuga besa podo mea.”

Mu Jew numu moohedu ka pumme nakatzimodu-no oo poonnese, ewa unnekooha, “A tzakwenne, sunngaba namadabue-ma a taposa.” Soo Pilate meehoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa a tzakakase, a tzakwenne. Nu meeoo esoo gi suda tumatuku.”

Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe oo botugu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsakwuna, yise oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo namayodakwuna. Umu ka ekow naꞌunnedu-kwitu soohanena, “Hannanoꞌogina ꞌyoo namanekwu, hagagina?” mee sokwama, mu Te Naa tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha ka yadooawabe tuukweꞌe soo mu tubotuguna gi umutusoo, oosoo tammetu. Umu te tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa besa unnepu soo Te Naa yise tutuha te soobedyana te magwetzoi.

Ewaꞌyoona mu numu tunedyooedu numu nemooagadu ka eka teepu-koobakwi maꞌnaꞌwedu gi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe numu manese yaa teepu-koobatoo nataya. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe nekwohonena

Ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma numme tunekwuꞌu. Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-kooba tamme-waꞌnesoo nadooaꞌadoopu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha oo tzapoonne oosoo Te Naa Besa Tooaꞌa. Oobe paꞌatoo tamme-koobatoosoo ka Te Naa-baatoo oosoo kodyuka. Noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nawahana nakakoo. Yise tooe hano tooe susumudu numu oe tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Yise paꞌanakwana papabatse-ma hakwotukwakooha. Mu papabatseꞌyoo hakwotukwadu ka mu numu-koobatoo sawehoo umu numu yise Te Naa oetu tuꞌaganena suda oo netamma pana umu gi ka nanasuda tumanena maꞌwu.
tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona tamme saaꞌa ka pudu teepu-kooba manepunnehoose noꞌyoona hee ka teepu-koobatu yise o paꞌanakwatu pudu namapudupudookwu. Onona noꞌyoona numu kaaheno manese, pudu meadabekwu.

Numme ooosapa Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikute mee yise numme unneyakwe, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Besakoo u ka mu Thessalonica-witu numu sootuhipu-gaꞌyoo. Umu yise besa manakwe.” Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhaꞌe tuwazoo. Wunaꞌme umu oo sopedakwatoo ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe petukwuse pumme mu sootuhikwuse.
Sumuꞌyoo yise nana atsakwadyadu pookoo-kooba katudu nu-kobena tabuahoobetu, osoo oogow pooha punnoꞌo. Esoo punnoꞌo tsegesa kwuꞌu, oꞌno mu numu yaa teepu-kooba nanagoekooha.
Noꞌyoona mu numu ka hemma how yugwena sakwa ka meeoo pumme nedyawedu nakabetsea tooe nawangaꞌa-waꞌne manepunnepana.
Pana sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne
Meeoo tuwazoo ka oꞌnosoo naboꞌo soo Te Naa ka Abraham besa netamma, “Saaꞌa nu noꞌobatusoo numu sootuhikwu umu ka u-kwaꞌnesoo tusooyugwena ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukute tuwazoo.”

Tooe tamme ka susumudu unu nanasutatoo meapana gi nasootookepana meeoo soo Te Naa te tunedyooe. Tamme sakwa ooosapa sutatoo meadabe, oꞌno soo Te Naa tu doodooamu-waꞌnesoo te matugu. Tamme sakwa oo soomayu ka a nabotuguna, tamme oo netammapu, “Mu sakwa oo nakatugupunne ka Te Naa mumme tunedyooe. Mu sakwa gi nasootookepana ka mumme oo tunedyooꞌe. Soo Te Naa ka mu soobedyana, mu tunedyooe. Oosoo numu puu ka pummesoo dooamu ka suda mu manakwe mu nenanawaꞌe.” Yooonnekoo soo Te Naa te tzapoonnekute tamme ka oogow doodooamuna.

Tamme sakwa ooosapa mu tamme nanesootuhi moohedu nakabetsea. Ka Te Naa tamme-kooba umu tuꞌeyaꞌe tuungu oosoo ka how besa umu e nakabetsea meeꞌe mu sooyugwena meeoo mu netamma. Tamme ka mu nakabetseana, umu etzaga te tummatzina, umu besa sokwama. Pana tamme ka gi mu nakabetseana, umu te moohedu suda sokwamana, gi hownnekoo te tummatzidooa.
Oosoosoo tuwow (7) natakwatsukwuoo-baatoo numu kadoo mayukwe ka Canaan mee naneadu teepu-kooba yise ka te nanamooꞌatupu ookow teepu mu tzapokaku.
Umu atasoo numu tunedyooedu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa unnepu nagedu,
Ka mu numu nemooagadu mu-baa petuse gi mu nabaaꞌyookupana ka nanesootuhina gi mu nanesootuhi tuungupana. Gi tuwazoo mu tunemabetsabekupana.

Tooe mu numu suda te matuguse sapa, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ka Te Naa tamme sootuhaꞌe, soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo te sootuhaꞌe, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu mesoo netummatzi.

Soo suda mu manepu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu umu ka sutakoo podo meadabena ka oꞌnosoo ka te namooatupu Cain mee naneadu-kwaꞌne. Soo Cain puu tu wanngaꞌa batsapu oosoo nuusoogweda ka Te Naa ooosapa oo tumatugukute. Ooonekoo soo soo Te Naa besa oo nenaka. Umu numu nemooagadu unu moogoobu ka tooe nanesootuhipana Balaam mee naneadu-kwaꞌnesoo. Soo Balaam ewow numu-nakwana tu natumanakakuookwuna ooosapa soogwipunnedu ka numu tooꞌe poohana. Soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Ka oꞌnosoo te nanamooatupu Korah mee naneadu, tu pupuaꞌmu-no kadoo namayugwepu. Ka Moses mu nekwohone petuse, soo te teepu yise wunabese-ma kadoo mu maꞌe.

Pana umuoo sutaꞌyoo nanana suda apegea ka gi hemma nakasopedakwadoona. Umu puusoo kadoo namayugwe ka suda apegeana gi hemma sopedakwadoopana. Umu kadoo namayugwe ka sutakoo nakabetseana umu ka oo sopedakwadoona, gi oetu soohanepana tooe how tooe manakwe.

Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa meeoo tusooyugwe, “Nu saaꞌa ka teepu batatzopakudooa.” Soo Te Naa yise ka nana Noah mee naneadu pabatsekoo sake matabue tuungu. Tooe soo Noah gi hannanoꞌo ka teepu batatzopana poonnedupana, oosoo ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna, ka pumme oo sakedoo tuunguna matabue. Mu Noah nanodukwa, pihoo tu doodooamu, yise pihoo tu kunoopeamu-no noꞌyoona ka sake-wikoo namagwetzoipu. Noꞌyoona mu numu ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona badatuꞌihoo ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu Noah-maꞌyoona suaketu suuꞌmu nasootuhi.
Ka Poohabe Pu-kwiꞌyoona mee naneadu mu nanesootuhidu moohedu suuꞌmu nonotsa tabeno meꞌayakwe.
Soo Stephen mee tuwazoo unakwe, “Mu yaatoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi tumayohodu. Mu nonoꞌotsa Te Naa Besa Pooha netumooꞌoo.

Tamme sakwa oo nakasopedakwadoo ka mu Jew numu tumayohona ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu too sutaꞌyoo, umu tooꞌe natunedyooena gi ka mooasoo besaꞌyoo numu-doo. Mu ooonneꞌyoo sutaꞌyoo numu: Ka Te Naa-witu suda nanatuukwedu, tu naanapuaꞌamu mesoo goena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu mesoo goena.
Oꞌnosoo nu mu-matoo tubopu, mu numu suda tusooyugwedu gi napuaꞌapana,
Oꞌno nu gisoo oo sopedakwatoona nu ka gisoo nadooaꞌadoona soo Te Naa e tuutzeapu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu mee e soopedyana, oosoo ka e sootuhikwuse. Oosoo yise e sootuhi.
Nu nanesootuhibu soogwipana ka sutakoo nu tuyoho nu yise gi how madaꞌe.

Mu sakwa nanaꞌunusoo oo nakasopedakwatoo ka te nasootuhina, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme magwetzoidu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa mee unnemo, “Te Pabeꞌe tubetse unu besaꞌyoo.” Ooosapa sakwa noꞌyoona numu mee unnemo, “Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nanasoogwugidu.”

Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu haꞌyoo tooe ne sooyugwepana, numme ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meana. Pana mu ka mu numu besa mumme mu sooyugwena petukute. Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu gi ohobu nanesootuhi mee ne sooyukwe pana, mu puu unu mu besa nanesootuhi, mu ka mu numu mee mumme mu sooyugwekuna petzape. Numu besa mu sooyukwe pana, umu numme gi heesoobedya.
Tamme oo mesoo matzooekute, ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme oo sopedakwadoona manatutooe noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kooba nakusega.

Mu numu sakwa ooosapa pumme nehanedu nakabetsea. Umu sakwa ooosapa kaaheno oo sooyugwe, ka Te Naa pumme meeoo netamma. Mu sakwa gi ka pumme nehanedu besa sukwe masoonammepana ka pumme oo poonnepunne suuꞌmu besa manegonnona. Ka tooe hemma tooe how yugwena tamme sakwa oo soomane,
Soo nunuꞌu sumumanoꞌyoo (10) aa-gaꞌyoo u poonnena sumumanoꞌyoo numu-kooba aatadu mee nanetammana gisoo numu moohedu pana saaꞌa ka nunuꞌu-no numu-kooba aatakwu gi haaꞌnoto.
Soo Te Naa ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhipu noꞌoko soo hemma pooha sopedakwadoodu. Esoo oo Besa Pooha gi ka egeahoo teepu-koobatu poohabe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Mu tubetse ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu sakwa ka tu manekwuna soopedakwatoona, umu sumuna sakwikwu, soo suda mu tumadugupu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.

Pudusoo umuoo sutaꞌyoo numu suda mu neyugwekwu susumudu mu-matu yise nuutumedakwu. Gi haaꞌnotoo mu sutaꞌyoo numu mu netumooꞌoopunnese yise susumudu mu-matu sumuna nagoekwu nu-koobatoo. Ooonneꞌyoopana gi sakwa mu umu-ma suipana. Mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna nu ka ooosapa nanagwetzoidu gi mobegwa-gakoo mu sootuhikwu ka Te Naa-baatoo.

Timothy, u mow Te Naa tubetse nakaꞌoedyukudu. Gi hemma sookwipana ka Te Naa besa po nagenoꞌo: Besa tumatuguna, tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna, noꞌoko numu soobedyana, besa numu matuguna. Ooosapa oo nageno tooe hemma tooe how manegena sapa.
Yaa ka teepu-koobatu ewow mu hee-gana ka unu moogoobuna besa sokwamana yabesoo ewa mu hee-gana gadoo namayugwekwu.

Soo Te Naa tubetse naduya numu poohawuma, ka pukwi ka natakwatsu-baatu (7) goso manepunnedu-kwiꞌyoona. Mu goso Te Naa Besa Pooha manepunnena, ka yaa te teepu-kooba oosoo natakwatsu-baa (7) numu nanesootuhibu manepunnena. Waha manoꞌyoona watsu matsebooekudu (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌemu mu kwingatu-kwisoo toha namasoana manepunne, o umu Te Naa tutummatzidu a papabeꞌemu aataꞌa.

Unu oo maꞌe, mu numu puu nuummabu puusoo nagea ka sutakoo numu pu-ma tu poohana, noꞌokosoo hegana. Soo Rome-witu numu meeoo tusooyukwe. ‘Numme yow naduyadu, numu ooonakwa sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo. Nu gi a natamawukana. Nu gi hemma suda soonameku-waꞌneꞌyoo.’

Mu nanana nonodukwamu-gaꞌyoo sakwa oo sopedakwadoo mu nodukwamu gi mu-kwaꞌne nanatzooe. Mu sakwa besaꞌyoo mee mu sooyukwe umu ka mu natummatzina soogwina, besa nanamatuguna ka nanapa nobe-gana. Soo Te Naa yise ka pumme mu nanetzakwiyaꞌe mu nakasootuhikwu, ka yoo mu manakwe.
Gi sakwa mu momokoꞌne ka mu naana puu tunemadabueku, tuwazoo gi mu naana tunedyooe. Umuoo momokoꞌne sakwa gi unnepana.
Tamme Te Naa-ma nasoonatzaꞌe oosoo te netutzeapuna. Tamme yise ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-noꞌyookwu. Oosoo te nemabetseakwu.

E nanumu, soo Te Naa mu netutzea gi ka mu Jew numu tumayohope nakabetseapana, gi yise too ka suda tu namanena nakabetseapana tuwow. Sumuꞌyoosoo naꞌunnedu noꞌoko ka Te Naa tumayohona waha mee naꞌunnedu, “Tamme ka tammesoo besa nanasoobedyana tamme sakwa noꞌoko numu besa soobedya.” Mu sakwa Te Naa tumayohope nanatummatzina ka muusoo besa nanasoobedyana.

Soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma, “Tamme sakwa ooosapa mu numu tutuha soobedya.” Tamme ka gi mu numu tumatzina, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo gi tamme tutuha soobedya. Soo Te Naa ooosapa tutuha te sooyugwedu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetsea oosoo besa kaaheno te mayukwepunne. Soo Te Naa ka meeoo mooasoo te sooyukwepuna, suda te tumaduguna gi tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi ewaꞌyoo, ewa-baa tamme numu tummatzipu, pana Te Pabeꞌe sumusoo, tamme noꞌyoona oo tummatzikwu.
Te Pabeꞌe ekow teepu-koobatoo nawuese ka umu oo numu habetoo kemmapunnedu. Ka Te Naa tamme nehanepunnedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe manumudoopu ookow nu nesootuhaꞌe.
Numme ka suda numme tu matugu sapa numme mumme netummatzi, mu yise ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukute tooe suda mumme tumatuku sapa.
Mee tuusoobedya, “Esoo besaꞌyoo gi sutaꞌyoo soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena, ‘Besaꞌyoo.’ “
Ka mu numu-kooba aatadu Rome no tuheneꞌetu gi Te Naa nakabetseadu ka Rome naꞌe, oo kweedapunne, oo poonnena unu suda sokwama.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Tooe haga tooe nuka unu soobedyadu e nakabetseakwu. Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo unu mu soobedyakwu. Numme ka Te Naa-no mu natubangakwu.
Tamme ka kootabua-kwi momona ka Te Naa-waꞌne ooosapa kootabedooapunnena tamme tookwa nanapuaꞌa. Soo Te Naa noꞌoko ka te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwapu soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna.
Te tumayohope uga te tsitugu menoꞌo yise tamme ookow gi tumayohope-gaꞌyoo. Tamme yise Te Naa tunetammatoo manemokwu oosoo yise te doodooamu-gakwu noꞌoko te sootuhikwu.
Ka Tu Tooa soo Te Naa meeoo netamma, “U nu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.

Umu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Pana numme u batsakwu ka Ne Naa-waꞌnesoo u naneyugwe. Gi numme ka besa u tumadugu-kwitu u batsakwu. U sukwe numu, numme-waꞌnesoo pana u mee unakwe, ‘Nu ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.’ “
Soo Te Naa puusoo meeoo ne netamma mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, numme gi nasootookedu, numme ka numme tu sootuhaꞌe.
Ooonneꞌyoo tamme togesapa ka meeꞌe, “Nu gi sui. Numu gi nuka manayaha-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Te Naa nu-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌe e tummatzina.”

Tamme sakwa gi nananemooyugwepana, gi nananesootzemapana tuwazoo, soo Te Naa noꞌoko te doodooamu-gaꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea. Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te netamma, “Tamme besaꞌyookwu tooetoo sutaꞌyookwu.” Gi sakwa tamme numu nesootzemapana ka tamme atasoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa ooosapa mu tummatzina umu besa manenokwu.

Soo Te Naa te nenoyugwena te tummatzaꞌe, “Mu yise oo nakabetseana nananeꞌoedyukuna ka Te Pabeꞌe nagenokwu,” nu mu nanetzakwiyaꞌekute. Ka Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna, tamme noꞌyoona sumusoo nesootuhimeakwu.

Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi umu tamme nanesootuhikudu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Nonotsa tabeno umu puu tuu tumaꞌemukwana nematzagadape, ka tamme tumaꞌemukwa nokosoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka puu gi hannanoꞌo tumaꞌemukwapuna. Sumuꞌyoosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme maꞌemukwa-koobatoo mooasoo nabatsapu, ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa besa te sootuhina ooosapa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.
Soo tooe haga tooe gi hemma tuugedu, ka tu puaꞌa tutuha manakwe sakwa oo tummatzi ka Te Naa unu soobedyana oo-matoo nanesootuhiyana.
Tamme ka te tookoo tubetse soomawunaꞌe, oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu.

E nanumu, nu togesapa mu netamma mu sakwa ka suda mu tusooyugwena gi tumayohokupana, tamme gi ekow teepu-kooba tubetse manepunne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka yaanona wakwawaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo nakabetseapana, tooe meeoo sokwamapana. Tamme ka oo nakabetseana, soo sutaꞌyoo kadoo te mayugwekwu.
Tamme sakwa noꞌoko numu besa matugu. Tamme sakwa nanasoobedyana, tamme ka noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe nanumuna. Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa besa ooosapa sooyugwe.
Soo Moses ka Egypt nana tutzagow ka tu nanumu-koobatoo.
Gi mu nakabetseapana umu atasoo numu tunedyooedu numu nemooagadu umu meeoo Jew numu manese sapa ka Te Naa doodooamu manekwu.
Umuoo ka Te Naa unnepu sopedakwatoo mee naneyugwedu, pana umu ooosapa suda tumatuguyakwe, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseꞌa.
Nu mu sopedakwatoo umu ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana soogwaꞌepana, umu gi hownnekoo oo nakasopedakwatoo.
Saaꞌa tamme punnoꞌo mu numu netummatzikwu ka umu suda manese. Tamme mooasoo nasootuhipu, tamme yise kummaꞌakoosoo mesoo netummatzi.

U sakwa ooosapa tubetse besa mu tunedyooe. Oꞌno saaꞌa soo Te Naa, “U tookwa besa numu tunedyooepu,” mee u netammadooa. U sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu besa kaaheno mu numu tunedyooena oꞌno u gi suda soonammekwu.
Mu nanana sakwa pummesoo dooamu besa mabetsea yise ka Te Naa unnepu mu tunedyooeno. Umu sakwa gi nidya noko mu manaanapana.
Ookow tamme mu matzooekupunne ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo besa tamme soobedya.
Numme noꞌyoona ka teepu-kooba pookwahoo. Haga sapaga ka Jew numuyadooa-wikoo e yadooewunu, ‘Saul, Saul u ooosapa suda e masoonammennumme, uusoo punnoꞌo suda soonamme gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna.’

‘Ka tubetse mooeꞌugasoo ka teepu gisoo e matabuena, nu ooosapa E Naa-no gwetzoinumme. Nu yise nuka tu batsase sapa, ka e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoda. Menoꞌo yise nu gwetzoinummena gi mobegwa-gakwu. Nu noꞌoko sutakoo pooha matzooekute. Nu ka tutuha mu manepunnena sopedakwatoo mu ooonneꞌyoopana ooosapa e sooꞌoedyukute, oꞌno nu tubetse besakoo mu sootuhi. Mu gi totogeꞌyoo numu mu nekwohonedu, “Numme suuꞌmu Te Naa dooamu,” meeꞌe naneyugwepana umu ka gi togekoo tumayohokudu.
Tamme besa sokwamakwu ka mu numu besa manakwe, gi besa sokwama ka suda mu manakwe,
Tamme sakwa besa-tamme meadabe. Tamme sakwa ka suda te manena maꞌwu. Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa unena nakapunnena oo nakabetsea tamme tu tuukwepu. Ookow unena te magwetzoikwu.

Soo waha nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo-nakwisoo yotsepunnena mee unakwe, “Soo mu numu ka Rome mee naneadu-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo nanasuda manena yise mu noꞌobatusoo numu ka mu poonnena umu-kwaꞌne nanasuda manakwe. Umuoosoo nanasuda manena umu-matoosoo kodyuhoose kadoo mu mayugwe.”
Tooe haga tooe nuka nakabetseadu puu nuga puaꞌa, nu sakwa oo-koobatoo mesoo nabatsa.
E nanumu, ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu sakwa mu nanesootuhi mea. Yaanotu sapa esoo pooha nanesootuhibu-witu nanemamakwupetu.
Mu gi totogeꞌyoona numu ka mooasoo gi totogekoo momokoꞌne mu nonobe-toosoo etzaga nemooaga. Umu ooosapa suda tusooyugwedu.
Tamme kaaheno nanadyadooekwu, tamme ka unu nanasoobedyana. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo manekekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe o te moohekwudu
Tamme sakwa sumusoo maneka. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseapunne. Oosoo noꞌoko nanakwaꞌnesoo tusooyugwe te mayugwekese, tamme besa nanamatoo sokwamakwu.
“Haga u?” mee soo Saul unne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu Jesus u yow ooosapa suda e masoonammennumme.
Soo Te Naa meeoo oo netamma, ‘U moko tzakwumedow u pooha teepu-kooba ꞌwunu.
Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe tooe haga tooe e nakabetseadu gi yaꞌekwu.”
Nu yise ka Te Naa poonne pabatsekoo toha kadunoo-kwi ka mu numu nesootunagakatu. Soo teepu oo paꞌana-kwitu ka teepu-no gadooꞌoo namamaꞌe.

Menoꞌo tamme ekow teepu-kooba gwetzoimodu, ka ooka nadukadu-ma gwetzoaꞌe. Pana soo hee nadukadu ka te tookoo-no punnoꞌo gi ooosapa ekow yaatuhoo teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Umuoo yaa ekow teepu-koobatoosoo moobegwa-gakwu. Soo Te Naa ka te matabuepuna ka te tookoo te soonahadyakwena, gi petzape.

Meeoosoo sakwa tamme nasooyugwe. Soo yaꞌepu numu gi hownnekoo tumaꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa ka yaꞌepu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo gi te maꞌemukwana soohanepana. Soo nummedu numu ka tu tunakabetseana soogwaꞌe, tamme sakwa umuoo numu-waꞌne, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe noko Te Naa nakabetseꞌa.

Numme ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe oosoo ka ooosapa ne moohena, numme yise ka sutakoo matsooekute. Soo Te Naa meeoo ne netammana, numme yise manatooe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu wahammoꞌo. Mu numu yise oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoona.

Ekowsoo naꞌunnepu soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo ne tuukwepu numme yise punnoꞌo mumme tuukwekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee te netamma, “Soo Te Naa kootabedooadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo tooe hano tooe katuna ka besow po-kooba kootabuapunne.”
Noꞌyoona umu Te Naa tutzeana, nuka nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu yise gi mu tsasoopedya-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa unu nanasoobedya.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko te namanayaha-makoo te magwetzoi, oosoo ka ooosapa gwetzoinummena te nanesootuhikuna tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhinona.
Menoꞌo yise tooe ooosoo. Susumudu Jew numu soo Te Naa sootuhaꞌe, puusoo mu netutzeana mu sootuhaꞌe umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukute.
Mu teepu-koobatu numu moohedu ugasoo nanasuda oo-no maneyakwe.”
Tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa soobedya, ka te samoomu te soobedya-kwaꞌnesoo. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa mu matugu tammesoo ooonakwa besasoo.
Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona tamme tookwa Te Naa doodooamu.

Nu yise ka e tuusobedya-kwi pabatsekoo atsa togogwa-waꞌne tabuadu poonne. O oosoo panetogogwa numu goekwudu. Natakwatsukwuoo (7) wo-gana noꞌyoona suta-kwi pooha tsotsowupaka yise sumumanoꞌokoo (10) aa-gaꞌyoo.

Te Naa te sootuhikwu noꞌoko nasootuhibu ka Te Pabeꞌe tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo tamme punnoꞌo ka oo doodooamuna. Ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo tamme punnoꞌo nuummabu wumakwu yaa ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona. Oꞌno oo-waꞌnesoo soo Te Naa punnoꞌo te sootuhikwu.
Mu wakwaꞌetse ka besa tunematuguna umuoo sakwa ka mu numu nanesootuhipe tunedyooe yise oo-koobakwisoo natumanakakwu.

Susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ekow gisoo nakasopedakwadoo. Umu uga ooosapa ka hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhidu, oꞌnosoo gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu ka ooonnekoo a tookoo tukayina oo soomaꞌyu ka hemma namadabue-matoo tu nanesootuhina. Oo soomaꞌyuyinasoo togesapa mee soonammena oo-matoo nanesootuhiyakwesoo, umu ka gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna.

Noꞌyoona yise mu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, ka tumasuape maꞌna-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu, ka toesabooe gi pooetooa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ookow tsegaꞌakwunise oo wunikwu. Mu numu ka Te Naa nakabetseadu ka toesabooe ewow besa pooetooa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa puu ookow mabetseana oosoo besasoo pooedooꞌa.
Mu sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe tuungu, umu sakwa punnoꞌo mu-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu sakwa gi suda mu neyugwepana.

Ne nanumu, umu mooasoo tuipu-witu numme besasoo mu tuukwekwu. Soo Te Naa ekow mu tooꞌe tuukweꞌe, soo numu ka yaꞌese, oo-baa petugayakwe ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda sokwamayakwe ka tu soobedyana yaꞌeyakwe. Mu sakwa gi umu-waꞌnesoo tusooyugwepana.

Saaꞌa soo Te Naa ka tubetse babatseꞌe banunadu Atsa Baa mee naneadu mu-koobenatu ninapatoo pasawoyoꞌakuse, mu Jew numu yise oo-toogoo mea umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu Egypt-witu numu oo-toogoosoo mu tooꞌe nageka, soo Te Naa ka tubetse baa oetusoo nekodyuoose, umu yise oe batatuihoo, ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
Oꞌno soo Moses mee naneadu nadooaꞌadoo. Besa tabuadu oongaꞌa. Pahe (3) muha umu nobe-kwisoo oo tzakwatse,
Umu tamme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo sukwe numu tutuha te soobedya obedasoo besa te matugugena. Ooonneꞌyoona umu ka sutakoo tamme-makoo nematzaga.

Menoꞌo yise ka sutakoo togaba-witu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu numu ewa suda manakwe yaa teepu-koobatu. Pana pudusoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko ka teepu atasoo yugwekwu, esoo teepu yise besaꞌyookwu. Pana tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu mooasoo atasoo manegena. Gi sakwa tamme suda manepana. Gi nanano baagoepana, gi nana-ma tumanagapana, gi nanagoena, gi nananemooyugwepana.
Ka hemma how yugwedu sakwa soo oo nedyawedu besa matugu. Umu sakwa gi mu netzakwikupana, umu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa mu nedyawedu. Soo Te Naa gi numu tutzeꞌa.
Ka mu numu besa sokwama, tamme sakwa punnoꞌo umu-waꞌnesoo.

Ka saaꞌa susumudu mu Jew numu Antioch noko Iconium-wiꞌyoona kemmadu petu. Mu numu Lystra-witu, “Soo Paul sutaꞌyoo,” mee mu tuukwena. Umu oo tooꞌe tatsagow tupe-ma oo tapagetana. Ka Lystra-wikoo yise oo tzapewuyaka, Paul yaꞌepu mee sokwamana. Pana gi!
Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise suda soonammena mee tuwazoo ne netamma, “Sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu saaꞌa e nemawunidooa, ka umu e wohomu-matoo.”
Umu Te Naa nayadooawabe ka saaꞌa numu ka Te Naa unnena tuukwemakwuse soo sutaꞌyoo nunuꞌu mu Te Naa nayadooawabe goepu.
Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nanumuna, te moogooa ooosapa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu, soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena tamme besaꞌyoo tooe te tookoo yaꞌese sapa, tamme ka tumaꞌemukwapuna.
Mu nanamooatupu ka Te Naa gi petzabedu. Mu yise punnoꞌo ooosoo manakwe. Mu nanamooatupu ka Te Naa tuukwewabe noꞌoko suda matugupu-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwuna wahadu yise nagoe.
nananenaboaꞌana, baagoena, tooe how tooe manena yise nanasuda tumatuguna. Mooasoo nu meeoo mu tuukweꞌe, “Soo suda tumatuguduna gi Te Naa doodooamu mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe te nanesootuhikuna ka Te Naa besa unnepu te tuukwe ka Te Naa pumme netamma-kwaꞌnesoo, ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetsea ka Moses-waꞌne.
Sumuꞌyoo nana Joseph mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe Barnabas
Tamme sakwa gi oo sookwumehoepana ka besaꞌhoo, ooosapa oo nageno, gi oo maꞌwu, oꞌno ka saaꞌa besaꞌyoo tamme-tammesoo kodyudooa.

Soo mu Jew tumayohope meeoo e netamma nu sakwa yaꞌe ka suda tumaꞌemukwana. Nu sakwa uga nabatsa gisoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nu-koobatoo nabatsa. Pana nu yise namagwetzoaꞌe. Menoꞌo nu gi ka te nanamooatupu tumayohope nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa suuꞌmu nu nakabetseakwu. Nu namagwetzoaꞌe ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa-wi nu tunakaꞌoedyukuna pana ne nanamooatupu tumayohope gi e magwetzoaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe nu-koobatoo nabatsapu, oosoo e tunemadabuekute. Oosoo e soobedyana nu-koobatoo nabatsapu.
Ka hooope Te Naa e geahoose mee e netamma, “Meahoose hooope-ma ka Te Naa pukwiyoona mu nanesootuhi nobe managahoo ka umu e dooamu oeꞌyoona nanesootuhidu saaꞌa datsungahooke.
Umuoo namagwetzoidu o manepunne ka ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe oedyukumodu gi tototzaba-gaꞌyoo gi hannanoꞌo ka nunuꞌu-matoo nanesootuhidu. Umu yise Te Naa-baa soo Te Naa yise ka gwetzoibu mu sootuhi.
Mu hoadada tu ewa-ma nananakwisoo kemmadu-kwaꞌne tabuadape. Ka mu kwo-kooba oa tupe namadabuena tzotua-kwaꞌne tatabua yise too numu koba-gaꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa maneno ka Te Naa suuꞌmu nakabetseana. Tamme gi nasookwipana ka how soomanena, oꞌno tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo tamme neyugwe-kwaꞌne mane.
Nu ka tubetse besow po nagenoꞌo, soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu besa matugu, ka pukwi u tunakaꞌoedyuku u magwetzoikwu.

Tamme ka Te Naa pooha unnepu tumooꞌoona, tamme tubetse suda manakwe. Tammesoo kadoo namayugwekwu tamme ka mee unnena, “Soo Te Naa Tooa gi hee. Soo tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsana gi pooha-gaꞌyoo.” Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tamme magwetzoidu netumooꞌoona.
“Besaꞌyoo,” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe ne netammasoo. “Ka Te Naa meeoo nuka netamma, nu yaa ekaoo teepu-kooba petu. Nu punnoꞌo mu tuukwe, mana tooe hano tooe ka mu numu nu-witu tuukwemo.”
Numu nemooyugwena, numu nesootzemana, suda mesoo manena, puusoo papabatseꞌe naanaꞌunnena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu nanetubetseyaꞌena tuwow, oꞌno mu numu hemma mu hanekukwu.
Mu susutaꞌyoo numu yise suda sokwamana nasootooke, teepu tawaga-kwi watse ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe-ma suipunnena.

Pana mu sutaꞌyoo numu tuuyapa-gaꞌyoo, wahabu tuusooyugwedu, gi toge-matoo nanesootuhidu, numu goedu, yise too gi toge nanakwenagoedu yise nanapoohadu, esagoedu, umuoo ka gi tookedu goso-witoo natsemaꞌanakwu.”
Nu baa-wi u matzakakwu. U ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-matoo nanesootuhina, soo Te Pabeꞌe suda u tumaduguna u-makoo namatzakakwunikwu. Oꞌno yise u besa nuummakwu.’
Umu momokoꞌne-waꞌne tsotsotabuꞌa. Umu unu gunatzooena.
Soo nanesootuhidu numu tunedyooedu sakwa gi nidyupupana. Noꞌoko besa numu matuguna numu tunedyooe. Ka tooe how tooe suda pumme tusootunagaꞌa sapa gi suda mu numu soobedyapana.
Nu tubetse besa soonamme ka besa mu nanesootuhinoꞌo mu nakana ooosapa besa mu tunakaꞌoedyukute, tooe nu yaa kwingaꞌyoopana soo mumme e nanesootuhikuna ooosapa noꞌyoona mu-baa petugadyagwe.
Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwadoo ka numu besa manakwe, oosoo yise ka putamme mu nanesootuhina nekwekakwu. Pana soo Te Naa ka mu suda tumatugudu numu tumooꞌookwu.”

O tooꞌe, besa numme ka Te Naa nanetzakwiyigena, “U, Ne Naa besa mu numu sootuhipu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu soobedya. Soo Te Naa mu netutzea mu ka mooeꞌugasoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna mu ka besa oo soonakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka mumme ne tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo Te Naa tu besa pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi, mu yise Te Naa besa podo mea. Oosoo mu magwetzoise, ka saaꞌa mu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-matoo mease, ooosapa oo-baaꞌyoona, mu oo-waꞌneꞌyookwu.

Soo Peter mu nekwegease meeoo, “Mu sakwa ka suda mu manena maꞌwu, baa-wi namatzakase mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyuku. Oꞌnosoo Te Naa noꞌoko mu sootuhise te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwunise ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi.
Umu suda ume tumatugukudu gi tumakodyukupana. Ooosapa besa nanamatugu.
Mu nanana punnoꞌo gi ka mu momokoꞌne soogwina puusoo nana-ma tumanaka. Umuoo suda tubetse manakwe soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Mu sakwa punnoꞌo nu-koobatoo besa sokwama ka besa kaaheno mumme e tunedyooese.
Ka Te Naa sakwa ooosapa nanetzakwiyi yise ka sutakoo nemaꞌwuni. Yise ka besatoosoo nummenumme. Soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu ka sutakoo mu nemaꞌnunise.
Gadoo hee pu-mama numu nasoosuina.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U oo mesoo manakwe, ka Nuga Naa te paꞌanakwatu mee unakwe. Mu numu u-baatoo e tzakadu suda tumaduguna, saaꞌa umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Ooonneꞌyooona tuwazoo tamme ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute mee unepana gi oo nakabetseana, tamme tookwa gi tunakaꞌoedyukute.

Soo te Jew tumayohope gi ka te tumaꞌemukwana tzadyooiku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ekow te sukwe tzapoonnekute tamme nabatsakwu ka tumaꞌemukwana. Soo Te Naa yise Tu Besaa Tooaꞌa yaatoo manumudoopu. Soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoosoo makwukodyupu yise oo batsa, ka te Jew tumayohope tunetammana-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.

Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka mu numu tamme tumooꞌoo, tamme yise kaaheno meadabekwu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana oo-matoo nanesootuhi. Tamme sakwa gi mu numu-ma suipana, tamme nekusekadu gi suda oo soonammekupana ka tooe how tooe tamme mu yugwesapa. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa ka mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, ka ooka mu soonaka, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna.
Mu nanana sakwa pummesoo doodooamu gi masutakupana, umu sumuna nasootookekwu.

Pabatseꞌe yadooase mee une, “Noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana maꞌwukese ooka Rome-witu namanewunutu Te Naa ooonakwasoo oo sooyukwena. Mu numu-kooba aatadu yaa teepu-koobatu punnoꞌo. Umu hemma-ma tumudu unu moogooba mane ka Rome-witu no tuheꞌnena hemma-ma tumuna, ewa heedooa petuga. Soo pabatseꞌyoo numu pukwi nokatuna, Rome mee naneadu tubetse kadoo namaꞌe. Ewaꞌyoo mu tsotsoapu yise tooe hownneꞌyoo tooe sutaꞌyoo oe manekwu yaa manakwana.”
Soo tooe haga tooe Jesus gi Te Pabeꞌe mee unnedu esayaꞌe. Esoo esayidu ka Te Pabeꞌe tumooꞌoo oosoo ka gi Te Naa noko ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna meeoo unakwe.
Soo tooe haga tooe ka gi nasootzagwiyina ka pooha tukaba tukase, tumaꞌemukwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsana gi heesoobedyadu-kwaꞌne.
Mee nu besasoo mu tuukwe tabuakwu. Oosoo gi togeꞌyoo tamme meeoo unena, numme oo nakaꞌoedyukupana gi oo nakabetseana.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe tunetamma-kwaꞌne mane. Oosoo nanesootuhi mu mayugwese, ka mu numu mumme kusegeadu oo ooemota mu neyugwese, mu magwetzoikwu.
oꞌno yise puuwana ka oongaꞌa maꞌwu. Soo mu numu-kooba katudu padu oo mayuse, yise oo tooaga.

Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise ka tseda tukwuna ka goso-matu oe yongase paꞌanakwana ka teepu-koobatoo oo wukwatehoo. Ka oo manise oꞌno yise nunuadu, tukwukwutseba, soo teepu unu yutsungawunu, oꞌno mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu ka suda tu tumatuguna putammesoo kodyukwuna sopedakwadookwu.
Nu ka e tuusoobedyana mayohona mu Jew numu nu-ma tzakadu, ka tu nanesootuhi nobe-kobenaꞌyoona e tooe batsa.
Umu ka numu tubetse natunedyooedu gi nakabetseana, ka a naꞌesayaena suuꞌmu oedyukukwu.
Pana susumudu mu-matu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute.”
Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee e nanekwegea, “Nu ka egea tukaba-matoo a hooba-wi matzakase ka ookow nana geahookwu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tukaba hooba-wi, a namatzakana ka Judas Iscariot geahoo.
E puaꞌa Timothy, ooosapa oo sumayu ka Te Naa ume netammapu. Gi ka mu numu ooosapa nanahadu noꞌoko hemma nesopedakwatoo mee unnedu nakabetseapana.

Susumudu mu Jew numu-matu mu nuusoogwedakuna, huuhoo umu totoetzeabu sutakoo nanana ka mu numu ka Paul noko Silas-matoo mu nemanekute. Mu numu yise sumuse, ka Jason nobe-kwi petugonnoga ka Paul noko Silas wategana, mu nehanekwu mee unnena.
