Unu nanesootuhi numu ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu maꞌemukwa oo poonnena oosoo sakwa oo nanesootuhiku soo Te Naa yise ka tumaꞌemukwadu magwetzoikwu. Tooe noꞌoko numu tumaꞌemukwana gi besow sapa, soo tooꞌe noꞌobatu soo numu tumaꞌemukwapu mesoo nanematzagakwunaꞌe. Sumubatu numu tumaꞌemukwana gi nananesootuhikwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo oosoo ka tumaꞌemukwadu-matoosoo namakodyukuse oo batsakwu. Ookow tumaꞌemukwape gi hownnekoo tamme nanesootuhi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
Nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe. Nu ka umu e nanayadooawabe numu-matu mu-matoo tayakwu, mu ka mu nakabetseana e doodooamu manekwu. Umu nuga doodooamu, E Naa doodooamu tuwazoo.”

Tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe soo Te Naa mee te unnena besa soobedya, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Numme u nesookwugaꞌe u noꞌoko sutakoo hemma kadoo mayugwekwu, soo besaꞌyoo suuꞌmu yise nabenikwu.”

Susumudu Jew numu mu tsoapa madidu mana tooe manemoꞌo ka mu tsoapa tooꞌe nematzagakwunina. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-ma gi nasootuhipu, mu tsoapa sukwe tooꞌe tayakwunina ka Jesus nanea-ma. Umu meeoo ka tsoapa netammayakwe, “Nu u tayakwunaꞌe ka Paul ooosapa wahana ka Jesus nanea-ma.”
Soo Paul ka Silas netutzea puno meakwudu. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Naa umu-kooba tueyaꞌe.
gi umu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meadabe. Gi umu-waꞌne manepana. Mu sumuna mu ka Te Naa mumme besa sootuhina watzekadooa.

Umu wahaꞌyoo yadooawabe ka pooha-gana ka powmadu mesoo nedyooikudu. Ka baa puupe-kwitoo tu matabuena pooha-gaꞌyoo tuwazoo. Mu Te Naa yadooawabe ookow pooha-gaꞌyoo eka numu suda mu namanatzayapu mu pooha tzapoonnekute, ooonneꞌyoona eka numu suda tumaꞌemukwana umu-matusoo mesoo makodyu.
U tookwa gi numme-matu soo Te Naa u sopedakwatoo. U sutaꞌyoo ka meeoo tusooyugwena.
U ka mu nu-matoo nanesootuhidu doodooamu-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka ume doodooamuna, nuga doodooamu tuwazoo. Ka taga doodooamu besa manakwe mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu tookwa besaꞌyoo.
Umu ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukase, gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo.
Tamme sakwa gi numu tuꞌwepana, gi nasootzaꞌmepana, tammesoo ooonakwa besa sakwa tamme kukumasoo numu besa matugu.

Umu naniwunudu naamookwi soo Te Pabeꞌe numu-waꞌne tabuana wunu, yaa tu tawetzogo noꞌoto oodutsekoo kwaseana, soo Te Pabeꞌe patakwetseaadu oakwadyadu-ma tu anga-koobakwi nakwunateꞌa, mu numu nanesootuhikudu moohedu-kwaꞌne ooosoo namadabue.
Tooe hee sutaꞌyoo otuoo gadooꞌyookwu. Soo Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe o numu nehanepunnena, umu ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, umuoo ooosapa Te Naa dooamuna
Pudusoo soo Te Naa atasoo eka teepu yugwekwu. Tamme sakwa kaaheno tusooyugwena gi ka sutakoo tamme maꞌemukwadu nakabetseapana, oꞌno yise tamme besa nanesootuhimokwu.
Mu-matu ka nananodukwadoona gi hownneꞌyoo pana gi besa manepunne, ookow gi petzabena nu meeoo. Pana soo numu ka nanodukwadoose, ewa nanasuda hee manekena, nu yise gi mu-toogoo ookow soogwaꞌe.
Tamme noꞌobatusoo sutakoo poohabe gi tabuadu-no nanamabetukute gi ka sukwe numu-no.

Tamme ka gi sooname tumapuaꞌana, tamme sakwa nanesootuhi Te Naa-matoo, oosoo sakwa ka tu besa yadooape-matoo besa te sokwamatuguse te sootuhi, oosoo besa sooname ka noꞌoko te sootuhina. Soo Te Naa gi numu netsagwikudu ka pumme nanesootuhina hemma pumme tu nanetsakwiyaꞌe.
Gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha mu-nagakwi manennummedu netakonepana.

Soo nanesootuhi nobe ka natzekadukuse, soo pukwi oo mooe naꞌegeahookayina Poohabe Pu-kwiꞌyoona mee naneꞌa. Oetu kootabuakudu, pooha tukaba wobe namadabue-kooba natugu. Soo pabaꞌyoo wunapu ka nobe naamootoo natzapata. Ka wunapu natzapadadu-kwingakwuna soo Tubetse Unu Poohakakoo Pukwiꞌyoona mee naneꞌa. Esoo wobe-ma namadabuedu oe, oa tupe oo naꞌoonnakwi nahane, yise besa kookwanadu pukwikoo natunina, wobe namadabuena oa tupe petakwa-gaꞌyoo oe tuwazoo. Soo Aaron natzetono ooweoo natugu, sumu togaba-wisoo boohe naahoodu, ka Te Naa Pooha-ma wahaꞌyoo segetayamadu tupe ka Te Naa unnepu puuma nabona, yise tseda oa tupe-ma namadabuena tuwazoo. Soo tukaba Te Naa ka te nanamooatupu pumatu oo makapu ka tseda-wi.
Mu ka ooosapa nu-matoo nanesootuhinona nu mu nakasootuhise, yise mu nu-kwitu nakasopedakwadoose ka nuga besa podo nu-no kaaheno meadabenokwu.
Nu mumme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tuboꞌo oꞌno mu nananesootuhaꞌedu numu ka ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo namagwetzoidu, pumme tu sootuhipu sopedakwadookwu.

Soo tooe haga tooe pummesoo tusooyugwena wahakwu, besa pummesoo nanemadabuewununa soogwaꞌepunnedu. Nu ka toge kaahenotu E Naa unnepu mu tunedyooe, oꞌno mu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe, nu gi esayaꞌe.
Numme ka Te Naa besa unnena sopedakwadoona nasootuhipu, pana numme togesoo sukwe numu, gi nummesoo pooha-gana mu numu yise oo sopedakwadookwu numme ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi gi nummetusoo.

Ka mu numu tamme suda matugu, tamme sakwa gi umuoo suda matugupana. Tamme sakwa sukwe besa mu matugu, umu ka saaꞌa suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Meeoo natugotugu, “Te Naa meeoo, ‘Nu ka sutakoo mu suda tumatugudu-matoosoo makodyukukwu.’ “

Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu ka nuusoo nakwitu wahana, mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Pana soo nuga Naa, besow e poohamaka, ookow nuga netammana, ooonneꞌyoona mu numu nuka nesookwugaꞌe. Mu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu mee nananeyugwedu.
“Noꞌyoona tukapu besaꞌyoo,” meeꞌe soo Te Naa, tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa numu sootuhikwuna umu-makoo magamukupana, ka te tukana tuwazoo. Tamme nabeatse saaꞌa gi ka mu numu manayahadooa.
Umu ka mu Jew numu tumayohope mayohona ka oo tookoo ka myrrh noko aloe-ma mawoꞌngese, wanapu-wi oo toputooe.

Mu ka mu nakwutumadu tunakaꞌoedyukudu uga tummatzidu tuwow. Tooe ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu noꞌoko mu hemma hanese sapa, mu gi suda oo sokwamakute ka Te Naa-baakoo besa mu nasootuhikwuna sopedakwadoona. Umuoo Te Naa-baakoo te namahegana gi kadoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
Soo Te Naa God ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme Jew numu magwetzoidu matabuepu-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus David-matu meeꞌe soo Te Naa God te tuukwepu-gaꞌyoo.
Esoo nabotugudu tubetsetu meeꞌe ka oꞌnosoo nayadooaꞌadu, “Soo Te Naa ka umu unu pumme soobedyadu sootuhikwu.”
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mayoda ka oo nabatsase ka Tu Besa Pooha-ma, oo Besa Pooha yise ka saaꞌa tamme tookoo mayodakwu, ka oo Besa Pooha te nemadabuepuse.
Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tamme oedyukute tamme togesapa Te Naa doodooamu.
Gi muusoo nanemooagapana, mu puu gi ka Te Naa nemooaga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme puu ka tooe hemma tooe masuase, saaꞌa tamme ooonnekoo soo yasakwu.

Yooonnekoo soo Te Naa te tzapoonnekute ka tu hownneꞌyoona. Oosoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa matugu pana, ka saa gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu soo sutakoo umu-matoosoo kodyukukwu. Tamme ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu manese, tamme kadoo namayugwekwu punnoꞌo.

E pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa gi nasootookepana tuutooe, ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoosoo oo kodyukwunoꞌotoo, soo tumasuadu puu tuutooe. Oosoo tumasuadu puu besow ka a pooe masuꞌa. Soo tumasuadu yise ewatsekoo baa wutooe, oꞌnosoo oo tumasuana besa naakwu. Soo tumasuadu wutooe besow oo naakwuna, tuwazoo oo kwasukwuna, oꞌno yise oo kwasuse, oo yasakwu.

Soo Onesiphorus ka Rome-wi petu, unu manena e mayu. Oosoo gi nu-ma nasookwaꞌe oosoo ooosapa e nenoyugwe, nu meeoo nanesootuhi, soo Te Naa sakwa oo sootuhi ka saaꞌa numu-witu nemadabuena. U mooasoo noꞌoko ka hemma besa nuka oo tumatugukupu sopedakwatoo ka Ephesus-wiꞌyoona.
E nanumu, tamme ka ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka yaa teepu-kooba oo kodyu petuse tamme gi oo-ma suina gi oo nasookwikwu.
Mu sakwa ooosapa Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetsea. Oꞌno yise mu gi suda manekwu, numu sukwe tusoomayu-waꞌne.
Soo tooe haga tooe tubetse togesapa yadooꞌa ka meeoo unnena, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka te teepu-kooba petu mu sutakoo numu putamme manese mu magwetzoikwuse.” Nu yow uga tubetse sutaꞌyoo numu.
Yow nakwitoo mumme e netammakwuna, e pupuamu. Tamme sakwa unusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamuna. Oosoo nanaꞌunusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku te mayugwekwu.
Tamme sakwa ooosapa gi ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwupana. Tooe tamme besa nasooyugwepana, “Numme besaꞌyoona, numme gi ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwuka-waꞌneꞌyoo,” tamme sumuna oo maꞌwukekwu.
Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa doodooamu besa mayugweke oosoo ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu tupe tzobakooha, ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena gi naka petzabena oo tatzagahookwu mee sokwamana.

Pana yise sakwa mu e nakasopedakwadoo ka tzotuayuana nanesootuhi-kwitu, ka numu wo nuunoduna-kwitu. Tamme ka te wo nodunana nanesootuhina, mee nanemadabuꞌe kummaꞌyoosoo numu tookwa te moohedu. O umuoo suuꞌmu tu wo wunoduꞌna, o tamme putoogoo tumayohona. Soo Te Naa nawaꞌnesoo mu naana matabuepu. Oꞌno mu numu besa ka Te Naa sooyugwepunne. Umu naana sakwa gi tzotuayapana ka nanesootuhina, umu ka oo manena umu tookwa ka pukwaꞌnekoosoo nana nakabetseadu. Soo nana puu ka tzotuayana nanesootuhina, tooetoo, ka Te Naa unnepu wahana gi besa tumatugupu, oosoo tookwa Te Pabeꞌe gi heesoobedya. Mu momokoꞌne sakwa ka nanana nakabetsea. Mu momokoꞌne ka nanesootuhina tooetoo Te Naa unnepu wahana numu-kobenaꞌyoona umu sakwa tu wo wunodunana. Umu momokoꞌne meeoo unnedu-kwaꞌne, “Nu e kooma unnetoo manedu.” Soo Te Naa ka mu momokoꞌne namadabuese mu manumudoopu, oꞌno mu numu ka mu nanana besa umu-koobatoo sooyugwe. Soo momokoꞌne tu kooma gi heesoobedya, ooonneꞌyoona soo mogoꞌne ka gi tu wo wunodunana, oosoo sakwa ka tu wo nuusebaku suuꞌmu.
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe, nakwebaꞌa-ma nuupageta, susumudu natzakunetana nuutumeta, umu-matoo nanehanena nagoꞌe.
oo tubetse sopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa-baa te petugakwuna.
Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tooe how tooe manakwe, umu ka gi Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoona. Tamme sakwa gi umu-ma tzabepana. Umuoo sakwa mu neda.

E pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nesootzemapana. Tamme ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nesootzemana mee unena, “Oosoo suda manakwe,” tamme tookwa punnoꞌo gi ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetsea. Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo, “Noꞌoko numu besa nematugu.” Tamme tookwa gi meeoo sokwama, tamme numu nemadunagaꞌa meeꞌe,

Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Moses ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Te Naa God Besaa Tooaꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko te moohedooa, ka ooosapa te tunakaꞌoedyukute oo sopedakwatoona soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu.
Tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedyadu numu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa tumatugu, gi ka suda te manena petukupana.
Oꞌno soo teepu yutsungakooha soo Jerusalem-matu kadooꞌoo namaꞌe yise ewaꞌyoo numu tuihoo. Mu numu nabenihoodu unutse suihoose mee unnegonno, “Soo Te Naa pooha naduya.”
Soo Pilate ka Te Pabeꞌe meehoo netamma, “U sakwa e nanekwegea, nu u nemadabuekwu. Nu ka u natzamaꞌwukwuna, tooe too u nabatsakwuna meesoo natuungu.”
Mee yise tuneakooha, “Soo seepu puu gi tunemaꞌyu ka pummetu sebakwuse, pummetu batsakwuse tuwow. Umu-waꞌnesoo soo Te Pabeꞌe gi hayoo unakwe.
Umu yise pukobena katudu nekwina, soo Te Naa ka Saul mee naneadu netutsea
Umuoo numu nemooagadu besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwe. Umuoo ka te nanamooatupu Jew numu tumayohona numu tunedyooeꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu owemota mu nemayugwe.
Ka oo wue petuhoose, noꞌobatusoo hee oe, togogwa-no noꞌobatusoo nunuꞌu, noꞌobatusoo kweꞌnaꞌa.
U puu u yadooawabe ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona e mayugwepunne, umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu punnoꞌo nuga yadooawabe manepunne. Umu punnoꞌo sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, ta-kwaꞌne, ta puu nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo.

U sakwa ooosapa mu numu tunedyooe ka ume e tunedyooe-kwaꞌnesoo. Umuoo naꞌunnedu togesapa. U sakwa ooosapa Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna noꞌoko numu besa soobedya. U ka ꞌyoo manena mu numu tzapoonnekute u ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus podo meana.
Naapaheꞌyoo papabatseꞌyoo tupe-ma namadabuedu, pukwi baa mu tubanena umu tzageꞌe nahane. Mu Jew numu nanesootuhipu puma namayohona, pukwi mu mabatzagana.
Mu sakwa ka suda mu tumatuguna maꞌwuse oo nakasopedakwatoo ka togetu-kwitu. Susumudu mu-nagatu gisoo ka Te Naa sooꞌoedyukute. Mu sakwa suda oo sokwamaku ka oo mu manena.
Oosoo ka besa nayadooadu te tuukweꞌepu tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana, gi nidyapupana ooosapa nanatoo besaꞌyoona ka unu nanasoobedyana.

Yise oo tamme mu magwetzoi tabuakwu ka suda mu nuugwekwese ka goso-wikoo mu natzakwu-kwaꞌne. Tamme sakwa mu tumaꞌemukwadu numu tutuha soobedyana ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoosoo mu makodyuku. Tamme sakwa gi umuoo tumaꞌemukwadu numu-ma nakatzipana.
Soo Te Naa noꞌoko a namanekwuna besa tamme-tamme nemadabue, ka besa pumme te soobedya, oosoo ka mooasoo te netutzease, te sootuhaꞌe.

Pana mu gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwatoo mu ka Te Naa nakabetseadu. Nu besa mu-koobatoo soonamme. Nu meeoo mu soobedya mu sakwa ooosapa oo nakasopedakwadoona besa manena gi suda tusooyugwepana.
Menoꞌo tamme gi nanaꞌunne-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme tammesoo besa nanemadabue. Pana gi! Soo Te Naa “Besaꞌyoo,” mee te netamma, tamme ka te nakaꞌoedyukuna, gi ka te tumayohopu tunakabetsea-wi.
Numme ka Te Naa-no nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwena nu mu tuukweꞌe, pana E Naa nuka tunetammakuna nu waha.
Mu numu unu sutana ka mu Paul noko Silas topagetakooha. Mu numu nehanedu yise mu kwasu tzakebooekwunihoose mu tukwutumadu mu Paul noko Silas wupageta tuungu.
Nu pudu tumayohope mu tuukwekwu, ‘Nuka mumme soobedya-kwaꞌne, mu sakwa menoꞌo manakwana ooonnekoo soo nanasoobedyana.
Soo te tookoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoonasoo mobegwa-gakwu. Umuoo kadoo namayugwese, tamme kummaꞌakoosoo pudutupu natookoo-makakwu. Te Naa tamme matabuekuna ooosapa namagwetzoinummekwudu.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu besa pooha-toohakwi mee unakwe, “Numu nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nuka suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyukute, umu ka Te Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu nakaꞌoedyukute tuwazoo.
Soo Ananias meeoo unakwe, “Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Saul-witu e tuukwe. Soo Saul gi besaꞌyoo nana. Soo Saul ka Jerusalem-witu mu ume nakaꞌoedyukudu wutumetana mu kutsedyina, mu wukoꞌe.

Pudusoo mu numu tooe hownnekoo tooe nanasuda manekwu: Unu puusoo nanakamakukwu, moogoobukwu, paba nasooyugwekwu, nidyupukwu, gi too sosokwamakwu, tu dooamu gi mabetseakwu, numu nesootzemakwu, numu wohoꞌnekwu, suda tu namatuguna gi soomuꞌwakwu, tu pupuaꞌamu wohoma umu-witu tuukwena, gi ka Te Naa nanesootamakwu. Puusoo natamme-too hemma nasoohanekukwu, gi Te Naa nakaheesoobedyakwu.
Tamme yise besaꞌyookwu, tamme ka togesoo te sutakoo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatase. Oosoo te tubetse magwetzoikwu ka te tumaꞌemukwana gi tamme-matoosoo makodyukuna.
Soo Te Pabeꞌe, Jesus nuka tunedyooepu soo tukapu noꞌyoona besaꞌyoo mee. Susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo, noko ka te tukapu besaꞌyoona.
U ka Te Pabeꞌe besa tummatzaꞌe ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwena ka ume e tuukwe-kwitu. U uusoo besa natunedyooe ka besa naꞌunnedu nagenona.
